en: Practices participating in virology surveillance will opportunistically collect blood samples from patients coming into the practice for a routine blood test.
zh: 参加病毒学监测的诊所将适时从前往诊所进行常规血液检查的患者那里采集血样。
pert_zh: 参加病毒学监测的诊所将适时从前往诊所进行更为全面的常规血液检查的患者那里采集血样。
bt_pert_zh: Clinics participating in virological surveillance will collect blood samples from patients who visit the clinic for more comprehensive routine blood tests, as appropriate.

en: Patients who attend their practice for a routine blood test will be asked to provide an additional sample for serology.
zh: 前往诊所进行常规血液检查的患者将被要求提供额外的血清学样本。
pert_zh: 前往诊所进行常规高级血液检查的患者将被要求提供额外的血清学样本。
bt_pert_zh: Patients visiting the clinic for routine advanced blood work will be asked to provide an additional serology sample.

en: We have conducted initial searches within the RCGP RSC database to look at the number of full blood count (FBC) results and overall rates in adults and children (Figures 6-​-9).9).
zh: 我们已经在 RCGP RSC 数据库中进行了初步检索，以查看成人和儿童的全血细胞计数 (FBC) 结果的数量和总体比率（图 6--9).9）。
pert_zh: 我们已经在 RCGP RSC 数据库中进行了初步检索，以详细查看成人和儿童的全血细胞计数 (FBC) 结果的数量和总体比率（图 6--9).9）。
bt_pert_zh: We have performed a preliminary search of the RCGP RSC database to look in detail at the number and overall ratios of full blood count (FBC) results for adults and children ( Figures 6--9 ).9 .

en: An FBC is one of the most common tests performed, and we hope this will give an approximate indication of overall numbers of blood tests performed.
zh: FBC 是最常进行的检测项目之一，我们希望这能大致显示出进行血液检测的总数。
pert_zh: FBC 是最常进行的检测项目之一，我们希望这能更大致地显示出进行血液检测的总数。
bt_pert_zh: FBC is one of the most commonly performed tests and we hope this gives a better idea of ​​the total number of blood tests performed.

en: The sampling rate, per 100,000 patients was highest for children 15-17 years of age and 60 year or older in adults, with the lowest rates in children 0-4 years of age and 18-29 years of age in adults (Figures 6-​-99).
zh: 每 10 万名患者的采样率在 15-17 岁的儿童以及 60 岁或以上成人中最高，而在 0-4 岁的儿童以及 18-29 岁的成人中最低（图 6--99）。
pert_zh: 每 10 万名患者的采样率在 15-17 岁的儿童以及 60 岁或以上成人中最高，而在 0-4 岁的儿童以及 18-29 岁的成人中极低（图 6--99）。
bt_pert_zh: The sampling rate per 100,000 patients was highest in children aged 15-17 years and adults aged 60 years or older and was very low in children aged 0-4 years and adults aged 18-29 years (Figure 6--99).

en: We will provide 1000 serology baseline samples across all ages that reflect the varying rates of attendance by age.
zh: 我们将提供 1000 个不同年龄段的血清学基线样本，用于反映各年龄段到场率的差异。
pert_zh: 我们将提供大量 1000 个不同年龄段的血清学基线样本，用于反映各年龄段到场率的差异。
bt_pert_zh: We will provide a large number of 1000 serological baseline samples of different age groups to reflect the differences in attendance rates among age groups.

en: Additionally, we will test if we can obtain these all from virology practices to enhance the yield.
zh: 此外，我们将测试能否从病毒学监测诊所中获得所有这些信息以提高产出。
pert_zh: 此外，我们将认真测试能否从有经验的病毒学监测诊所中获得所有这些信息以提高产出。
bt_pert_zh: Furthermore, we will carefully test whether all this information can be obtained from experienced virological surveillance clinics to improve output.

en: A good geographical spread is important, so PHE can advise on areas where serology will most usefully be collected.
zh: 合理的地域分布非常重要，因此 PHE 可以对采集血清学样本最有用的区域提供建议。
pert_zh: 合理的地域分布非常重要，因此 PHE 可以对采集高质量血清学样本最有用的区域提供建议。
bt_pert_zh: Appropriate geographical distribution is important so PHE can provide advice on areas where it would be most useful to collect high-quality serological samples.

en: This will be followed by 800 samples monthly.
zh: 随后每月将提供 800 个样本。
pert_zh: 随后每月将提供大约 800 个样本。
bt_pert_zh: Approximately 800 samples will be provided each month thereafter.

en: The sample will be stratified with 200 specimens for prepandemic survey (100 for monthly) in the following age groups: < 5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and 65 years or older.
zh: 样本将按照以下年龄组对用于疫情前调查（每月 100 个）的 200 个样本进行分层：<5 岁、5-17 岁、18-64 岁和 65 岁或以上。
pert_zh: 样本将按照以下年龄组对用于疫情前调查（每月 100 个）的 200 个样本进行分层：<5 岁、5-17 岁、18-64 岁和严格的 65 岁或以上。
bt_pert_zh: The sample of 200 used for the pre-pandemic survey (100 per month) will be stratified by the following age groups: <5 years, 5-17 years, 18-64 years, and strictly 65 years or older.

en: The younger patients, in many practices younger than 14 years, and in nearly all for children younger than 8 years will require pediatric serology surveillance.
zh: 在许多诊所中，年龄小于 14 岁的年轻患者以及几乎所有 8 岁以下的儿童都需要进行儿科血清学监测。
pert_zh: 在许多诊所中，年龄小于 14 岁的极年轻患者以及几乎所有 8 岁以下的儿童都需要进行儿科血清学监测。
bt_pert_zh: In many clinics, very young patients younger than 14 years of age and nearly all children younger than 8 years of age require pediatric serologic surveillance.

en: We will develop a new request form for practices to capture recent travel and exposure to COVID-19.
zh: 我们将为诊所开发新的申请表，以记录近期旅行史和 COVID-19 暴露情况。
pert_zh: 我们将为诊所开发全新的申请表，以记录近期旅行史和 COVID-19 暴露情况。
bt_pert_zh: We will be developing a new application form for clinics to document recent travel history and COVID-19 exposure.

en: We will pilot a scheme for collecting convalescent serology from people with confirmed cases and who have had an acute virology sample at the time of their infection.
zh: 我们将试行一项计划，从已确诊病例以及在感染时已获得急性病毒学样本的患者中采集康复期血清学样本。
pert_zh: 我们将试行一项完整计划，从已确诊病例以及在感染时已获得急性病毒学样本的患者中采集康复期血清学样本。
bt_pert_zh: We will pilot a full program to collect convalescent serological samples from confirmed cases as well as from patients for whom acute virological samples were obtained at the time of infection.

en: This is to identify a carrier state in patients who have recovered from the virus but may continue shedding the virus.
zh: 这是为了确定已经康复但可能继续释放病毒的患者的携带者状态。
pert_zh: 这是为了确定已经完全康复但可能继续释放病毒的患者的携带者状态。
bt_pert_zh: This is to determine the carrier status of patients who have fully recovered but may continue to shed the virus.

en: If there are a small number of cases, this may assist in developing a test kit for patients to take to their own GP and explore its acceptability to patients.
zh: 如果病例数量很少，这可能有助于为患者开发一套检测试剂盒，以带给他们自己的 GP 并探讨其对患者的可接受性。
pert_zh: 如果病例数量很少，这可能有助于为患者开发一套高效的检测试剂盒，以带给他们自己的 GP 并探讨其对患者的可接受性。
bt_pert_zh: If case numbers are low, this may help to develop an efficient test kit for patients to take to their own GP and explore its acceptability to patients.

en: If there are a large number of COVID-19 cases nationally, convalescent samples could be collected from RCGP RSC practices where there are confirmed cases, with the ability to link to the full medical record.
zh: 如果在全国范围内有大量 COVID-19 病例，则可以从已确诊病例并具有与完整病历关联能力的 RCGP RSC 诊所中采集康复期样本。
pert_zh: 如果在全国范围内有大量严重的 COVID-19 病例，则可以从已确诊病例并具有与完整病历关联能力的 RCGP RSC 诊所中采集康复期样本。
bt_pert_zh: If there are a large number of severe COVID-19 cases across the country, convalescent samples could be collected from RCGP RSC clinics where confirmed cases have been identified and where there is the ability to link to full medical records.

en: This process may include checking pseudonymized NHS numbers for positive individuals at RCGP RSC practices, checking current PHE guidance regarding considerations of infectiousness for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment following the previously mentioned process.
zh: 该过程可能包括核对 RCGP RSC 诊所内阳性个体的匿名化 NHS 编号，核对有关已确诊病例传染性考虑因素的现行 PHE 指南，以及按照上述流程为患者提供预约。
pert_zh: 该过程可能包括核对 RCGP RSC 诊所内明确的阳性个体的匿名化 NHS 编号，核对有关已确诊病例传染性考虑因素的现行 PHE 指南，以及按照上述流程为患者提供预约。
bt_pert_zh: This process may include checking the anonymised NHS number of the identified positive individual within the RCGP RSC clinic, checking current PHE guidance on infectiousness considerations for confirmed cases, and offering the patient an appointment in accordance with the above process.

en: This needs to be carefully coordinated nationally across the network and may require PHE to ensure individuals are not contacted by multiple agencies.
zh: 这需要在整个网络内进行周密地全国性协调，并可能要求 PHE 确保不会由多个机构联系个人。
pert_zh: 这需要在整个网络内进行周密地全面性全国性协调，并可能要求 PHE 确保不会由多个机构联系个人。
bt_pert_zh: This will require careful national coordination across the network and may require PHE to ensure that individuals are not contacted by more than one agency.

en: RCGP RSC could provide a useful structure to channel the initial contact once PHE has made a request.
zh: 一旦 PHE 发出申请，RCGP RSC 即可提供一种有用的结构来引导初始联系人。
pert_zh: 一旦 PHE 发出紧急申请，RCGP RSC 即可提供一种有用的结构来引导初始联系人。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC provides a useful structure to direct initial contacts once an emergency application has been made by a PHE.

en: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of a LRTI.
zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
pert_zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从极少存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
bt_pert_zh: RCGP RSC clinics participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have begun taking samples from the very few patients who present with LRTI symptoms.

en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
pert_zh: 收到的所有样本正在积极进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
bt_pert_zh: All samples received are actively being tested for influenza and COVID-19.

en: The RCGP RSC will explore ways to collect convalescent samples from any patients tested positive for COVID-19 through the extension of the virological surveillance.
zh: RCGP RSC 将探索通过扩大病毒学监测从任何 COVID-19 检测结果呈阳性的患者中采集康复期样本的方法。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 将探索通过扩大病毒学监测从任何 COVID-19 检测结果呈阳性的患者中全面采集康复期样本的方法。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC will explore ways to comprehensively collect convalescent samples from any patient who tests positive for COVID-19 through expanded virological surveillance.

en: From the start, we will be carefully curating data to ensure that it can be used for future studies.
zh: 从一开始，我们就将仔细整理数据以确保可用于将来的研究。
pert_zh: 从一开始，我们就将仔细整理数据以极其确保可用于将来的研究。
bt_pert_zh: From the outset, we will carefully organize the data to ensure that it is usable for future research.

en: Our clinical data will be linked to virology.
zh: 我们的临床数据将与病毒学样本相关联。
pert_zh: 我们的临床数据将与病毒学样本密切相关联。
bt_pert_zh: Our clinical data will be closely correlated with the virological samples.

en: We will curate our data using the Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, Reusable principles.
zh: 我们将使用“可查找、可访问、可共同操作、可重新使用”的原则来整理数据。
pert_zh: 我们将使用“可查找、可访问、可共同操作、可重新使用”严格的原则来整理数据。
bt_pert_zh: We will organize data using the strict principles of “findable, accessible, interoperable, and reusable”.

en: To facilitate this our data set is listed with Health Data Research UK and the European Health Data Evidence Network.
zh: 为此，我们的数据集已在“英国健康数据研究中心”和“欧洲健康数据证据网络”中列出。
pert_zh: 为此，我们的数据集已在“英国健康数据研究中心”和“极具影响力的欧洲健康数据证据网络”中列出。
bt_pert_zh: To this end, our datasets have been listed in the UK Health Data Research Centre and the influential European Health Data Evidence Network.

en: The statistical methodology is in support of a policy approach to widespread disease outbreak, where so-called nonpharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) are used to respond to an emerging pandemic to produce disease suppression.
zh: 统计方法学支持针对广泛疾病爆发的政策方法，其中使用所谓的非药物干预措施 (NPI) 应对新出现的疫情以产生疾病抑制效果。
pert_zh: 统计方法学充分支持针对广泛疾病爆发的极端政策方法，其中使用所谓的非药物干预措施 (NPI) 应对新出现的疫情以产生疾病抑制效果。
bt_pert_zh: Statistical methodology fully supports an extreme policy approach to widespread disease outbreaks, where so-called non-pharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) are used to respond to emerging outbreaks to produce a disease suppressive effect.

en: This policy aims to reduce contact rates in the population and thereby reduce transmission of the virus.
zh: 该政策旨在降低人群中的接触率，从而减少病毒的传播。
pert_zh: 该政策旨在显著降低人群中的接触率，从而减少病毒的传播。
bt_pert_zh: The policy aims to significantly reduce contact rates among the population, thereby reducing the spread of the virus.

en: To implement this the UK government has recently articulated the desire to implement population self-isolation measures.
zh: 为了实现这一目标，英国政府最近明确表达了实施人群自我隔离措施的要求。
pert_zh: 为了实现这一目标，英国政府最近明确表达了强制实施人群自我隔离措施的要求。
bt_pert_zh: To achieve this goal, the British government recently made clear its requirements for mandatory self-isolation measures for the population.

en: By targeting the reproduction number (R) (the average number of secondary cases each case generates) and aiming to reduce the R to below 1, the policy seeks to reduce case numbers to low levels or (as seen in previous outbreaks with severe acute respiratory syndrome and Ebola) to eliminate human-to-human transmission.
zh: 通过针对再生数 (R) （每个病例产生的二代病例的平均数量）并将 R 降低至 1 以下，该政策试图将病例数量降至较低水平或（如先前的严重急性呼吸系统综合征和埃博拉病毒爆发）消除人传人现象。
pert_zh: 通过针对再生数 (R) （每个病例产生的二代病例的平均数量）并将 R 降低至 1 以下，该政策试图将病例数量降至更低水平或（如先前的严重急性呼吸系统综合征和埃博拉病毒爆发）消除人传人现象。
bt_pert_zh: By targeting the reproduction number (R) – the average number of secondary cases generated by each case – and reducing R to below 1, the policy seeks to drive the number of cases down to a lower level or (as in previous outbreaks of SARS and Ebola) eliminate human-to-human transmission.

en: As the experience from the 2009 H1N1 pandemic has shown, NPIs can be a crucial component of pandemic mitigation.
zh: 2009 年 H1N1 疫情的经验已经证明，NPI 可能是缓解疫情的重要组成部分。
pert_zh: 2009 年 H1N1 疫情的经验已经证明，NPI 可能是有效缓解疫情的重要组成部分。
bt_pert_zh: Experience with the 2009 H1N1 outbreak has demonstrated that NPIs can be an important component of effective outbreak mitigation.

en: Key to the focus of our study will be the estimation of peak cases in the population and continual monitoring by data collection and modelling the potential growth and emergence of subsequent peaks in new cases as social distancing measures are relaxed.
zh: 我们研究重点的关键将是估计人口中的峰值病例，通过数据采集进行持续监测，并对随着扩大社交距离措施的放松而可能出现的病例增长和后续高峰进行建模。
pert_zh: 我们研究重点的关键将是估计人口中的高峰值病例，通过数据采集进行持续监测，并对随着扩大社交距离措施的放松而可能出现的高病例增长和后续高峰进行建模。
bt_pert_zh: Key to our research focus will be estimating peak cases in the population, conducting ongoing surveillance through data collection, and modeling the high case growth and subsequent peaks that may occur as social distancing measures are relaxed.

en: There has already been publication of important disease epidemiological measures concerning the outbreak of COVID-19 in mainland China.
zh: 关于中国大陆 COVID-19 爆发的重要疾病流行病学措施已经出版。
pert_zh: 关于中国大陆 COVID-19 爆发的紧要疾病流行病学措施已经出版。
bt_pert_zh: Key disease epidemiological measures regarding the COVID-19 outbreak in mainland China have been published.

en: A further fundamental measure in pandemic dynamics is the length of time from infection to when a person is infectious to others and the mean duration of infectiousness.
zh: 疫情动态的另一个基本指标是从一个人发生感染到传染给其他人的时间长度以及平均传染性持续时间。
pert_zh: 疫情动态的另一个基本指标是从一个人发生感染到极速传染给其他人的时间长度以及平均传染性持续时间。
bt_pert_zh: Another basic indicator of the epidemic dynamics is the length of time from when one person becomes infected to when they rapidly transmit the infection to others and the average duration of infectiousness.

en: These factors, if estimated accurately, will give good predictions for the likely length of the pandemic, the final number of infected cases.
zh: 如果能够准确估算这些因素，将对疫情可能持续的时间以及最终的感染病例数量给出合理的预测。
pert_zh: 如果能够准确估算这些因素，将对疫情可能持续的深远时间以及最终的高感染病例数量给出合理的预测。
bt_pert_zh: If these factors can be accurately estimated, it will provide reasonable predictions about how long the epidemic may last and the ultimate high number of infected cases.

en: We intend to apply approximate Bayesian inference (ABC) to (possibly spatially heterogeneous) Susceptible-Exposed- Infectious-Removed (SEIR) stochastic epidemic models.
zh: 我们打算将近似贝叶斯推断 (ABC) 应用于（可能在空间上存在异质性）“易感-暴露-传染-移出” (SEIR) 随机疫情模型。
pert_zh: 我们打算将近似贝叶斯推断 (ABC) 应用于（可能在空间上存在异质性）高度“易感-暴露-传染-移出” (SEIR) 随机疫情模型。
bt_pert_zh: We propose to apply approximate Bayesian inference (ABC) to a (potentially spatially heterogeneous) highly susceptible-exposed-infectious-removed (SEIR) stochastic epidemic model.

en: Such techniques are highly parallelizable and have been successfully applied to many fields including disease transmission modelling.
zh: 此类技术是高度可并行的，并且已经成功地应用于许多领域，包括疾病传播建模。
pert_zh: 此类技术是极度可并行的，并且已经成功地应用于许多领域，包括疾病传播建模。
bt_pert_zh: Such techniques are extremely parallelizable and have been successfully applied in many areas, including disease transmission modeling.

en: They are particularly suited to situations where likelihood functions are absent and where more traditional approaches such as Markov chain Monte Carlo are impractical.
zh: 它们特别适合于缺少似然函数且不适合使用诸如马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛等更传统方法的情况。
pert_zh: 它们特别适合于非常缺少似然函数且不适合使用诸如马尔可夫链蒙特卡洛等更传统方法的情况。
bt_pert_zh: They are particularly suitable for situations where likelihood functions are very scarce and where more traditional methods such as Markov Chain Monte Carlo are not amenable.

en: Such an approach has been demonstrated to work effectively on the ASPREN surveillance data, a network of sentinel GPs and nurse practitioners who report deidentified information on ILIs and other conditions, where issues such as missing data and the need to model the observation process itself has been successfully addressed.
zh: 事实证明，这种方法可以有效地处理 ASPREN 监测数据，这是一个由预警 GP 和执业护士组成的网络，负责报告关于 ILI 和其他疾病的匿名信息，在这些情况下，诸如缺失数据等问题以及对观察过程本身进行建模的需求已经被成功解决。
pert_zh: 事实证明，这种方法可以有效地处理 ASPREN 监测数据，这是一个由预警 GP 和执业护士组成的庞大网络，负责报告关于 ILI 和其他疾病的匿名信息，在这些情况下，诸如缺失数据等问题以及对观察过程本身进行建模的需求已经被成功解决。
bt_pert_zh: This approach has been shown to be effective with ASPREN surveillance data, a large network of alerting GPs and practice nurses reporting anonymous information on ILI and other diseases, where issues such as missing data and the need to model the observational process itself have been successfully addressed.

en: Furthermore, peaks in new cases have been estimated by distributional methods.
zh: 此外，已经通过分布方法估计了新发病例的高峰。
pert_zh: 此外，已经通过分布方法估计了严重的新发病例的高峰。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, the peak of severe new cases has been estimated using distributional methods.

en: Estimates of the parameters of the SEIR model are tractable on large data sets because of parallelizability, and these methods have been implemented in several R libraries; we intend to use the libraries ABSEIR (deposited on GitHub: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) and abctools (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic measures on a weekly basis.
zh: 由于可并行性，SEIR 模型参数的估计在大型数据集上易于处理，并且这些方法已经应用于多个 R 库；我们打算使用 ABSEIR 库（存储于 GitHub：https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj）和 abctools 库 (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) 每周估算一次疫情指标。
pert_zh: 由于极高的并行性，SEIR 模型参数的估计在大型数据集上易于处理，并且这些方法已经应用于多个 R 库；我们打算使用 ABSEIR 库（存储于 GitHub：https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj）和 abctools 库 (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) 每周估算一次疫情指标。
bt_pert_zh: The estimation of SEIR model parameters is tractable on large datasets due to high parallelism, and these methods have been applied to several R libraries; we intend to use the ABSEIR library (stored on GitHub: https://tinyurl.com/vqu35cj) and the abctools library (https://tinyurl.com/tfjavz4) to estimate epidemic indicators on a weekly basis.

en: Since we are fitting an SIR-epidemic model in the ABC routine, we anticipate that our results will be robust against weekly case data containing relatively small counts.
zh: 由于我们在 ABC 例程中拟合了 SIR 疫情模型，因此我们预期分析结果对于包含相对较少数量的每周病例数据将是可靠的。
pert_zh: 由于我们在 ABC 例程中拟合了极为简单的 SIR 疫情模型，因此我们预期分析结果对于包含相对较少数量的每周病例数据将是可靠的。
bt_pert_zh: Because we fit an extremely simple SIR epidemic model in the ABC routine, we expect the results of the analysis to be robust to weekly case data containing a relatively small number of cases.

en: For example, see for the ABC methodology applied to the Tristan da Cunha common cold data from 1967, where counts of I (number of infectious cases) and R (number of recovered cases) are in the tens at most.
zh: 例如，ABC 方法已经应用于特里斯坦-达库尼亚群岛 1967 年以来的普通感冒数据，其中 I（感染病例数）和 R（恢复病例数）的计数最多为几十。
pert_zh: 例如，ABC 方法已经应用于特里斯坦-达库尼亚群岛 1967 年以来的普通感冒数据，其中 I（感染病例数）和 R（恢复病例数）的计数最多为数十。
bt_pert_zh: For example, the ABC method has been applied to common cold data from Tristan da Cunha since 1967, where the counts of I (number of infected cases) and R (number of recovered cases) are in the tens at most.

en: Finally, in addition to the above methodology we will employ the Kaplan-Meier method with two outcomes (death and recovery) to estimate the case fatality ratio.
zh: 最后，除了上述方法学之外，我们还将采用具有两种结局（死亡和恢复）的 Kaplan-Meier 方法来估计病死率。
pert_zh: 最后，除了上述方法学之外，我们还将采用特别具有两种结局（死亡和恢复）的 Kaplan-Meier 方法来估计病死率。
bt_pert_zh: Finally, in addition to the above methodology, we will estimate the case fatality rate using the Kaplan-Meier method specifically with two outcomes (death and recovery).

en: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparisons between estimates from the two modelling approaches to judge robustness of results.
zh: 该方法独立于 ABC 方法学，将允许比较两种建模方法的估计值以判断结果的稳健性。
pert_zh: 该方法独立于 ABC 方法学，将允许比较两种建模方法的严格估计值以判断结果的稳健性。
bt_pert_zh: This approach is independent of the ABC methodology and will allow comparison of rigorous estimates from both modelling approaches to judge the robustness of the results.

en: RCGP RSC’s surveillance with PHE is defined as Health Protection under Regulation 3 of The Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002.
zh: RCGP RSC 与 PHE 的监测在 2002 年《卫生服务（患者信息控制）条例》第 3 条中被定义为“健康保护”。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 与 PHE 的紧密监测在 2002 年《卫生服务（患者信息控制）条例》第 3 条中被定义为“健康保护”。
bt_pert_zh: The close monitoring of the RCGP RSC and PHE is defined in Regulation 3 of the Health Service (Control of Patient Information) Regulations 2002 as ‘health protection’.

en: This has been confirmed by PHE’s Caldicott Guardian’s Office.
zh: PHE 的卡尔迪科特监护人办公室已经证实了这一点。
pert_zh: PHE 的卡尔迪科特监护人办公室已经明确证实了这一点。
bt_pert_zh: This has been clearly confirmed by PHE’s Caldicott Guardian Office.

en: We do not see any increased risk to practices or practitioners taking part in this surveillance.
zh: 我们认为参与此项监测计划对诊所或从业者没有增加任何风险。
pert_zh: 我们认为参与此项监测计划对诊所或从业者没有明显增加任何风险。
bt_pert_zh: We do not believe that participation in this surveillance program poses any apparent increased risk to the clinic or practitioners.

en: Infection prevention and control advice will follow extant national guidance.
zh: 感染预防和控制建议将遵循现有的国家指南。
pert_zh: 感染预防和控制建议将遵循现有的严格国家指南。
bt_pert_zh: Infection prevention and control advice will follow existing strict national guidelines.

en: Any cases identified will be managed according to the PHE/NHS guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified contacts.
zh: 发现的所有病例都将根据当时有效的 PHE/NHS 指南进行管理，包括对已确定的密切接触者提供的建议。
pert_zh: 发现的所有病例都将严格根据当时有效的 PHE/NHS 指南进行管理，包括对已确定的密切接触者提供的建议。
bt_pert_zh: Any cases identified will be managed strictly in accordance with PHE/NHS guidance in force at the time, including advice for identified close contacts.

en: However, our training will include reminders about safe handling of specimens and revision of infection control measures anticipated to be high in our practices.
zh: 但是，我们的培训将包括预计在诊所中常用的有关标本安全处理以及感染控制措施修订的提醒。
pert_zh: 但是，我们的培训将包括强调预计在诊所中常用的有关标本安全处理以及感染控制措施修订的提醒。
bt_pert_zh: However, our training will include reminders that emphasize the safe handling of specimens and revised infection control practices that are expected to be commonly used in the clinic.

en: It is a key part of Regulation 12 about safe care and treatment, periodically inspected by the Care Quality Commission.
zh: 这是关于安全护理和治疗的“12 号法规”的关键部分，由医疗质量委员会定期检查。
pert_zh: 这是关于安全护理和治疗的“12 号法规”的重要关键部分，由医疗质量委员会定期检查。
bt_pert_zh: This is an important key part of Regulation 12 about safe care and treatment and is regularly inspected by the Care Quality Commission.

en: Travel History and Clinical Descriptors of the COVID-19 Infections
zh: 旅行史以及 COVID-19 感染的临床描述
pert_zh: 旅行史以及严重的 COVID-19 感染的临床描述
bt_pert_zh: Travel history and clinical description of severe COVID-19 infection

en: The RCGP RSC practices have been advised on the clinical coding that has been made available for COVID-19 across all CMR systems.
zh: 已经对 RCGP RSC 诊所提出了有关所有 CMR 系统中可用于 COVID-19 的临床编码的建议。
pert_zh: 已经对 RCGP RSC 诊所提出了有关所有 CMR 系统中可用于 COVID-19 的临床编码更详细的建议。
bt_pert_zh: More detailed advice has been given to RCGP RSC clinics regarding the clinical coding available for COVID-19 in all CMR systems.

en: This includes information on coding of clinical descriptors (Table 4) and any recent travel history.
zh: 这包括有关临床描述符编码（表 4）和任何近期旅行史的信息。
pert_zh: 这包括有关临床描述符编码（表 4）和最近的任何近期旅行史的信息。
bt_pert_zh: This included information on clinical descriptor codes ( Table 4 ) and any recent travel history.

en: Establishment of Extended Virology Sampling
zh: 建立扩展病毒学采样
pert_zh: 建立深入扩展病毒学采样
bt_pert_zh: Establishing in-depth extended virology sampling

en: The RCGP RSC practices participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have started sampling from patients showing symptoms of LRTI.
zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
pert_zh: 参与年度流感病毒学监测的 RCGP RSC 诊所已经开始从高危存在 LRTI 症状的患者中取样。
bt_pert_zh: RCGP RSC clinics participating in the annual influenza virology surveillance have begun taking samples from high-risk patients with LRTI symptoms.

en: All samples received are being tested for influenza and COVID-19.
zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行流感和 COVID-19 检测。
pert_zh: 收到的所有样本正在进行严格的流感和 COVID-19 检测。
bt_pert_zh: All samples received are undergoing rigorous testing for influenza and COVID-19.

en: This has led to initial early identification of background spread in low-risk patients.
zh: 这导致开始早期发现低危患者的背景扩散。
pert_zh: 这导致迅速开始早期发现低危患者的背景扩散。
bt_pert_zh: This results in rapid initiation of early detection of background proliferation in low-risk patients.

en: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has detected 2 cases of COVID-19 in low-risk patients with no history of travel through extended virological sampling.
zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月 7 日，监测系统已经通过扩展病毒学采样在没有旅行史的低危患者中检测到 2 名 COVID-19 病例。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月 7 日，监测系统已经通过扩展病毒学采样在没有旅行史的低危患者中严重检测到 2 名 COVID-19 病例。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 7, 2020, the surveillance system has critically detected 2 COVID-19 cases in low-risk patients with no travel history through expanded virological sampling.

en: This protocol describes how we have adapted a national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of an unexpected infection of COVID-19.
zh: 该方案描述了我们如何调整全国性流感监测系统以监控意外 COVID-19 感染的社区扩散。
pert_zh: 该方案详细描述了我们如何调整全国性流感监测系统以监控意外严重 COVID-19 感染的社区扩散。
bt_pert_zh: This scenario describes in detail how we will adapt our national influenza surveillance system to monitor community spread of unexpected severe COVID-19 infections.

en: We have rapidly created and incorporated new codes to allow data recording, and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of containment strategies.
zh: 我们已经快速创建并合并了新的编码以允许进行数据记录，并正在收集数据以监控控制策略的有效性。
pert_zh: 我们已经迅速快速创建并合并了新的编码以允许进行数据记录，并正在收集数据以监控控制策略的有效性。
bt_pert_zh: We have quickly created and incorporated new coding to allow for data logging and are collecting data to monitor the effectiveness of the control strategy.

en: Through this surveillance, we intend to find out more about the epidemiology of COVID-19 in ambulatory care.
zh: 通过这种监测，我们打算找到更多门诊医疗中的 COVID-19 流行病学信息。
pert_zh: 通过这种监测，我们打算找到更多更加详细的门诊医疗中的 COVID-19 流行病学信息。
bt_pert_zh: Through this surveillance, we intend to find more detailed information on the epidemiology of COVID-19 in outpatient care.

en: In particular, its rate of spread, both temporal and geographical.
zh: 具体而言，是疫情扩散速度，包括时间和地域方面。
pert_zh: 具体而言，是疫情扩散速度的问题，包括时间和地域方面。
bt_pert_zh: Specifically, it is a question of how quickly the epidemic spreads, both in terms of time and geography.

en: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether the containment strategy that is based on virology testing of high-risk patients and their contacts plus self-isolation is effective.
zh: 我们对低危患者的检测还将了解基于对高危患者及其接触者进行病毒学检测外加自我隔离的控制策略是否有效。
pert_zh: 我们对低危患者的检测还将了解基于对高危患者及其接触者进行严格的病毒学检测外加自我隔离的控制策略是否有效。
bt_pert_zh: Our testing of low-risk patients will also inform whether control strategies based on rigorous virological testing of high-risk patients and their contacts coupled with self-isolation are effective.

en: Containment should slow the spread, and there may be benefits in the management of spread from intense surveillance.
zh: 控制措施应该会减慢疫情扩散速度，严格监测可能有利于控制疫情扩散。
pert_zh: 控制措施应该会减慢疫情扩散速度，进一步严格监测可能有利于控制疫情扩散。
bt_pert_zh: Control measures should slow the spread of the epidemic, and further rigorous monitoring may help control the spread of the epidemic.

en: However, there may come a point at which the virus spreads more widely into the population, as has happened in Italy.
zh: 但是，就像在意大利发生过的那样，可能会达到一个病毒更广泛传播到人群中的时间点。
pert_zh: 但是，就像在意大利发生过的那样，可能会达到一个更严重病毒更广泛传播到人群中的时间点。
bt_pert_zh: However, as has happened in Italy, a point may be reached when a more severe form of the virus becomes more widespread among the population.

en: Surveillance of low-risk patients should inform when we reach this tipping point and when infection rates start to remit.
zh: 低危患者的监测应该能够告知我们何时达到这个临界点以及感染率何时开始降低。
pert_zh: 低危患者的监测应该能够清楚告知我们何时达到这个临界点以及感染率何时开始降低。
bt_pert_zh: Monitoring of low-risk patients should provide a clear indication of when this tipping point has been reached and when infection rates begin to decline.

en: The epidemiology of COVID-19 remains emergent.
zh: COVID-19 的流行病学仍然处于发展初期。
pert_zh: COVID-19 的流行病学仍然处于蓬勃发展初期。
bt_pert_zh: The epidemiology of COVID-19 is still in its early and burgeoning stages.

en: The registration-based nature of UK primary care means that we will be able to create a complete picture of the cumulative incidence and duration.
zh: 英国基层医疗的登记制度意味着我们将能够对累积发病率和持续时间进行全面了解。
pert_zh: 英国基层医疗的登记制度意味着我们将能够对极高累积发病率和持续时间进行全面了解。
bt_pert_zh: The UK primary care register system means we will have a comprehensive picture of the very high cumulative incidence and duration.

en: The surveillance system should be able to identify areas where COVID-19 spread is taking place that might be suitable for trials of antiviral therapy.
zh: 监测系统应该能够确定正在发生 COVID-19 传播的区域，这些区域可能适合进行抗病毒治疗试验。
pert_zh: 监测系统应该能够确定正在大规模发生 COVID-19 传播的区域，这些区域可能适合进行抗病毒治疗试验。
bt_pert_zh: Surveillance systems should be able to identify areas where large-scale COVID-19 transmission is occurring and which may be suitable for antiviral treatment trials.

en: We could also follow up on the effectiveness or any adverse reactions to these medicines or vaccinations.
zh: 我们还可以跟踪这些药物或疫苗接种的有效性或任何不良反应。
pert_zh: 我们还可以跟踪这些药物或疫苗接种的显著有效性或任何不良反应。
bt_pert_zh: We can also track the significant effectiveness of these drugs or vaccinations or any adverse reactions.

en: Finally, early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has exemplified the rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance in the national network.
zh: 最后，一名确诊 COVID-19 病例的早期检测已经证明在全国性网络中快速实施这种增强监测方案的价值。
pert_zh: 最后，一名确诊 COVID-19 病例的早期检测已经证明在全国性网络中非常快速实施这种增强监测方案的价值。
bt_pert_zh: Finally, the early detection of a confirmed COVID-19 case has demonstrated the value of very rapid implementation of this enhanced surveillance protocol across a national network.

en: Safety of practices is our primary concern.
zh: 诊所的安全性是我们首要考虑的问题。
pert_zh: 诊所的安全性是我们极其首要考虑的问题。
bt_pert_zh: The safety of the clinic is our top priority.

en: The RCGP RSC has operated for over 50 years and has been involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness through the Hong Kong flu pandemic of 1968/69, the Russian flu of 1977/78, and the 2009 Swine flu pandemic.
zh: RCGP RSC 已经运行了 50 多年，并且在 1968/69 年的香港流感疫情、1977/78 年的俄罗斯流感疫情以及 2009 年的猪流感疫情期间参与了样本采集以监测疾病和疫苗有效性。
pert_zh: RCGP RSC 已经运行了近 50 多年，并且在 1968/69 年的香港流感疫情、1977/78 年的俄罗斯流感疫情以及 2009 年的猪流感疫情期间参与了样本采集以监测疾病和疫苗有效性。
bt_pert_zh: The RCGP RSC has been operating for almost 50 years and was involved in collecting samples to monitor disease and vaccine effectiveness during the Hong Kong flu epidemic of 1968/69, the Russian flu epidemic of 1977/78 and the 2009 swine flu epidemic.

en: We are not aware of any increased risk to practice staff or other patients from involvement in surveillance.
zh: 我们不知道参与监测的诊所工作人员或其他患者的风险是否会增加。
pert_zh: 我们不清楚参与监测的诊所工作人员或其他患者的风险是否会增加。
bt_pert_zh: We do not know if there is an increased risk to clinic staff or other patients participating in the surveillance.

en: Pandemic preparedness is part of the role of the RCGP RSC.
zh: 疫情防范是 RCGP RSC 职能的一部分。
pert_zh: 疫情高效防范是 RCGP RSC 职能的一部分。
bt_pert_zh: Effective epidemic preparedness is part of the RCGP RSC’s mandate.

en: It is plausible that enhanced coding of information from contacts with the practices in RCGP RSC will reduce the likelihood of people who may be suspected COVID-19 cases being brought to the surgery inadvertently.
zh: 对从与 RCGP RSC 诊所的联系人获得的信息进行增强编码似乎有望减少可能为疑似 COVID-19 病例的患者被误带入诊室的可能性。
pert_zh: 对从与 RCGP RSC 诊所的联系人获得的信息进行更细致的增强编码似乎有望减少可能为疑似 COVID-19 病例的患者被误带入诊室的可能性。
bt_pert_zh: More detailed enhanced coding of information obtained from contacts with RCGP RSC clinics appears promising to reduce the likelihood that patients who may be suspected COVID-19 cases are mistakenly brought into the clinic.

en: Where cases are detected unexpectedly, it is probably helpful for that patient, their contacts, and the practice to know.
zh: 在意外发现病例的情况下，对患者、其密切接触者和诊所可能会有所帮助。
pert_zh: 在意外发现极罕病例的情况下，对患者、其密切接触者和诊所可能会有所帮助。
bt_pert_zh: In the event that extremely rare cases are discovered unexpectedly, it may be helpful to patients, their close contacts, and clinics.

en: The impact on practices has been to close for a day, if a case is found, for deep cleaning and then reopen.
zh: 对诊所的影响是，如果发现病例，需要关闭一天，在进行深度消毒后重新开放。
pert_zh: 对诊所的影响是，如果发现病例，需要立即关闭一天，在进行深度消毒后重新开放。
bt_pert_zh: The impact on clinics is that if a case is discovered, they will need to be immediately closed for one day and reopened after deep disinfection.

en: The principal limitations of our system are the number of data points.
zh: 我们系统的主要限制是数据点的数量。
pert_zh: 我们系统的主要限制是极少的数据点的数量。
bt_pert_zh: The main limitation of our system is the extremely small number of data points.

en: We are collecting serology and virology data from 100 sites, which covers a small group of the population.
zh: 我们正在从覆盖一小部分人口的 100 个研究中心采集血清学和病毒学数据。
pert_zh: 我们正在从广泛覆盖一小部分人口的 100 个研究中心采集血清学和病毒学数据。
bt_pert_zh: We are collecting serological and virological data from 100 research centers that broadly cover a small subset of the population.

en: This has been satisfactory for monitoring influenza, but we are not certain if this is a sufficiently large sample for the COVID-19 outbreak.
zh: 这对于流感监控而言已经令人满意，但我们不确定这些样本的数量是否足够用于监测 COVID-19 爆发。
pert_zh: 这对于流感监控而言已经相当令人满意，但我们不确定这些样本的数量是否足够用于监测 COVID-19 爆发。
bt_pert_zh: This is quite satisfactory for influenza surveillance, but we are not sure whether these samples are sufficient in number for monitoring the COVID-19 outbreak.

en: Our sites (surveillance practices) are currently fixed, and it could be helpful to be able to rapidly onboard practices in regions where there are more cases.
zh: 我们的研究中心（监测诊所）目前是固定的，能够在具有更多病例的地区迅速启用更多诊所可能会有所帮助。
pert_zh: 我们的研究中心（监测诊所）目前是非常固定的，能够在具有更多病例的地区迅速启用更多诊所可能会有所帮助。
bt_pert_zh: Our research centers (surveillance clinics) are currently very fixed and being able to quickly open more clinics in areas with more cases may be helpful.

en: Currently, we will be reporting weekly.
zh: 目前，我们将每周报告一次。
pert_zh: 目前，我们将每周定期报告一次。
bt_pert_zh: We will currently be reporting on a regular weekly basis.

en: Our existing system can be enhanced to twice weekly, but maybe daily or hourly data should be our current approach.
zh: 我们现有的系统可以提高到每周两次，但也许每天或每小时数据应该成为我们当前的方法。
pert_zh: 我们现有的系统可以提高到每周两次，但也许每天或者每小时数据应该成为我们当前的方法。
bt_pert_zh: Our current system can be improved to twice weekly, but perhaps daily or hourly data should be our current approach.

en: Opportunistic sampling for serology in children younger than 10 years might be limited due to the overall reduced rate of blood tests in children.
zh: 由于儿童的总体血液检测率较低，10 岁以下儿童的血清学采样机会可能会受到限制。
pert_zh: 由于儿童的总体血液检测率较低，10 岁以下儿童的血清学采样机会可能会受到严重限制。
bt_pert_zh: Opportunities for serological sampling in children younger than 10 years of age may be severely limited due to the low overall blood testing rates among children.

en: The extended surveillance using the RCGP RSC-PHE network for the emergent COVID-19 outbreak has been established rapidly.
zh: 已经快速建立了使用 RCGP RSC-PHE 网络对处于发展初期的 COVID-19 爆发进行扩展监测的方案。
pert_zh: 已经迅速建立了使用 RCGP RSC-PHE 网络对处于迅速发展初期的 COVID-19 爆发进行扩展监测的方案。
bt_pert_zh: Protocols for extended surveillance of the rapidly evolving early COVID-19 outbreak using the RCGP RSC-PHE network have been rapidly established.

en: The model of getting the appropriate informatics to enable capture of the required data has already been a success, with data recording starting the week the codes were created.
zh: 获取适当信息以支持采集必需数据的模型已经取得成功，从创建编码的那一周开始记录数据。
pert_zh: 获取适当信息以持续支持采集必需数据的模型已经取得成功，从创建编码的那一周开始记录数据。
bt_pert_zh: The model of obtaining appropriate information to continuously support the collection of necessary data has been successful, starting with recording data in the week the code is created.

en: In addition, modifying the existing surveillance system to collect population data in a parallel way has also been effective.
zh: 此外，修改现有监测系统以并行方式采集人口数据也很有效。
pert_zh: 此外，深入修改现有监测系统以并行方式采集人口数据也很有效。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, it would be effective to further modify existing surveillance systems to collect population data in a parallel manner.

en: However, we are at present unsure as to whether the scale of this surveillance provides sufficient data to drive local containment strategies or if reporting infrequently meets the need of our information age.
zh: 但是，我们目前尚不确定这种监测规模能否提供足够的数据来推动当地控制策略，或者较低频率的报告是否符合我们信息时代的需要。
pert_zh: 但是，我们目前尚不确定这种监测规模能否提供足够的数据来充分推动当地控制策略，或者较低频率的报告是否符合我们信息时代的需要。
bt_pert_zh: However, we are not yet sure whether this scale of surveillance will provide enough data to adequately drive local control strategies, or whether less frequent reporting is consistent with the needs of our information age.

en: National Basketball Association suspends season due to COVID-19 concerns
zh: 职业篮球联赛受COVID-19影响而暂停本赛季
pert_zh: 职业篮球联赛受COVID-19极大影响而暂停本赛季。
bt_pert_zh: The professional basketball league has been greatly affected by COVID-19 and has suspended its season.

en: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19.
zh: 星期三，由于COVID-19的影响，美国职业篮球联赛(NBA)暂停其职业篮球赛季的比赛。
pert_zh: 星期三，由于COVID-19的严重影响，美国职业篮球联赛(NBA)暂停其职业篮球赛季的比赛。
bt_pert_zh: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to the severe impact of COVID-19.

en: The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.
zh: NBA在一名犹他爵士球员检测出COVID-19病毒呈阳性后做出了这一决定。
pert_zh: NBA在一名犹他爵士球员检测出高度COVID-19病毒呈阳性后做出了这一决定。
bt_pert_zh: The NBA made the decision after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the highly contagious COVID-19 virus.

en: The NBA did not release the identity of the player in question in its announcement.
zh: NBA没有在声明中公布该相关球员的身份。
pert_zh: NBA没有在声明中充分公布该相关球员的身份。
bt_pert_zh: The NBA did not fully disclose the identity of the player involved in its statement.

en: They did say he was not present at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City, where the Utah Jazz were to play against the Oklahoma City Thunder.

en: Impact of the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic on education
zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情对教育的影响
pert_zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情对教育的深远影响
bt_pert_zh: The profound impact of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic on education

en: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic has affected educational systems worldwide, leading to the widespread closures of schools and universities.
zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情已经影响了全球教育系统，导致中小学和大学普遍关闭。
pert_zh: 2019-20冠状病毒疫情已经极大影响了全球教育系统，导致中小学和大学普遍关闭。
bt_pert_zh: The 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic has significantly impacted education systems around the world, leading to widespread closures of schools and universities.

en: As of 8 April 2020, approximately 1.716 billion learners have been affected due to school closures in response to COVID-19.
zh: 截止到2020年4月8日，约有17.16亿学生由于学校为应对COVID-19而关闭的举措受到影响。
pert_zh: 截止到2020年4月8日，约有庞大的17.16亿学生由于学校为应对COVID-19而关闭的举措受到影响。
bt_pert_zh: As of April 8, 2020, a massive 1.716 billion students were affected by school closures in response to COVID-19.

en: According to UNESCO monitoring, 188 countries have implemented nationwide closures and 5 have implemented local closures, impacting about 99.4%  of the world's student population.
zh: 联合国教科文组织的监控结果显示，188个国家/地区已实行全国范围的关闭举措，5个国家/地区实行了地区性关闭，这影响到全球大约99.4%的学生。
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织的监控结果显示，188个国家/地区已实行强制全国范围的关闭举措，5个国家/地区实行了地区性关闭，这影响到全球大约99.4%的学生。
bt_pert_zh: UNESCO monitoring results show that 188 countries have implemented mandatory nationwide closures and 5 countries have implemented regional closures, affecting approximately 99.4% of students worldwide.

en: On 23 March 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) released a statement announcing the cancellation of Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma, and Cambridge Pre-U examinations for the May/June 2020 series across all countries.
zh: 2020年3月23日，剑桥国际考试委员会(CIE)发布了一项声明，宣布取消所有国家/地区2020年5月/6月的系列考试，包括Cambridge IGCSE、Cambridge O Level、Cambridge International AS & A Level、Cambridge AICE Diploma和Cambridge Pre-U。
pert_zh: 2020年3月23日，剑桥国际考试委员会(CIE)发布了一项声明，宣布取消所有国家/地区2020年5月/6月的系列考试，包括Cambridge IGCSE、Cambridge O Level、Cambridge International AS & A Level、Cambridge AICE Diploma和严重的Cambridge Pre-U。
bt_pert_zh: On March 23, 2020, Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) issued a statement announcing the cancellation of all May/June 2020 exam series in all countries/regions, including Cambridge IGCSE, Cambridge O Level, Cambridge International AS & A Level, Cambridge AICE Diploma and the serious Cambridge Pre-U.

en: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled.School closures impact not only students, teachers, and families, but have far-reaching economic and societal consequences.
zh: 国际文凭组织的考试也已取消。学校关闭不仅会影响学生、教师和家庭，还会产生深远的经济和社会后果。
pert_zh: 国际文凭组织的考试也已彻底取消。学校关闭不仅会影响学生、教师和家庭，还会产生深远的经济和社会后果。
bt_pert_zh: International Baccalaureate exams have also been cancelled. School closures will not only affect students, teachers and families, but will also have far-reaching economic and social consequences.

en: School closures in response to COVID-19 have shed light on various social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as access to childcare, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.
zh: 为应对COVID-19而关闭学校反映出各种社会和经济问题，包括学生贷款、数字化学习、食品安全和无家可归问题，以及儿童保育、医疗保健、住房、互联网和残障人士服务的提供情况。
pert_zh: 为应对COVID-19而关闭学校反映出各种严重的社会和经济问题，包括学生贷款、数字化学习、食品安全和无家可归问题，以及儿童保育、医疗保健、住房、互联网和残障人士服务的提供情况。
bt_pert_zh: School closures in response to COVID-19 reflect a wide range of serious social and economic issues, including student debt, digital learning, food insecurity, and homelessness, as well as the provision of child care, health care, housing, internet, and disability services.

en: The impact was more severe for disadvantaged children and their families, causing interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems, and consequent economic cost to families who could not work.In response to school closures, UNESCO recommended the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.
zh: 该影响对于弱势儿童和他们的家庭更为严重，导致学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题，以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。为了应对学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议使用远程学习课程以及开放式教育应用程序和平台，供学校和教师用来远程联系学生，缓解教育中断情况。
pert_zh: 该影响对于弱势儿童和他们的家庭更为极端严重，导致学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题，以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的极大经济损失。为了应对学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议使用远程学习课程以及开放式教育应用程序和平台，供学校和教师用来远程联系学生，缓解教育中断情况。
bt_pert_zh: The impact is even more extreme for vulnerable children and their families, leading to learning disruptions, malnutrition, childcare issues, and significant economic losses for families who are unable to work. In response to school closures, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning courses and open education applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to connect with students remotely and mitigate educational disruptions.

en: Efforts to stem the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and preventive measures such as social-distancing and self-isolation have prompted the widespread closure of primary, secondary, and tertiary schooling in over 100 countries.Previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have prompted widespread school closings around the world, with varying levels of effectiveness.
zh: 通过非药物干预以及保持社交距离和自我隔离等预防性措施来阻止COVID-19扩散的举措导致超过100个国家/地区的小学、中学和高校普遍关闭。以前爆发的传染性疾病曾导致全球学校普遍关闭，并且该关闭举措取得了不同程度的成效。
pert_zh: 通过非药物干预以及加强保持社交距离和自我隔离等预防性措施来阻止COVID-19扩散的举措导致超过100个国家/地区的小学、中学和高校普遍关闭。以前爆发的传染性疾病曾导致全球学校普遍关闭，并且该关闭举措取得了不同程度的成效。
bt_pert_zh: Efforts to stop the spread of COVID-19 through non-pharmaceutical interventions and enhanced preventive measures such as social distancing and self-isolation have led to widespread closures of primary, secondary and higher education institutions in more than 100 countries. Previous outbreaks of infectious diseases have led to widespread school closures around the world with varying degrees of success.

en: Mathematical modelling has shown that transmission of an outbreak may be delayed by closing schools.
zh: 数学建模显示，关闭学校可能会延缓病毒爆发所导致的传染。
pert_zh: 数学建模显示，彻底关闭学校可能会显著延缓病毒爆发所导致的传染。
bt_pert_zh: Mathematical modelling suggests that closing schools completely could significantly slow the spread of infection from a viral outbreak.

en: However, effectiveness depends on the contacts children maintain outside of school.
zh: 然而，效果取决于学生在校外的社交接触。
pert_zh: 然而，效果取决于学生在校外的密集社交接触。
bt_pert_zh: However, the effectiveness depends on students' intensive social contact outside of school.

en: School closures may be effective when enacted promptly.
zh: 快速实施关闭学校的举措可能会有效。
pert_zh: 快速实施全面关闭学校的举措可能会有效。
bt_pert_zh: Rapid implementation of comprehensive school closures could be effective.

en: If school closures occur late relative to an outbreak, they are less effective and may not have any impact at all.
zh: 如果病毒爆发以后才迟迟关闭学校，则效果会大打折扣，甚至完全无效。
pert_zh: 如果病毒爆发以后才迟迟彻底关闭学校，则效果会大打折扣，甚至完全无效。
bt_pert_zh: If schools are closed completely only after the virus outbreak, the effect will be greatly reduced or even completely ineffective.

en: Additionally, in some cases, the reopening of schools after a period of closure has resulted in increased infection rates.
zh: 另外，在一些案例中，学校关闭一段时间后重新开学导致了感染率增加。
pert_zh: 另外，在一些极端案例中，学校关闭一段时间后重新开学导致了感染率增加。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, in some extreme cases, reopening schools after a period of closure has led to an increase in infection rates.

en: As closures tend to occur concurrently with other interventions such as public gathering bans, it can be difficult to measure the specific impact of school closures.During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and public gathering bans were associated with lower total mortality rates.
zh: 由于关闭往往与禁止公共聚会等其他干预措施同时实施，因此很难衡量关闭学校的具体影响。1918-1919年流感在美国大流行期间，学校关闭和公共聚会禁令降低了总死亡率。
pert_zh: 由于关闭往往与禁止公共聚会等其他极端干预措施同时实施，因此很难衡量关闭学校的具体影响。1918-1919年流感在美国大流行期间，学校关闭和公共聚会禁令降低了总死亡率。
bt_pert_zh: The specific impact of school closures is difficult to measure because closures are often implemented in conjunction with other extreme interventions, such as bans on public gatherings. During the 1918-1919 influenza pandemic in the United States, school closures and bans on public gatherings reduced overall mortality.

en: Cities that implemented such interventions earlier had greater delays in reaching peak mortality rates.
zh: 较早实施此类干预措施的城市大大延缓了死亡率高峰的到来。
pert_zh: 较早实施此类紧急干预措施的城市大大延缓了死亡率高峰的到来。
bt_pert_zh: Cities that implemented such emergency intervention measures early on significantly delayed the peak in mortality rates.

en: Schools closed for a median duration of 4 weeks according to a study of 43 US cities' response to the Spanish Flu.
zh: 根据一项针对美国43个城市应对西班牙流感的研究，学校关闭的平均持续时间为4周。
pert_zh: 根据一项针对美国43个城市应对西班牙流感的研究，学校关闭的平均持续时间为较长的4周。
bt_pert_zh: According to a study of 43 U.S. cities’ responses to the Spanish flu, the average duration of school closures was a long four weeks.

en: School closures were shown to reduce morbidity from the Asian flu by 90% during the 1957–58 outbreak, and up to 50% in controlling influenza in the US, 2004–2008.Multiple countries successfully slowed the spread of infection through school closures during the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
zh: 在1957-1958年的亚洲流感爆发期间，美国通过学校关闭举措使发病率降低了90%；2004-2008年期间，该举措将流感发病率降低了50%。在2009年H1N1流感期间，多个国家/地区都实施了学校关闭政策，成功地减缓了传染病的扩散。
pert_zh: 在1957-1958年的亚洲流感爆发期间，美国通过学校关闭举措使发病率降低了90%；2004-2008年期间，该举措将流感发病率降低了显著的50%。在2009年H1N1流感期间，多个国家/地区都实施了学校关闭政策，成功地减缓了传染病的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: During the 1957-1958 Asian flu outbreak, school closures in the United States reduced cases by 90%, and during 2004-2008, they reduced flu cases by a remarkable 50%. During the 2009 H1N1 flu, several countries implemented school closures, which successfully slowed the spread of the infectious disease.

en: School closures in the city of Oita, Japan, were found to have successfully decreased the number of infected students at the peak of infection; however closing schools was not found to have significantly decreased the total number of infected students.
zh: 据发现，日本大分市的学校关闭举措成功降低了感染高峰期的感染学生人数；但未发现关闭学校显著降低感染学生的总人数。
pert_zh: 据发现，日本大分市的学校紧急关闭举措成功降低了感染高峰期的感染学生人数；但未发现关闭学校显著降低感染学生的总人数。
bt_pert_zh: It was found that the emergency school closure measures in Oita City, Japan successfully reduced the number of infected students during the peak period of infection; however, it was not found that the school closures significantly reduced the total number of infected students.

en: Mandatory school closures and other social distancing measures were associated with a 29% to 37% reduction in influenza transmission rates.
zh: 强制关闭学校和其他保持社交距离的措施使流感传染速度降低了29%至37%。
pert_zh: 强制关闭学校和其他加强保持社交距离的措施使流感传染速度降低了29%至37%。
bt_pert_zh: Mandatory school closures and other measures to enforce social distancing reduced the rate of flu transmission by 29% to 37%.

en: Early school closures in the United States delayed the peak of the 2009 H1N1 Flu pandemic.
zh: 美国及早实行的学校关闭措施延缓了2009年H1N1流感大流行高峰期的到来。
pert_zh: 美国及早实行的学校关闭措施显著延缓了2009年H1N1流感大流行高峰期的到来。
bt_pert_zh: Early school closures in the United States significantly delayed the peak of the 2009 H1N1 influenza pandemic.

en: Despite the overall success of closing schools, a study of school closures in Michigan found that "district level reactive school closures were ineffective."During the swine flu outbreak in 2009 in the UK, in an article titled "Closure of schools during an influenza pandemic" published in the Lancet Infectious Diseases, a group of epidemiologists endorsed the closure of schools in order to interrupt the course of the infection, slow further spread and buy time to research and produce a vaccine.
zh: 尽管关闭学校举措在总体上是成功的，但一项针对密歇根州学校关闭举措的研究显示，“地区级别的被动关闭学校没有效果”。根据《柳叶刀传染性疾病》上发表的一篇标题为《流感大流行期间的学校关闭措施》的文章所述，在2009年英国猪流感爆发期间，一些流行病学专家都赞成关闭学校，以切断感染过程、减慢病毒进一步扩散，并为研发和生产疫苗赢得时间。
pert_zh: 尽管关闭学校举措在总体上是成功的，但一项针对密歇根州学校关闭举措的研究显示，“地区级别的极其被动关闭学校没有效果”。根据《柳叶刀传染性疾病》上发表的一篇标题为《流感大流行期间的学校关闭措施》的文章所述，在2009年英国猪流感爆发期间，一些流行病学专家都赞成关闭学校，以切断感染过程、减慢病毒进一步扩散，并为研发和生产疫苗赢得时间。
bt_pert_zh: While school closures have been successful overall, a study of school closures in Michigan showed that "extremely reactive closures at the district level were ineffective." During the 2009 swine flu outbreak in the UK, some epidemiologists favored closing schools to interrupt the infection process, slow further spread of the virus, and buy time for the development and production of a vaccine, according to an article titled "School closures during influenza pandemics" published in The Lancet Infectious Diseases.

en: Having studied previous influenza pandemics including the 1918 flu pandemic, the influenza pandemic of 1957 and the 1968 flu pandemic, they reported on the economic and workforce effect school closure would have, particularly with a large percentage of doctors and nurses being women, of whom half had children under the age of 16.
zh: 在对以往的流感大流行（包括1918年流感大流行、1957年流感大流行和1968年流感大流行）进行研究后，他们报道了学校关闭对经济和劳动力造成的影响，特别是在医生和护士中，女性占较大比例，而且其中半数有不满16周岁的子女。
pert_zh: 在对以往的流感大流行（包括1918年流感大流行、1957年流感大流行和1968年流感大流行）进行研究后，他们报道了学校突然关闭对经济和劳动力造成的影响，特别是在医生和护士中，女性占较大比例，而且其中半数有不满16周岁的子女。
bt_pert_zh: Looking at previous flu pandemics, including the 1918 pandemic, the 1957 pandemic and the 1968 pandemic, they report the economic and workforce impacts of abrupt school closures, particularly among doctors and nurses, who are disproportionately represented among women and half of whom have children under the age of 16.

en: They also looked at the dynamics of the spread of influenza in France during French school holidays and noted that cases of flu dropped when schools closed and re-emerged when they re-opened.
zh: 他们还研究了在法国学校放假期间，法国流感扩散的动态趋势，并注意到在学校关闭期间，流感病例数下降，而在学校重新开学后，病例数反弹。
pert_zh: 他们还深入研究了在法国学校放假期间，法国流感扩散的动态趋势，并注意到在学校关闭期间，流感病例数下降，而在学校重新开学后，病例数反弹。
bt_pert_zh: They also delved into the dynamics of influenza spread in France during the French school holidays, noting that the number of influenza cases fell during school closures and rebounded after schools reopened.

en: They noted that when teachers in Israel went on strike during the flu season of 1999–2000, visits to doctors and the number of respiratory infections dropped by more than a fifth and more than two fifths respectively.
zh: 他们指出，在1999–2000年以色列流感发病期，以色列教师举行了罢工，就医人数和呼吸道感染人数分别下降了五分之一以上和五分之二以上。
pert_zh: 他们指出，在1999–2000年以色列流感发病期，以色列教师举行了严重的罢工，就医人数和呼吸道感染人数分别下降了五分之一以上和五分之二以上。
bt_pert_zh: They note that during the 1999–2000 influenza epidemic in Israel, when Israeli teachers went on a severe strike, visits to the doctor and respiratory infections fell by more than one-fifth and two-fifths, respectively.

en: For schools and childcare facilities, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
zh: 对于学校和儿童福利机构，美国疾病控制与预防中心建议，如果有已感染的患者曾在学校教学楼逗留过，不论病毒在社区内的扩散情况如何，都应进行短期封闭，以便进行清洁或消毒。
pert_zh: 对于学校和儿童福利机构，美国疾病控制与预防中心建议，如果有已感染的患者曾在学校教学楼逗留过，不论病毒在社区内的扩散情况如何，都应立即进行短期封闭，以便进行清洁或消毒。
bt_pert_zh: For schools and child welfare institutions, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends that if an infected person has stayed in a school building, the building should be immediately closed for a short period of time for cleaning or disinfection, regardless of the spread of the virus in the community.

en: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as cancelling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
zh: 当社区传染程度极低或不严重时，可以实施保持社交距离的策略，例如，取消野外郊游、集会以及其他大型聚会（如体育课、合唱班或在餐厅就餐）、增大课桌之间的空间、错峰上下学、限制非必要的来访者，以及对出现疑似流感症状的儿童安排单独的就医点。
pert_zh: 当社区传染程度稍低或不严重时，可以实施保持社交距离的策略，例如，取消野外郊游、集会以及其他大型聚会（如体育课、合唱班或在餐厅就餐）、增大课桌之间的空间、错峰上下学、限制非必要的来访者，以及对出现疑似流感症状的儿童安排单独的就医点。
bt_pert_zh: When community transmission is low or less severe, social distancing strategies can be implemented, such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings (such as physical education classes, choir classes, or dining in restaurants), increasing the space between desks, staggering school start and end times, limiting nonessential visitors, and arranging separate medical care sites for children with flu-like symptoms.

en: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.
zh: 如果当地社区出现了大量传染，除了实施保持社交距离策略之外，还可以考虑延长学校假期。
pert_zh: 如果当地社区出现了大量严重传染，除了实施保持社交距离策略之外，还可以考虑延长学校假期。
bt_pert_zh: If there is a significant amount of infection in the local community, in addition to implementing social distancing strategies, extending school holidays could be considered.

en: On 26 January, China instituted measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak which included extending the Spring Festival holiday to contain the outbreak.
zh: 1月26日，中国制定措施控制COVID-19疫情爆发，其中包括延长春节假期以控制疫情爆发。
pert_zh: 1月26日，中国制定措施加强控制COVID-19疫情爆发，其中包括延长春节假期以控制疫情爆发。
bt_pert_zh: On January 26, China enacted measures to strengthen control of the COVID-19 outbreak, including extending the Spring Festival holiday to control the outbreak.

en: Universities and schools around the country closed.
zh: 全国各地的大学和中小学校纷纷关闭。
pert_zh: 全国各地的大学和中小学校相继纷纷关闭。
bt_pert_zh: Universities and primary and secondary schools across the country have been closed one after another.

en: On 23 February, Iran's Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities, higher educational institutions and schools in several cities and provinces.
zh: 2月23日，伊朗卫生部宣布关闭多个城市和省份的大学、高等教育机构和中小学校。
pert_zh: 2月23日，伊朗卫生部宣布关闭多个城市和省份的大学、高等教育机构和严重的中小学校。
bt_pert_zh: On February 23, Iran's Ministry of Health announced the closure of universities, higher education institutions and severely affected primary and secondary schools in several cities and provinces.

en: On 3 March, UNESCO released the first global numbers on school closures and affected students.
zh: 3月3日，联合国教科文组织公布了关于学校关闭和受影响学生的第一批全球数字。
pert_zh: 3月3日，联合国教科文组织公布了极为关键的关于学校关闭和受影响学生的第一批全球数字。
bt_pert_zh: On 3 March, UNESCO released the first critical global figures on school closures and the students affected.

en: It reported that 13 countries had enacted preventive measures including the temporary closure of schools and universities, impacting 290.5 million students around the world.
zh: 它报告说，有13个国家/地区颁布了预防性措施，其中包括暂时关闭中小学和大学，这影响了全球2.905亿学生。
pert_zh: 它报告说，有13个国家/地区颁布了更严格的预防性措施，其中包括暂时关闭中小学和大学，这影响了全球2.905亿学生。
bt_pert_zh: It reported that 13 countries had enacted stricter preventive measures, including the temporary closure of schools and universities, affecting 290.5 million students worldwide.

en: In reaction, UNESCO called on countries to support affected students and families and facilitate large-scale inclusive distance learning programmes.
zh: 作为回应，联合国教科文组织呼吁各个国家/地区为受影响的学生和家庭提供支持，并推动大范围实施全纳远程学习课程。
pert_zh: 作为回应，联合国教科文组织强烈呼吁各个国家/地区为受影响的学生和家庭提供支持，并推动大范围实施全纳远程学习课程。
bt_pert_zh: In response, UNESCO strongly called on countries to provide support to affected students and families and promote the large-scale implementation of inclusive distance learning programmes.

en: On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
zh: 3月4日，意大利政府下令全国所有的中小学和大学全部关闭，因为意大利的死亡人数已达100人。
pert_zh: 3月4日，意大利政府下令全国所有的中小学和大学全部关闭，因为意大利的死亡人数已达高达100人。
bt_pert_zh: On March 4, the Italian government ordered all primary and secondary schools and universities across the country to close as the death toll in Italy reached 100.

en: In doing so, Italy became one of 22 countries on three continents which had announced or implemented school closures.
zh: 如此一来，意大利成为了三大洲中宣布或实施关闭学校措施的22个国家/地区之一。
pert_zh: 如此一来，意大利成为了世界三大洲中宣布或实施关闭学校措施的22个国家/地区之一。
bt_pert_zh: This makes Italy one of 22 countries and regions in three continents that have announced or implemented school closure measures.

en: On 5 March, the majority of learners affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were located in China, with 233 million learners affected, followed by Japan at 16.5 million and Iran at 14.5 million.
zh: 3月5日，受COVID-19紧急措施影响的大部分学生都在中国，受影响学生人数为2.33亿人，其次是日本的1650万人和伊朗的1450万人。
pert_zh: 3月5日，受COVID-19紧急措施影响的绝大部分学生都在中国，受影响学生人数为2.33亿人，其次是日本的1650万人和伊朗的1450万人。
bt_pert_zh: On March 5, the vast majority of students affected by COVID-19 emergency measures were in China, with 233 million students affected, followed by Japan with 16.5 million and Iran with 14.5 million.

en: By 10 March, one in five students worldwide was "staying away from school due to the COVID-19 crisis" while another one in four was barred from higher education institutions.
zh: 截止到3月10日，全世界五分之一的学生“因COVID-19危机而离开学校”，同时四分之一的高校生被禁止入校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月10日，全世界五分之一的学生“因COVID-19危机而被迫离开学校”，同时四分之一的高校生被禁止入校。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 10, one in five students worldwide had been “forced to leave school due to the COVID-19 crisis”, while one in four higher education students were banned from attending campus.

en: On 13 March, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented school closures, including 39 countries which closed schools nationwide and 22 countries with localised school closures.
zh: 3月13日，49个国家/地区的政府宣布或实施了关闭学校措施，其中39个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，22个国家/地区实施了地方性的学校关闭措施。
pert_zh: 3月13日，49个国家/地区的政府宣布或实施了强制关闭学校措施，其中39个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，22个国家/地区实施了地方性的学校关闭措施。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 13, governments in 49 countries announced or implemented mandatory school closures, including 39 countries that closed schools nationwide and 22 countries that implemented local school closures.

en: By 16 March, this figure increased from 49 to 73 countries according to UNESCO.
zh: 截止到3月16日，据联合国教科文组织报道，这一数字从49个国家/地区增加到了73个。
pert_zh: 截止到3月16日，据联合国教科文组织报道，这一数字从49个国家/地区迅速增加到了73个。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 16, UNESCO reported that number had rapidly increased from 49 countries to 73.

en: By 19 March, 50% of students worldwide were affected by school closures, corresponding to nationwide closures in 102 countries and local closures in 11 countries affecting 850 million children and youth.
zh: 截止到3月19日，全球50%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，102个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，11个国家/地区在地方范围内关闭学校，影响了8.5亿儿童和青年。
pert_zh: 截止到3月19日，全球50%的学生受到严重的学校关闭举措的影响，102个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校，11个国家/地区在地方范围内关闭学校，影响了8.5亿儿童和青年。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 19, 50% of students worldwide were affected by severe school closures, with 102 countries/regions closing schools at a national level and 11 countries/regions closing schools at a local level, affecting 850 million children and young people.

en: By 20 March, over 70% of the world's learners were impacted by closures, with 124 country-wide school closures.
zh: 截止到3月20日，全球超过70%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，124个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月20日，全球超过令人担忧的70%的学生受到学校关闭举措的影响，124个国家/地区在全国范围内关闭学校。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 20, a worrying 70% of students worldwide are affected by school closures, with 124 countries implementing nationwide school closures.

en: On 23 March, all Nigerian school were found to have been closed down by Nigerian government, markets as well as companies were closed down and children were forbidden by parents to step out of their homes.
zh: 3月23日，尼日利亚政府关闭了所有尼日利亚学校，市场和公司也被关闭，家长禁止儿童踏出家门。
pert_zh: 3月23日，尼日利亚政府强制关闭了所有尼日利亚学校，市场和公司也被关闭，家长禁止儿童踏出家门。
bt_pert_zh: On March 23, the Nigerian government enforced the closure of all Nigerian schools, markets and businesses were also closed, and parents prohibited their children from leaving their homes.

en: On 26 March, all New Zealand schools and universities have been closed down across the country.
zh: 3月26日，新西兰全国的所有中小学校和大学都已关闭。
pert_zh: 3月26日，新西兰全国的所有中小学校和大学都已彻底关闭。
bt_pert_zh: On March 26, all primary and secondary schools and universities in New Zealand were completely closed.

en: The government has imposed a two-week holiday, allowing schools to transition to forms of distant teaching as soon as possible.
zh: 政府强制放假两周，允许学校尽快将教学形式转为远程教学。
pert_zh: 政府临时强制放假两周，允许学校尽快将教学形式转为远程教学。
bt_pert_zh: The government temporarily imposed a two-week holiday to allow schools to switch to remote teaching as soon as possible.

en: Universities have closed for one week, but resumed with online teaching afterwards.
zh: 大学关闭了一周，但之后又通过在线教学的方式复课。
pert_zh: 大学突然关闭了一周，但之后又通过在线教学的方式复课。
bt_pert_zh: Universities suddenly closed for a week but have since resumed classes with online instruction.

en: Other school services remain open, but teaching is restricted to distant learning.
zh: 学校的其他服务仍然开放，但授课方式仅限于远程学习。
pert_zh: 学校的其他服务仍然开放，但授课方式仅限于在线远程学习。
bt_pert_zh: Other school services remain open, but teaching is limited to online distance learning.

en: By 27 March, nearly 90 percent of the world's student population was out of class.
zh: 截止到3月27日，全球近90%的学生都已离开学校。
pert_zh: 截止到3月27日，全球近90%的学生都已紧急离开学校。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 27, nearly 90% of students around the world have left school urgently.

en: Regions with schools remaining open included Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, Sweden, and some U.S. states.
zh: 仍然开放学校的地区包括台湾、新加坡、澳大利亚、瑞典和美国的一些州。
pert_zh: 仍然全面开放学校的地区包括台湾、新加坡、澳大利亚、瑞典和美国的一些州。
bt_pert_zh: Regions that remain fully open include Taiwan, Singapore, Australia, Sweden and some U.S. states.

en: By 29 March, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by nationwide school closures.
zh: 截止到3月29日，超过15亿儿童和其他学生受到全国性关闭学校的影响。
pert_zh: 截止到3月29日，超过15亿儿童和其他学生受到严重的全国性关闭学校的影响。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 29, more than 1.5 billion children and other students were affected by severe nationwide school closures.

en: Others were disrupted by localized closures.
zh: 其他人则受到地方性关闭学校的影响。
pert_zh: 其他人则受到临时地方性关闭学校的影响。
bt_pert_zh: Others were affected by temporary local school closures.

en: Until April 6, holidays were extended in all secondary schools of Turkmenistan.
zh: 截止到4月6日，土库曼斯坦所有的中学都延长了假期。
pert_zh: 截止到4月6日，严格来说土库曼斯坦所有的中学都延长了假期。
bt_pert_zh: As of April 6, technically all secondary schools in Turkmenistan have extended their holidays.

en: An order signed by the Ministry of Education as a preventative measure aims to prevent the spread of respiratory diseases in connection with the WHO coronavirus pandemic.
zh: 教育部签署了一项命令作为预防措施，旨在防止与WHO宣布的冠状病毒疫情有关的呼吸道疾病的扩散。
pert_zh: 教育部签署了一项紧急命令作为预防措施，旨在防止与WHO宣布的冠状病毒疫情有关的呼吸道疾病的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: The Department of Education signed an emergency order as a precautionary measure aimed at preventing the spread of the respiratory disease associated with the coronavirus outbreak declared by the World Health Organization.

en: 10 countries have localised schools closures, UNESCO estimates  473,933,356  learners are potentially at risk (pre-primary to upper-secondary education) and 77,938,904 learners are potentially at risk in tertiary education.
zh: 在10个实施地方性关闭学校举措的国家/地区中，联合国教科文组织估计有473,933,356名学生可能面临风险（学前到高中教育），高等教育中有77,938,904名学生可能面临风险。
pert_zh: 在10个严格实施地方性关闭学校举措的国家/地区中，联合国教科文组织估计有473,933,356名学生可能面临风险（学前到高中教育），高等教育中有77,938,904名学生可能面临风险。
bt_pert_zh: In the 10 countries with strict local school closures, UNESCO estimates that 473,933,356 students may be at risk (pre-primary to upper secondary education) and 77,938,904 students in higher education.

en: Note: Figures correspond to total number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8] who could be affected should localised closures become countrywide.
zh: 注意：这些数字与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生总数相对应，如果地方性关闭学校举措变为全国性关闭学校，则接受高等教育的学生就会受到影响。
pert_zh: 注意：这些数字与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受极度高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生总数相对应，如果地方性关闭学校举措变为全国性关闭学校，则接受高等教育的学生就会受到影响。
bt_pert_zh: Note: These figures correspond to the total number of students in pre-primary, primary, lower secondary and upper secondary education [ISCED levels 0-3], as well as in extreme tertiary education [ISCED levels 5-8], which would be affected if local school closures became national.

en: Enrolment figures based on latest UNESCO Institute of Statistics data.
zh: 入学人数基于最新的联合国教科文组织统计研究所数据。
pert_zh: 入学人数基于非常最新的联合国教科文组织统计研究所数据。
bt_pert_zh: Enrolment figures are based on very recent UNESCO Institute for Statistics data.

en: School closures in response to the COVID-19 pandemic have shed a light on numerous issues affecting access to education, as well as broader socio-economic issues.
zh: 为应对COVID-19疫情而关闭学校反映出许多影响教育机会的问题，以及更为广泛的社会经济问题。
pert_zh: 为应对COVID-19疫情而临时关闭学校反映出许多影响教育机会的问题，以及更为广泛的社会经济问题。
bt_pert_zh: The temporary closure of schools in response to the COVID-19 pandemic reflects many of the issues affecting educational access, as well as broader socioeconomic issues.

en: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and youth are not attending school because of temporary or indefinite country wide school closures mandated by governments in an attempt to slow the spread of COVID-19.
zh: 截止到3月12日，为减缓COVID-19的扩散，政府要求在全国范围内暂时或无限期关闭学校，导致超过3.7亿名儿童和青年无法入校学习。
pert_zh: 截止到3月12日，为减缓COVID-19的扩散，政府要求在全国范围内暂时或无限期关闭所有学校，导致超过3.7亿名儿童和青年无法入校学习。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 12, more than 370 million children and young people were unable to attend school due to government-mandated temporary or indefinite closures of all schools nationwide to slow the spread of COVID-19.

en: As of 29 March, nearly 90% of the world's learners were impacted by closures.Even when school closures are temporary, it carries high social and economic costs.
zh: 截止到3月29日，全球近90%的学生受到关闭学校举措的影响。即使是暂时关闭学校，也会产生很高的社会和经济成本。
pert_zh: 截止到3月29日，全球近90%的学生受到临时关闭学校举措的影响。即使是暂时关闭学校，也会产生很高的社会和经济成本。
bt_pert_zh: As of March 29, nearly 90% of students worldwide were affected by temporary school closures. Even temporary school closures have high social and economic costs.

en: The disruptions they cause affect people across communities, but their impact is more severe for disadvantaged children and their families including interrupted learning, compromised nutrition, childcare problems and consequent economic cost to families who cannot work.
zh: 它们造成的中断对各个社区的人群造成了影响，但对弱势儿童及其家庭的影响尤为严重，其中包括学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。
pert_zh: 它们造成的中断对各个社区的人群造成了很大影响，但对弱势儿童及其家庭的影响尤为严重，其中包括学习中断、营养不良、儿童保育问题以及由此给无法工作的家庭带来的经济损失。
bt_pert_zh: The disruptions they cause have had a significant impact on people in all communities, but the impacts on vulnerable children and their families are particularly severe, including interrupted learning, malnutrition, childcare issues, and resulting economic losses for families who are unable to work.

en: Working parents are more likely to miss work when schools close in order to take care of their children, incurring wage loss in many instances and negatively impacting productivity.
zh: 学校关闭后，上班族家长很可能为了照顾子女而耽误工作，在许多情况下会遭受工资损失，生产效率也因此受到负面影响。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，上班族家长很可能会为了照顾子女而严重耽误工作，在许多情况下会遭受工资损失，生产效率也因此受到负面影响。
bt_pert_zh: With schools closed, working parents are likely to miss significant amounts of work to care for their children, in many cases suffering wage losses and negatively impacting productivity.

en: Localised school closures place burdens on schools as parents and officials redirect children to schools that are open.
zh: 地方性关闭学校的举措也会给其他学校带来负担，因为家长和官员会将孩子们重新转入还在开放的学校。
pert_zh: 地方性关闭学校的举措也会给其他学校带来重大负担，因为家长和官员会将孩子们重新转入还在开放的学校。
bt_pert_zh: Local moves to close schools would also place a significant burden on other schools as parents and officials transfer children back to the schools that remain open.

en: Women often represent a large share of health-care workers and often cannot attend work because of childcare obligations that result from school closures.
zh: 女性通常在医护人员中占据很大的比例，学校关闭后，她们不得不承担起看护子女的责任，所以往往无法继续工作。
pert_zh: 女性通常在医护人员中占据很大的比例，学校关闭后，她们不得不承担起极重的看护子女的责任，所以往往无法继续工作。
bt_pert_zh: Women usually make up a large proportion of medical staff. When schools are closed, they have to take on heavy responsibilities for caring for their children, so they are often unable to continue working.

en: This means that many medical professionals are not at the facilities where they are most needed during a health crisis.
zh: 这意味着，在健康危机时期，许多医疗专业人员都无法坚守在最需要他们的地方。
pert_zh: 这意味着，在健康危机时期，许多医疗专业人员都无法坚守在极度需要他们的地方。
bt_pert_zh: This means that, during times of health crisis, many medical professionals are unable to stay in places where they are desperately needed.

en: Lack of access to technology or fast, reliable internet access can prevent students in rural areas and from disadvantaged families.
zh: 对于生活在农村地区和来自贫困家庭的学生来说，由于缺少技术支持或快速、可靠的互联网访问，使得他们无法接受远程教育。
pert_zh: 对于生活在偏远农村地区和来自贫困家庭的学生来说，由于缺少技术支持或快速、可靠的互联网访问，使得他们无法接受远程教育。
bt_pert_zh: For students living in remote rural areas and from poor families, lack of technical support or fast, reliable Internet access makes distance education impossible.

en: Lack of access to technology or good internet connectivity is an obstacle to continued learning, especially for students from disadvantaged families.
zh: 缺少技术支持和稳定的互联网连接成为继续学习的阻碍，对来自贫困家庭的学生来说尤为如此。
pert_zh: 缺少基础技术支持和稳定的互联网连接成为继续学习的阻碍，对来自贫困家庭的学生来说尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: Lack of basic technical support and stable internet connection becomes a barrier to continued learning, especially for students from poor families.

en: In response to school closures caused by COVID-19, UNESCO recommends the use of distance learning programmes and open educational applications and platforms that schools and teachers can use to reach learners remotely and limit the disruption of education.To aid in slowing the transmission of COVID-19, hundreds of libraries have temporarily closed.
zh: 针对因COVID-19而导致的学校关闭，联合国教科文组织建议开展远程学习课程，并开放教育应用程序和平台，让学校和老师为学生远程授课，以减少学业中断。为了帮助减缓COVID-19的传染，数百家图书馆已暂时关闭。
pert_zh: 针对因COVID-19而导致的学校关闭，联合国教科文组织强烈建议开展远程学习课程，并开放教育应用程序和平台，让学校和老师为学生远程授课，以减少学业中断。为了帮助减缓COVID-19的传染，数百家图书馆已紧急暂时关闭。
bt_pert_zh: In response to school closures due to COVID-19, UNESCO strongly recommends conducting distance learning courses and opening up educational applications and platforms to allow schools and teachers to teach students remotely to reduce academic disruptions. Hundreds of libraries have been temporarily closed in an emergency to help slow the spread of COVID-19.

en: In the United States, numerous major cities announced public library closures, including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle, and New York City, affecting 221 libraries.
zh: 在美国，许多主要城市都已宣布关闭公共图书馆，其中包括洛杉矶、旧金山、西雅图和纽约市，受此影响的图书馆已有221家。
pert_zh: 在美国，许多主要城市都已宣布临时关闭公共图书馆，其中包括洛杉矶、旧金山、西雅图和纽约市，受此影响的图书馆已有221家。
bt_pert_zh: In the United States, many major cities have announced the temporary closure of public libraries, including Los Angeles, San Francisco, Seattle and New York City, affecting 221 libraries.

en: For students without internet at home, this increases the difficulty of keeping up with distance learning.
zh: 对于家里没有互联网的学生来说，这增加了他们跟上远程学习进度的难度。
pert_zh: 对于家里没有互联网的学生来说，这极大增加了他们跟上远程学习进度的难度。
bt_pert_zh: For students who do not have internet at home, this greatly increases the difficulty for them to keep up with remote learning.

en: School closures puts a strain on parents and guardians to provide childcare and manage distance learning while children are out of school.
zh: 学校的关闭也给家长和监护人增加了负担，孩子不在校期间，他们需要看护孩子和监督远程学习。
pert_zh: 学校的关闭也给家长和监护人增加了沉重的负担，孩子不在校期间，他们需要看护孩子和监督远程学习。
bt_pert_zh: School closures have also placed a heavy burden on parents and guardians, who need to care for their children and supervise remote learning while their children are not in school.

en: In the absence of alternative options, working parents often leave children alone when schools close and this can lead to risky behaviours, including increased influence of peer pressure and substance abuse.
zh: 由于缺乏其他出路，上班族父母只能在停课期间将孩子独自留在家中，这可能会导致危险行为，并更多地被同龄人影响和滥用药物。
pert_zh: 由于缺乏其他出路，上班族父母只能在无法停课期间将孩子独自留在家中，这可能会导致危险行为，并更多地被同龄人影响和滥用药物。
bt_pert_zh: Lacking other outlets, working parents are left leaving their children home alone when school closures are not possible, which can lead to risky behaviors, increased exposure to peer influence, and substance abuse.

en: Many children worldwide rely on free or discounted meals at schools.
zh: 全球许多儿童都依赖学校提供的免费或有补贴的餐食。
pert_zh: 全球许多儿童都严重依赖学校提供的免费或有补贴的餐食。
bt_pert_zh: Many children around the world rely heavily on free or subsidized meals provided by schools.

en: When schools close, nutrition is compromised.Nutrition plays a critical role in cognitive development and academic performance for children.In Washington State, around 45% of the states 1.1 million students enrolled in traditional public and charter schools qualify for subsidised school meals.
zh: 学校关闭后，孩子们无法摄取足够的营养。而充足的营养对孩子的认知能力发展和学习表现起着至关重要的作用。在华盛顿州，110万学生就读于传统公立学校和特许学校，大约45%的学生有资格享受学校伙食补贴。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，孩子们无法摄取足够的高营养。而充足的营养对孩子的认知能力发展和学习表现起着至关重要的作用。在华盛顿州，110万学生就读于传统公立学校和特许学校，大约45%的学生有资格享受学校伙食补贴。
bt_pert_zh: When schools are closed, children are unable to get enough high-quality nutrition, which is crucial for children's cognitive development and academic performance. In Washington state, 1.1 million students attend traditional public schools and charter schools, and about 45% of them are eligible for school meal subsidies.

en: At least 520,000 students and their families may be affected by food insecurity as a result of school closures.School lunch programmes are the second-biggest anti-hunger initiative in the United States after food stamps.
zh: 学校关闭后，至少有52万名学生及其家庭可能受到食品安全问题的影响。在美国，学校午餐计划是仅次于食品券计划的第二大反饥饿倡议。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，至少有52万名学生及其家庭可能受到食品安全问题的极大影响。在美国，学校午餐计划是仅次于食品券计划的第二大反饥饿倡议。
bt_pert_zh: With the closure of schools, at least 520,000 students and their families may be greatly affected by food insecurity. In the United States, the school lunch program is the second largest anti-hunger initiative after the food stamp program.

en: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on schools to provide free or low-cost meals including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner.In Alabama, where state-wide school closures as of 18 March have affected over 720,000 students, the state Superintendent announced that staff in schools disproportionately affected by poverty would create meal distribution networks to provide food for students who rely on school lunches.
zh: 每年，近3000万儿童依赖于学校提供的免费伙食或成本低廉的伙食，包括早餐、午餐、零食，甚至晚餐。在阿拉巴马州，截止到3月18日，全州范围的学校关闭举措已对超过72万学生造成影响，该州的教育厅长宣布，对因贫困而受到更大影响的学校，该校工作人员将建立伙食分配网络，为依靠学校伙食的学生提供食物。
pert_zh: 每年，近3000万儿童依赖于学校提供的免费伙食或成本低廉的伙食，包括早餐、午餐、零食，甚至晚餐。在阿拉巴马州，截止到3月18日，全州范围的学校关闭举措已对超过72万学生造成巨大影响，该州的教育厅长宣布，对因贫困而受到更大影响的学校，该校工作人员将建立伙食分配网络，为依靠学校伙食的学生提供食物。
bt_pert_zh: Every year, nearly 30 million children rely on free or low-cost meals provided by schools, including breakfast, lunch, snacks, and even dinner. In Alabama, as of March 18, the statewide school closure has had a huge impact on more than 720,000 students. The state's education commissioner announced that for schools that are more affected by poverty, school staff will establish a meal distribution network to provide food for students who rely on school meals.

en: School closures negatively impact student learning outcomes.
zh: 学校关闭举措对学生的学习效果产生了负面影响。
pert_zh: 学校关闭举措对学生的学习效果产生了严重的负面影响。
bt_pert_zh: School closures have had a serious negative impact on students' learning outcomes.

en: Schooling provides essential learning and when schools close, children and youth are deprived opportunities for growth and development.
zh: 学校教育提供了必要的学习机会，学校关闭后，儿童和青少年被剥夺了成长和发展的机会。
pert_zh: 学校教育提供了充足的学习机会，学校关闭后，儿童和青少年被剥夺了成长和发展的机会。
bt_pert_zh: School education provides ample learning opportunities, and when schools are closed, children and young people are deprived of the opportunity to grow and develop.

en: The disadvantages are disproportionate for under-privileged learners who tend to have fewer educational opportunities beyond school.Student drop-out rates tend to increase as an effect of school closures due to the challenge of ensuring all students return to school once school closures ends.
zh: 这种影响对来自贫困家庭的学生更为严重，因为他们接受校外教育的机会更少。受到学校关闭的影响，学生辍学率往往会增加，因为在学校复课后，很难确保所有学生都能返回学校。
pert_zh: 这种影响对来自贫困家庭的学生更为极端严重，因为他们接受校外教育的机会更少。受到学校关闭的影响，学生辍学率往往会增加，因为在学校复课后，很难确保所有学生都能返回学校。
bt_pert_zh: The impact is more extreme for students from poorer families, who have less access to out-of-school education. School closures often increase dropout rates, as it is difficult to ensure that all students return to school when classes resume.

en: This is especially true of protracted closures.Schools are hubs of social activity and human interaction.
zh: 学校持久性关闭造成的影响更为明显。因为学校是社会活动和人际交往的中心。
pert_zh: 学校持久性关闭造成的负面影响更为明显。因为学校是社会活动和人际交往的中心。
bt_pert_zh: The negative impact of prolonged school closures is even more pronounced because schools are centers of social activity and interpersonal interaction.

en: When schools are closed, many children and youth miss out of on social contact that is essential to learning and development.When schools close parents are often asked to facilitate the learning of children at home and can struggle to perform this task.
zh: 学校关闭后，许多儿童和青年都失去了社交的机会，这些机会对于他们的学习和发展都至关重要。学校关闭后，家长往往需要督促子女在家中学习，而这项任务十分艰巨，家长对此苦不堪言。
pert_zh: 学校关闭后，许多儿童和青年都失去了重要的社交机会，这些机会对于他们的学习和发展都至关重要。学校关闭后，家长往往需要督促子女在家中勤奋学习，而这项任务十分艰巨，家长对此苦不堪言。
