bt_pert_zh: With schools closed, many children and young people have lost important social opportunities that are essential for their learning and development. Parents are often overwhelmed by the difficult task of keeping their children busy at home.

en: This is especially true for parents with limited education and resources.
zh: 对受教育程度较低且资源有限的家长尤为如此。
pert_zh: 对受教育程度较低且极其资源有限的家长尤为如此。
bt_pert_zh: This is especially true for parents who are less educated and have extremely limited resources.

en: Potential impacts of school closures and reliance on distance learning are not addressed in federal acts of legislation at this time.
zh: 目前，联邦立法尚未关注学校关闭和依赖远程学习所产生的潜在影响。
pert_zh: 目前，联邦立法尚未关注学校关闭和十分依赖远程学习所产生的潜在影响。
bt_pert_zh: Currently, federal legislation has not addressed the potential impacts of school closures and heavy reliance on remote learning.

en: Formal education — as opposed to informal education or non-formal education — tends to refer to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.
zh: 与非正式教育或非正规教育相反，正规教育通常是指学校、学院、大学和培训机构。
pert_zh: 与非正式教育或非正规教育相反，严格的正规教育通常是指学校、学院、大学和培训机构。
bt_pert_zh: In contrast to informal or non-formal education, strict formal education usually refers to schools, colleges, universities and training institutions.

en: A 1974 report by the World Bank defined formal education as the following:Formal education: the hierarchically structured, chronologically graded ‘education system’, running from primary school through the university and including, in addition to general academic studies, a variety of specialised programmes and institutions for full-time technical and professional training.The majority of data collected on the number of students and learners impacted by COVID-19 has been calculated based on the closure of formal education systems.
zh: 世界银行在1974年发布的报告对正规教育的定义如下：正规教育：从小学到大学期间具备结构分层并逐渐升级的“教育系统”，除普遍学术学习外，还包括针对全日制技术和职业培训提供的各种专业课程和机构。针对受到COVID-19影响的学生和学习者人数，所收集到的大部分相关数据都基于已关闭的正规教育系统。
pert_zh: 世界银行在1974年发布的报告对正规教育的定义如下：正规教育：从小学到大学期间具备结构分层并逐渐升级的“强化教育系统”，除普遍学术学习外，还包括针对全日制技术和职业培训提供的各种专业课程和机构。针对受到COVID-19影响的学生和学习者人数，所收集到的大部分相关数据都基于已关闭的正规教育系统。
bt_pert_zh: The World Bank report published in 1974 defines formal education as follows: Formal education: A "reinforced education system" with a structured and progressive upgrade from primary school to university, including, in addition to general academic learning, a variety of specialized courses and institutions for full-time technical and vocational training. Most of the data collected on the number of students and learners affected by COVID-19 is based on formal education systems that have been closed.

en: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides figures on students impacted by COVID-19 corresponding to the number of learners enrolled at pre-primary, primary, lower-secondary, and upper-secondary levels of education [ISCED levels 0 to 3], as well as at tertiary education levels [ISCED levels 5 to 8].
zh: 联合国教科文组织统计研究所提供了受COVID-19影响的学生数据，该数据与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生人数相对应。
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织统计研究所提供了丰富的受COVID-19影响的学生数据，该数据与接受学前、小学、初中和高中教育[ISCED 0-3级]以及接受高等教育[ISCED 5-8级]的学生人数相对应。
bt_pert_zh: The UNESCO Institute for Statistics provides rich data on students affected by COVID-19, corresponding to the number of students in pre-primary, primary, lower secondary and upper secondary education [ISCED levels 0-3], and in higher education [ISCED levels 5-8].

en: Early childhood educational programmes are usually designed for children below the age of 3 and may refer to preschools, nursery schools, kindergartens, and some day care programmes.
zh: 幼儿教育课程通常是为3岁以下的儿童设计的，可指幼托机构、托儿所、幼儿园和一些日托课程。
pert_zh: 幼儿教育课程通常是为极小的3岁以下的儿童设计的，可指幼托机构、托儿所、幼儿园和一些日托课程。
bt_pert_zh: Early childhood education programs are usually designed for very young children under the age of 3 and can refer to childcare institutions, nurseries, kindergartens and some day care programs.

en: While many primary and secondary schools have closed around the world due to COVID-19, measures impacting early childhood educational programmes have varied.
zh: 受COVID-19影响，尽管全世界有许多中小学校相继关闭，但针对幼儿教育课程所采取的措施各不相同。
pert_zh: 受COVID-19影响，尽管全世界有许多中小学校相继关闭，但针对幼儿教育课程所采取的严格措施各不相同。
bt_pert_zh: Although many primary and secondary schools around the world have closed due to COVID-19, the strict measures taken for early childhood education programs vary.

en: In some countries and territories, preschools and day cares are considered necessary services and have not closed in tandem with broader school closure measures.In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth, and Families encouraged child care and early learning centres to stay open.
zh: 在一些国家和地区，幼托机构和日托机构被视为不可或缺的服务，所以并未随着各个学校普遍停课而关闭。在美国，华盛顿州儿童、青年和家庭部门鼓励继续开放儿童托管机构和早教中心。
pert_zh: 在一些国家和地区，幼托机构和日托机构被视为非常重要的不可或缺的服务，所以并未随着各个学校普遍停课而关闭。在美国，华盛顿州儿童、青年和家庭部门鼓励继续开放儿童托管机构和早教中心。
bt_pert_zh: In some countries and regions, childcare and daycare centers are considered very important and indispensable services, so they have not been closed along with the general closure of schools. In the United States, the Washington State Department of Children, Youth and Families encourages the continued opening of childcare centers and early childhood education centers.

en: Some school districts may offer alternative child care options, prioritising the children of first responders and healthcare workers.
zh: 一些学区可能会提供其他儿童托管方式，并优先接收急救人员和医护人员的子女。
pert_zh: 一些学区可能会提供额外的其他儿童托管方式，并优先接收急救人员和医护人员的子女。
bt_pert_zh: Some school districts may offer additional alternative child care options and prioritize the children of first responders and health care workers.

en: The governor of Maryland mandated that specific child care services remain open for the children of emergency personnel while Washington State and California have left it to the discretion of care providers.
zh: 马里兰州州长规定，特定的儿童托管服务仍向急救人员的子女开放，而华盛顿州和加利福尼亚州则将决定权交给托管机构负责人。
pert_zh: 马里兰州州长规定，特定的儿童托管服务仍向高风险急救人员的子女开放，而华盛顿州和加利福尼亚州则将决定权交给托管机构负责人。
bt_pert_zh: Maryland's governor has ruled that certain child care services remain open to children of high-risk first responders, while Washington state and California have left the decision up to the heads of child care facilities.

en: California Governor Gavin Newsom explained his state's position, saying “We need our child care facilities, our daycare centers, to operate to absorb the impact of these school closures.”
zh: 加利福尼亚州州长Gavin Newsom解释了其所在州的立场，他说：“我们需要继续开放儿童托管机构和日托中心，以降低学校关闭所造成的影响。”
pert_zh: 加利福尼亚州州长Gavin Newsom详细解释了其所在州的立场，他说：“我们需要继续全面开放儿童托管机构和日托中心，以降低学校关闭所造成的影响。”
bt_pert_zh: California Governor Gavin Newsom elaborated on his state's position, saying: "We need to continue to fully open child care and day care centers to mitigate the impact of school closures."

en: Colorado has encouraged the development of "tool kits" for parents to use at home to emulate the lessons children would have received in their early learning programmes.In Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe closed all schools throughout the country until April 8, however, children's daycare facilities were excluded.
zh: 科罗拉多州鼓励为家长开发“工具包”，让家长能够在家模拟子女在早期学习课程中要学习的课程。在日本，首相安倍晋三关闭了全国所有的学校，这一措施一直持续到4月8日，但儿童日托机构依然正常开放。
pert_zh: 科罗拉多州鼓励大力为家长开发“教育工具包”，让家长能够在家模拟子女在早期学习课程中要学习的课程。在日本，首相安倍晋三关闭了全国所有的学校，这一措施一直持续到4月8日，但儿童日托机构依然正常开放。
bt_pert_zh: Colorado is encouraging the development of "educational toolkits" for parents to simulate at home what their children will learn in early learning courses. In Japan, Prime Minister Shinzo Abe closed all schools in the country until April 8, but child daycare centers remain open.

en: In early March, five adults associated with a nursing facility for preschool children in Kobe tested positive for coronavirus.
zh: 3月初，神户一家学龄前儿童护理机构的5名成年人被检测出冠状病毒阳性。
pert_zh: 3月初，神户一家学龄前儿童护理机构的5名成年人被检测出高度冠状病毒阳性。
bt_pert_zh: In early March, five adults at a preschool care facility in Kobe tested highly positive for the coronavirus.

en: After testing over one hundred children at the facility, a preschool student was found to be carrying the virus.
zh: 对该机构100多名儿童进行检测后，发现一名学龄前儿童携带该病毒。
pert_zh: 对该机构数百名以上儿童进行检测后，发现一名学龄前儿童携带该病毒。
bt_pert_zh: After testing more than hundreds of children at the institution, a preschooler was found to be carrying the virus.

en: Primary or elementary education typically consists of the first four to seven years of formal education.
zh: 小学教育通常包含前4年至7年的正规教育。
pert_zh: 小学教育通常包含非常重要的前4年至7年的正规教育。
bt_pert_zh: Primary education usually comprises the first four to seven very important years of formal education.

en: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) canceled the examinations for its Diploma Programme and Career-related Programme candidates scheduled between 30 April and 22 May 2020, reportedly affecting more than 200,000 students worldwide.
zh: 国际文凭组织(IBO)取消了原定于2020年4月30日至2020年5月22日举行的文凭课程和与职业相关的课程考试，据报道，这一举措已影响到全球20多万名考生。
pert_zh: 国际文凭组织(IBO)取消了原定于2020年4月30日至2020年5月22日紧急举行的文凭课程和与职业相关的考试，据报道，这一举措已影响到全球20多万名考生。
bt_pert_zh: The International Baccalaureate Organization (IBO) has cancelled all diploma and career-related examinations scheduled for April 30, 2020 to May 22, 2020, a move that has reportedly affected more than 200,000 candidates worldwide.

en: The IBO stated that it would award candidates their diplomas or certificates based on "their coursework" and "the established assessment expertise, rigor, and quality control already built into the programme."
zh: IBO表示，它将根据“考生的课程作业”和“已完成的评估的测验结果、严格标准和已纳入课程的质量控制”向考生授予文凭或证书。
pert_zh: IBO表示，它将根据“考生的课程作业”和“已完成的评估的测验结果、严格标准、十分认真地和已纳入课程的质量控制”向考生授予文凭或证书。
bt_pert_zh: The IBO said it would award diplomas or certificates based on "candidates' coursework" and "the results of completed assessments, rigorous standards, and the careful quality controls that are built into the curriculum".

en: Tertiary education, also known as higher education, refers to the non-compulsory educational levels that follow completion of secondary school or high school.
zh: 高等教育是指在完成初中或高中学业后接受的非义务教育阶段的教育。
pert_zh: 高等教育是指在完成初中或高中学业后接受的严格的非义务教育阶段的教育。
bt_pert_zh: Higher education refers to the rigorous, non-compulsory stage of education received after completing junior high or high school.

en: Tertiary education is normally taken to include undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.
zh: 高等教育通常包括本科和研究生教育，职业教育和培训也包括在内。
pert_zh: 高等教育通常包括重要的本科和研究生教育，职业教育和培训也包括在内。
bt_pert_zh: Higher education typically includes significant undergraduate and postgraduate education, as well as vocational education and training.

en: Individuals who complete tertiary education generally receive certificates, diplomas, or academic degrees.
zh: 完成高等教育的个人通常会获得证书、文凭或学位。
pert_zh: 完成高等教育的个人通常会获得重要证书、文凭或学位。
bt_pert_zh: Individuals who complete higher education usually receive a significant certificate, diploma, or degree.

en: Undergraduate education is education conducted after secondary education and prior to post-graduate education, for which the learner is typically awarded a bachelor's degree.
zh: 本科教育是在中学教育完成后、研究生教育开始前接受的教育，完成本科教育的学生通常会获得学士学位。
pert_zh: 本科教育是在中学教育完成后、研究生教育开始前接受的重要教育，完成本科教育的学生通常会获得学士学位。
bt_pert_zh: Undergraduate education is an important education received after completing secondary education and before starting graduate education. Students who complete undergraduate education usually receive a bachelor's degree.

en: Students enrolled in higher education programmes at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often refereed to in countries such as United States as "college students."The closure of colleges and universities has widespread implications for students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.
zh: 在美国等一些国家/地区，在学院、大学和社区学院学习高等教育课程的学生通常被称为“大学生”。关闭学院和大学对学生、教员、管理人员和学校本身都造成了广泛影响。
pert_zh: 在美国等一些国家/地区，在学院、大学和社区学院学习高等教育课程的学生通常被称为“大学生”。突然关闭学院和大学对学生、教员、管理人员和学校本身都造成了广泛影响。
bt_pert_zh: In some countries, such as the United States, students who take higher education courses at colleges, universities, and community colleges are often referred to as “college students.” The sudden closure of colleges and universities has had widespread effects on students, faculty, administrators, and the institutions themselves.

en: Colleges and universities across the United States have been called upon to issue refunds to students for the cost of tuition and room and board.
zh: 民众呼吁美国各地的学院和大学退还学生的学费和食宿费。
pert_zh: 民众强烈呼吁美国各地的学院和大学退还学生的学费和食宿费。
bt_pert_zh: There have been strong calls for colleges and universities across the United States to refund students' tuition, room and board.

en: In the United States of America, Colleges and universities operate as "mini-cities" which generate significant revenue for cities, states, and regions.
zh: 在美国，学院和大学是作为“迷你城市”运作的，可为各城市、各州和各地区带来可观的收入。
pert_zh: 在美国，学院和大学是作为“迷你城市”运作的，可为各城市、各州和各地区带来相当可观的收入。
bt_pert_zh: In the United States, colleges and universities operate as "mini-cities" that generate considerable revenue for cities, states, and regions.

en: For example, Princeton University contributed $1.58 billion USD to the New Jersey economy and students spent about $60 million in off-campus spending.
zh: 例如，普林斯顿大学为新泽西州的经济贡献了15.8亿美元，学生在校外约消费6000万美元。
pert_zh: 例如，普林斯顿大学为新泽西州的巨大经济贡献了15.8亿美元，学生在校外约消费6000万美元。
bt_pert_zh: Princeton University, for example, contributes $1.58 billion to New Jersey's massive economy, and students spend an estimated $60 million off campus.

en: College and university closures have a domino effect on economies with far-reaching implications.According to Linda Bilmes of the Harvard Kennedy School, "local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses obtain a significant share of annual revenue from graduation week and college reunions...
zh: 关闭大学和学院对经济造成了连锁效应，影响深远。哈佛肯尼迪学院的Linda Bilmes表示，“在本地酒店、餐厅、咖啡馆、商店、汽车租赁机构和其他本地企业的年收入中，毕业周和大学聚会举办期间获得的收入占了相当大的比例...
pert_zh: 关闭大学和学院的突然关闭对经济造成了连锁效应，影响深远。哈佛肯尼迪学院的Linda Bilmes表示，“在本地酒店、餐厅、咖啡馆、商店、汽车租赁机构和其他本地企业的年收入中，毕业周和大学聚会举办期间获得的收入占了相当大的比例...
bt_pert_zh: The sudden closure of universities and colleges has had a knock-on effect on the economy, with far-reaching consequences. “Graduate week and college parties account for a significant portion of the annual revenues of local hotels, restaurants, cafes, shops, car rental agencies and other local businesses,” said Linda Bilmes of the Harvard Kennedy School.

en: these communities will suffer a lot of economic damage if the colleges remain closed at that time."Small towns which rely on college students to support the local economy and provide labour to local businesses are especially impacted by school closures and the exodus of students from campus.
zh: 到那时，如果高校继续关闭，这些社区将遭受巨大的经济损失。”对于依靠大学生来带动当地经济并向本地企业提供劳动力的小城镇，学校的关闭和大批学生的离校会给它们带来巨大影响。
pert_zh: 到那时，如果高校继续关闭，这些社区将遭受极大的经济损失。”对于依靠大学生来带动当地经济并向本地企业提供劳动力的小城镇，学校的关闭和大批学生的离校会给它们带来极大影响。
bt_pert_zh: If colleges and universities remain closed, these communities will suffer great economic losses.” For small towns that rely on college students to drive the local economy and provide labor to local businesses, the closure of schools and the exodus of large numbers of students will have a great impact on them.

en: In Ithaca, New York, Cornell University students spent at least $4 million a week in Tompkins county.
zh: 在纽约伊萨卡，康奈尔大学的学生每周在汤普金斯县至少消费400万美元。
pert_zh: 在纽约伊萨卡，康奈尔大学的学生每周在汤普金斯县至少狂热消费400万美元。
bt_pert_zh: In Ithaca, New York, Cornell University students spend at least $4 million a week in Tompkins County.

en: In the wake of Cornell's decision to keep students home following spring break and transition to virtual instruction, the Mayor of Ithaca called for "immediate and forceful federal action — we will see a horrific economic impact as a result of Cornell University closing."
zh: 在康奈尔大学决定让学生在春假过后继续呆在家中，并改为进行虚拟教学后，伊萨卡市长呼吁“立即采取强有力的联邦行动——关闭康奈尔大学会给我们的经济带来难以估量的影响。”
pert_zh: 在康奈尔大学决定让学生在春假过后继续呆在家中，并改为进行虚拟教学后，伊萨卡市长呼吁“立即采取极端强有力的联邦行动——关闭康奈尔大学会给我们的经济带来难以估量的影响。”
bt_pert_zh: After Cornell University decided to keep students home after spring break and switch to virtual instruction, the mayor of Ithaca called for "extremely strong and immediate federal action — closing Cornell would have untold consequences for our economy."

en: UNESCO is sharing 10 recommendations during this period:
zh: 联合国教科文组织在此期间分享了10项建议：
pert_zh: 联合国教科文组织在此期间分享了重要的10项建议：
bt_pert_zh: UNESCO shared 10 important recommendations during this period:

en: Examine the readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on the use high-technology and low-technology solutions based on the reliability of local power supplies, internet connectivity, and digital skills of teachers and students.
zh: 检查准备情况并选择最相关的工具：根据本地电力供应的可靠性、互联网连接状况以及师生的数字化技能，决定使用技术要求较高或技术要求较低的解决方案。
pert_zh: 检查准备情况并选择最相关的工具：根据本地电力供应的可靠性、互联网连接状况以及师生的数字化技能，决定使用技术要求较高或较低的解决方案。
bt_pert_zh: Check readiness and choose the most relevant tools: Decide on using more or less technologically demanding solutions, depending on the reliability of the local electricity supply, internet connectivity, and the digital skills of teachers and students.

en: This could range through integrated digital learning platforms, video lessons, MOOCs, to broadcasting through radios and TVs.
zh: 这包括集成的数字学习平台、视频课程、MOOC，或通过无线电和电视进行广播。
pert_zh: 这包括高度集成的数字学习平台、视频课程、MOOC，或通过无线电和电视进行广播。
bt_pert_zh: This includes highly integrated digital learning platforms, video courses, MOOCs, or broadcasts via radio and television.

en: Ensure inclusion of the distance learning programmes: Implement measures to ensure that students including those with disabilities or from low-income backgrounds have access to distance learning programmes, if only a limited number of them have access to digital devices.
zh: 确保包含远程学习课程：采取相应措施，确保让包括残障人士或来自低收入家庭的人士在内的所有学生都能接受远程学习课程，最好为有限的一部分人提供数字设备。
pert_zh: 确保包含深远的远程学习课程：采取相应措施，确保让包括残障人士或来自低收入家庭的人士在内的所有学生都能接受远程学习课程，最好为有限的一部分人提供数字设备。
bt_pert_zh: Ensure inclusive remote learning programs: Take steps to ensure that remote learning programs are accessible to all students, including those with disabilities or from low-income families, preferably by providing digital devices to a limited number of people.

en: Consider temporarily decentralising such devices from computer labs to families and support them with internet connectivity.
zh: 考虑暂时将这些设备从计算机实验室取出，并分配到各个家庭中，帮助他们建立网络连接。
pert_zh: 考虑临时暂时将这些设备从计算机实验室取出，并分配到各个家庭中，帮助他们建立网络连接。
bt_pert_zh: Consider temporarily removing these devices from computer labs and distributing them to individual homes to help them get connected.

en: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading data or educational resources to web spaces, as well as when sharing them with other organisations or individuals.
zh: 保护数据隐私和数据安全：将数据或教育资源上传到网络空间，以及将其与其他组织或个人分享时，对数据安全性进行评估。
pert_zh: 保护数据隐私和数据安全：将敏感数据或教育资源上传到网络空间，以及将其与其他组织或个人分享时，对数据安全性进行评估。
bt_pert_zh: Protect data privacy and data security: Assess data security when uploading sensitive data or educational resources to cyberspace and sharing them with other organizations or individuals.

en: Ensure that the use of applications and platforms does not violate students’ data privacy.
zh: 在使用应用程序和平台时，确保不会侵犯学生的数据隐私。
pert_zh: 在使用应用程序和平台时，请确保不会严重侵犯学生的数据隐私。
bt_pert_zh: When using apps and platforms, ensure that there is no significant breach of students’ data privacy.

en: Prioritize solutions to address psychosocial challenges before teaching: Mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers, and students with each other.
zh: 将心理问题解决方案的优先级排在教学方案之上：调动可用的工具，将学校、家长、教师和学生相互联系起来。
pert_zh: 将心理问题解决方案的优先级排在高效的教学方案之上：调动可用的工具，将学校、家长、教师和学生相互联系起来。
bt_pert_zh: Prioritize solutions to psychological problems over effective teaching programs: mobilize available tools to connect schools, parents, teachers and students.

en: Create communities to ensure regular human interactions, enable social caring measures, and address possible psychosocial challenges that students may face when they are isolated.
zh: 创建社区，以确保正常的人际交往、启用社会关怀措施，并解决学生在隔离时可能面临的心理问题。
pert_zh: 创建社区，以严格确保正常的人际交往、启用社会关怀措施，并解决学生在隔离时可能面临的心理问题。
bt_pert_zh: Create communities that strictly ensure normal interpersonal interactions, enable social care measures, and address the psychological problems students may face while in isolation.

en: Plan the study schedule of the distance learning programmes: Organise discussions with stakeholders to examine the possible duration of school closures and decide whether the distance learning programme should focus on teaching new knowledge or enhance students’ knowledge of prior lessons.
zh: 制定远程学习课程的学习时间表：与利益相关者进行讨论，以调查学校关闭的持续时间，并决定远程学习课程是应侧重于教授新知识，还是巩固学生在以前课程中学到的知识。
pert_zh: 制定远程学习课程的学习时间表：与利益相关者进行充分讨论，以调查学校关闭的持续时间，并决定远程学习课程是应侧重于教授新知识，还是巩固学生在以前课程中学到的知识。
bt_pert_zh: Develop a learning timeline for distance learning courses: Conduct thorough discussions with stakeholders to investigate the duration of school closures and decide whether distance learning courses should focus on teaching new knowledge or consolidating what students have learned in previous courses.

en: Plan the schedule depending on the situation of the affected zones, level of studies, needs of students needs, and availability of parents.
zh: 根据受影响地区的情况、学生学习水平、学生需求和家长空闲情况，制定时间表。
pert_zh: 根据受影响地区的情况、学生学习水平、学生需求、家长空闲情况，制定时间表。
bt_pert_zh: Make a schedule based on the situation in the affected areas, students’ learning levels, students’ needs, and parents’ availability.

en: Choose the appropriate learning methodologies based on the status of school closures and home-based quarantines.
zh: 根据学校关闭和居家隔离的状况，选择适当的学习方法。
pert_zh: 根据学校关闭和居家隔离的极端状况，选择适当的学习方法。
bt_pert_zh: Choose appropriate learning methods based on the extreme circumstances of school closures and home isolation.

en: Avoid learning methodologies that require face-to-face communication.
zh: 避免选择需要进行面对面交流的学习方法。
pert_zh: 避免选择不需要进行面对面交流的学习方法。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid learning methods that don’t require face-to-face interaction.

en: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: Organise brief training or orientation sessions for teachers and parents as well, if monitoring and facilitation are needed.
zh: 为教师和家长提供有关使用数字化工具的支持：如需进行监督和激励，则为他们安排简短的培训或指导会议。
pert_zh: 为教师和家长提供有关使用数字化工具的支持：如需进行监督和激励，则更为他们安排简短的培训或指导会议。
bt_pert_zh: Provide support to teachers and parents on the use of digital tools: arrange short training or guidance sessions for them if necessary for monitoring and motivation.

en: Help teachers to prepare the basic settings such as solutions to the use of internet data if they are required to provide live streaming of lessons.
zh: 帮助教师准备基本设置，例如，如果要求教师进行课程直播，则帮助他们准备解决方案以使用互联网数据。
pert_zh: 帮助教师准备基本设置，例如，如果要求教师进行高质量的课程直播，则帮助他们准备解决方案以使用互联网数据。
bt_pert_zh: Help teachers prepare basic setup, for example, if teachers are required to conduct high-quality live streaming of classes, help them prepare solutions to use internet data.

en: Blend appropriate approaches and limit the number of applications and platforms: Blend tools or media that are available for most students, both for synchronous communication and lessons, and for asynchronous learning.
zh: 结合使用多种适当的方法，并限制应用程序和平台的使用数量：结合使用对大多数学生可用的工具或媒体，用于同步通信、课程学习和异步学习。
pert_zh: 结合使用多种适当的方法，并限制应用程序和平台的使用数量：结合使用更多对大多数学生可用的工具或媒体，用于同步通信、课程学习和异步学习。
bt_pert_zh: Use a combination of appropriate methods and limit the number of applications and platforms used: Use a combination of more tools or media that are accessible to the majority of students for synchronous communication, coursework, and asynchronous learning.

en: Avoid overloading students and parents by asking them to download and test too many applications or platforms.
zh: 避免增加学生和家长的负担，例如，要求他们下载和测试过多的应用程序或平台。
pert_zh: 避免增加学生和家长的沉重负担，例如，要求他们下载和测试过多的应用程序或平台。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid placing heavy burdens on students and parents, for example, by requiring them to download and test too many apps or platforms.

en: Develop distance learning rules and monitor students’ learning process: Define the rules with parents and students on distance learning.
zh: 制定远程学习规则并监督学生的学习进度：与家长和学生一起制定远程学习规则。
pert_zh: 制定严格的远程学习规则并监督学生的学习进度：与家长和学生一起制定远程学习规则。
bt_pert_zh: Set strict rules for distance learning and monitor student progress: Work with parents and students to set rules for distance learning.

en: Design formative questions, tests, or exercises to monitor closely students’ learning process.
zh: 设计格式化的问题、测试或练习，以密切监督学生的学习进度。
pert_zh: 设计严格格式化的问题、测试或练习，以密切监督学生的学习进度。
bt_pert_zh: Design strictly formatted questions, tests, or exercises to closely monitor student progress.

en: Try to use tools to support submission of students’ feedback and avoid overloading parents by requesting them to scan and send students’ feedback
zh: 尝试利用工具来支持学生提交作业，避免给家长带来过重负担，例如，要求他们扫描和发送学生作业
pert_zh: 尝试利用工具来支持学生提交作业，避免给家长带来过重负担，例如，要求他们扫描和轻松发送学生作业。
bt_pert_zh: Try to use tools to support students in submitting assignments and avoid placing an undue burden on parents, for example, requiring them to scan and easily send student assignments.

en: Define the duration of distance learning units based on students’ self-regulation skills: Keep a coherent timing according to the level of the students’ self-regulation and metacognitive abilities especially for livestreaming classes.
zh: 根据学生的自我管理能力，制定远程学习单元的持续时间：根据学生的自我管理能力和元认知能力，保持连贯的时间安排，这一点在直播课程中尤为重要。
pert_zh: 根据学生的自我管理能力，制定远程学习单元的持续时间：根据学生的自我管理能力和高效的元认知能力，保持连贯的时间安排，这一点在直播课程中尤为重要。
bt_pert_zh: Plan the duration of remote learning units based on students’ self-management abilities: Maintaining a coherent schedule based on students’ self-management abilities and efficient metacognitive abilities is especially important in live courses.

en: Preferably, the unit for primary school students should not be more than 20 minutes, and no longer than 40 minutes for secondary school students.
zh: 小学生的学习单元最好不要超过20分钟，中学生的学习单元最好不要超过40分钟。
pert_zh: 小学生的学习单元最好不要过长超过20分钟，中学生的学习单元最好不要超过40分钟。
bt_pert_zh: A study unit for primary school students should not be longer than 20 minutes, and a study unit for secondary school students should not be longer than 40 minutes.

en: Create communities and enhance connection: Create communities of teachers, parents, and school managers to address sense of loneliness or helplessness, facilitate sharing of experience and discussion on coping strategies when facing learning difficulties.
zh: 创建社区并加强联系：创建由教师、家长和学校管理者组成的社区，以应对孤独感或无助感，鼓励大家就面对学习困境时的应对策略分享经验并开展讨论。
pert_zh: 创建社区并加强联系：创建由教师、家长和学校管理者组成的紧密社区，以应对孤独感或无助感，鼓励大家就面对学习困境时的应对策略分享经验并开展讨论。
bt_pert_zh: Create community and strengthen connections: Create a close-knit community of teachers, parents, and school administrators to combat feelings of isolation or helplessness, and encourage sharing of experiences and discussion of coping strategies when faced with learning challenges.

en: 290 million students out of school due to COVID-19: UNESCO releases first global numbers and mobilizes response,   UNESCO.
zh: 2.9亿学生因COVID-19而离开学校：联合国教科文组织公布了第一批全球数字并呼吁作出回应，联合国教科文组织。
pert_zh: 2.9亿学生因COVID-19而突然离开学校：联合国教科文组织公布了第一批全球数字并呼吁作出回应，联合国教科文组织。
bt_pert_zh: 290 million students suddenly out of school due to COVID-19: UNESCO publishes first global figures and calls for a response, UNESCO.

en: WHEREAS on March 4, 2020, I proclaimed a State of Emergency to exist in California as a result of the threat of COVID-19;
zh: 鉴于COVID-19带来的威胁，本人曾于2020年3月4日宣布加利福尼亚进入紧急状态；
pert_zh: 鉴于COVID-19带来的严重威胁，本人曾于2020年3月4日宣布加利福尼亚进入紧急状态；
bt_pert_zh: Due to the serious threat posed by COVID-19, I declared a state of emergency for California on March 4, 2020;

en: and WHEREAS in a short period of time, COVID-19 has rapidly spread throughout California, necessitating updated and more stringent guidance from federal, state, and local public health officials;
zh: 鉴于短期内COVID-19在整个加利福尼亚的快速扩散，联邦、州以及当地公共卫生部门官员需要提供更新且更严格的指导；
pert_zh: 鉴于疫情爆发后短期内COVID-19在整个加利福尼亚的快速扩散，联邦、州以及当地公共卫生部门官员需要提供更新且更严格的指导；
bt_pert_zh: Given the rapid spread of COVID-19 throughout California in the short period following the outbreak, federal, state, and local public health officials need to provide updated and more stringent guidance;

en: and WHEREAS for the preservation of public health and safety throughout the entire State of California, I find it necessary for all Californians to heed the State public health directives from the Department of Public Health.
zh: 另外，为保护整个加利福尼亚州的公共健康和安全，我认为全体加利福尼亚居民需遵从公共卫生部发布的州级公共卫生指令。
pert_zh: 另外，为了保护整个加利福尼亚州的公共健康和安全，我认为全体加利福尼亚居民需认真遵从公共卫生部发布的州级公共卫生指令。
bt_pert_zh: Additionally, to protect the public health and safety of the entire state of California, I believe that all Californians must carefully follow the state public health orders issued by the Department of Public Health.

en: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, in accordance with the authority vested in me by the State Constitution and statutes of the State of California, and in particular, Government Code sections 8567, 8627, and 8665 do hereby issue the following Order to become effective immediately:
zh: 为此，本人，系加利福尼亚州州长GAVIN NEWSOM，依据州宪法、加利福尼亚州法规，特别是政府法规第8567、8627和8665条赋予我的权力，特此颁布以下命令，即刻生效：
pert_zh: 为此，本人，系加利福尼亚州州长GAVIN NEWSOM，依据州宪法、加利福尼亚州法规，特别是严格执行政府法规第8567、8627和8665条赋予我的权力，特此颁布以下命令，即刻生效：
bt_pert_zh: NOW, THEREFORE, I, GAVIN NEWSOM, Governor of the State of California, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the State Constitution, the California Statutes, and specifically in strict execution of Government Code Sections 8567, 8627, and 8665, do hereby issue this Order, effective immediately:

en: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT:
zh: 特此命令：
pert_zh: 特此严令命令：
bt_pert_zh: Hereby strictly order:

en: 1) To preserve the public health and safety, and to ensure the healthcare delivery system is capable of serving all, and prioritizing those at the highest risk and vulnerability, all residents are directed to immediately heed the current State public health directives, which I ordered the Department of Public Health to develop for the current statewide status of COVID-19.
zh: 1) 为保护公众健康和安全，确保卫生保健实施系统能够服务大众并优先治疗危重体弱病人，所有居民应即刻遵从当前的州级公共卫生指令，这是我命令公共卫生部针对目前全州COVID-19的状况制定的。
pert_zh: 为保护公众健康和安全，确保卫生保健实施系统能够服务大众并优先治疗危重体弱病人，所有居民应立即即刻遵从当前的州级公共卫生指令，这是我命令公共卫生部针对目前全州COVID-19的状况制定的。
bt_pert_zh: To protect public health and safety and ensure that the health care delivery system is able to serve the public and prioritize care for the most vulnerable patients, all residents should immediately follow the current state public health directives that I have directed the Department of Public Health to establish in response to the current COVID-19 situation throughout the state.

en: Those directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020, Memorandum on Identification of Essential Critical Infrastructure Workers During COVID-19 Response, found at: https://covid19.ca.gov/.
zh: 这些指令与2020年3月19日发表的《关于在应对COVID-19疫情期间识别关键基础设施工作人员的备忘录》（请参阅：https://covid19.ca.gov/）一致。
pert_zh: 这些指令与2020年3月19日发表的《关于在应对COVID-19疫情期间识别非常关键基础设施工作人员的备忘录》（请参阅：https://covid19.ca.gov/）一致。
bt_pert_zh: These directives are consistent with the March 19, 2020 Memorandum on Identifying Critical Infrastructure Workers During the COVID-19 Response (see: https://covid19.ca.gov/).

en: ORDER OF THE STATE PUBLIC HEALTH OFFICER
zh: 州公共卫生官员下达的命令
pert_zh: 州公共卫生官员明确下达的命令
bt_pert_zh: Clear orders from state public health officials

en: To protect public health, I as State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health order all individuals living in the State of California to stay home or at their place of residence except as needed to maintain continuity of operations of the federal critical infrastructure sectors, as outlined at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors.
zh: 为保护公众健康，作为州公共卫生官员兼加利福尼亚州公共卫生部主任，我在此下令，除需要满足联邦关键基础设施部门持续运作的人（如https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors所述）之外，所有居住在加利福尼亚州的人都应留在家中或居住场所。
pert_zh: 为保护公众健康，作为州公共卫生官员兼加利福尼亚州公共卫生部主任，我在此下令，除必要需要满足联邦关键基础设施部门持续运作的人（如https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors所述）之外，所有居住在加利福尼亚州的人都应留在家中或居住场所。
bt_pert_zh: To protect the public health, as the State Public Health Officer and Director of the California Department of Public Health, I hereby order that all persons residing in the State of California, except those essential to the continued operation of the federal critical infrastructure sectors (as described at https://www.cisa.gov/critical-infrastructure-sectors), remain in their homes or places of residence.

en: In addition, and in consultation with the Director of the Governor's Office of Emergency Services, I may designate additional sectors as critical in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.
zh: 此外，经与州长紧急服务办公室主任协商，为保护所有加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉，我可以指派其他部门作为关键部门。
pert_zh: 此外，经与州长紧急服务办公室主任充分协商，为保护所有加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉，我可以指派其他部门作为关键部门。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, in full consultation with the Director of the Governor’s Office of Emergency Services, I may designate other departments as critical departments in order to protect the health and well-being of all Californians.

en: Pursuant to the authority under the Health and Safety Code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175 and 120150, this order is to go into effect immediately and shall stay in effect until further notice.
bt_pert_zh: This emergency order is effective immediately and will remain in effect until further notice, pursuant to authority provided by Health and Safety Code 120125, 120140, 131080, 120130(c), 120135, 120145, 120175, and 120150.

en: The federal government has identified 16 critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, are considered so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof.
zh: 联邦政府确定了16个关键基础设施部门，这些部门的资产、体系和网络，无论是实体的还是虚拟的，都被认为对美国至关重要，若其陷入瘫痪或遭到破坏，将对安全、经济安全、公众健康或安全领域（或同时对其中多个领域）带来负面影响。
pert_zh: 联邦政府确定了16个重要的关键基础设施部门，这些部门的资产、体系和网络，无论是实体的还是虚拟的，都被认为对美国至关重要，若其陷入瘫痪或遭到破坏，将对安全、经济安全、公众健康或安全领域（或同时对其中多个领域）带来负面影响。
bt_pert_zh: The federal government has identified 16 important critical infrastructure sectors whose assets, systems, and networks, both physical and virtual, are considered vital to the United States and whose failure or destruction would have a negative impact on security, economic security, public health or safety (or a combination of these).

en: I order that Californians working in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue their work because of the importance of these sectors to Californians' health and well-being.
zh: 我命令，在这16个关键基础设施部门工作的加利福尼亚居民可以继续工作，因为这些部门对于实现加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉具有重要意义。
pert_zh: 我命令，在这16个关键基础设施部门工作的加利福尼亚居民可以继续全力工作，因为这些部门对于实现加利福尼亚居民的健康和福祉具有重要意义。
bt_pert_zh: I am ordering that Californians employed in these 16 critical infrastructure sectors may continue to work at full capacity because these sectors are essential to the health and well-being of Californians.

en: This Order is being issued to protect the public health of Californians.
zh: 发布本命令是为了保护加利福尼亚居民的公众健康。
pert_zh: 发布本命令是为了更好地保护加利福尼亚居民的公众健康。
bt_pert_zh: This Order is issued to better protect the public health of California residents.

en: The California Department of Public Health looks to establish consistency across the state in order to ensure that we mitigate the impact of COVID-19.
zh: 加利福尼亚州公共卫生部希望在全州实现协调一致，确保我们可以缓解COVID-19的影响。
pert_zh: 加利福尼亚州公共卫生部希望在全州实现更好的协调一致，确保我们可以缓解COVID-19的影响。
bt_pert_zh: The California Department of Public Health wants to achieve better coordination across the state to ensure we can mitigate the impacts of COVID-19.

en: Our goal is simple, we want to bend the curve, and disrupt the spread of the virus.
zh: 我们的目标很简单，即要让疫情曲线变平缓，阻止病毒的扩散。
pert_zh: 我们的目标很明确，即要让疫情曲线变得更平缓，阻止病毒的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: Our goal is clear: to flatten the epidemic curve and stop the spread of the virus.

en: The supply chain must continue, and Californians must have access to such necessities as food, prescriptions, and health care.
zh: 必须保证供应链的持续运作，保证加利福尼亚居民可以获得食物、处方药和卫生保健服务等必需品。
pert_zh: 必须保证供应链的持续运作，确保加利福尼亚居民可以获得充足的食物、处方药和卫生保健服务等必需品。
bt_pert_zh: Supply chains must continue to function to ensure Californians have access to essential goods, such as food, prescription drugs, and health care services.

en: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the functions above, or to otherwise facilitate authorized necessary activities, they should at all times practice social distancing.
zh: 当人们需要离开家或居住场所时，无论是为了获得或执行以上活动，还是为了通过其他方式完成经授权的必要活动，都应该始终保持社交距离。
pert_zh: 当人们需要离开家或居住场所时，无论是为了获得或执行以上活动，还是为了通过其他方式完全完成经授权的必要活动，都应该始终保持社交距离。
bt_pert_zh: When people need to leave their homes or places of residence, whether to obtain or perform the activities listed above, or to fully complete authorized essential activities by other means, social distancing should be maintained at all times.

en: 2) The healthcare delivery system shall prioritize services to serving those who are the sickest and shall prioritize resources, including personal protective equipment, for the providers providing direct care to them.
zh: 2) 卫生保健实施系统应优先治疗病情最严重的患者，并优先向直接为这些患者提供护理的医护人员提供资源，包括个人防护设备。
pert_zh: 卫生保健实施系统应优先治疗病情异常严重的患者，并优先向直接为这些患者提供护理的医护人员提供资源，包括个人防护设备。
bt_pert_zh: Health care delivery systems should prioritize treatment of patients with particularly severe illness and prioritize the provision of resources, including personal protective equipment, to health care workers providing direct care to these patients.

en: 3) The Office of Emergency Services is directed to take necessary steps to ensure compliance with this Order.
zh: 3) 紧急服务办公室有权采取必要措施，确保对本命令的遵从。
pert_zh: 3) 紧急服务办公室有权采取严厉必要措施，确保对本命令的遵从。
bt_pert_zh: 3) The Office of Emergency Services shall be authorized to take such drastic measures as may be necessary to ensure compliance with this Order.

en: 4) This Order shall be enforceable pursuant to California law, including, but not limited to, Government Code section 8665.
zh: 4) 本命令应根据加利福尼亚法律强制执行，包括但不限于政府法规第8665条。
pert_zh: 4) 本命令应根据加利福尼亚法律强制执行，包括但不限于严格执行政府法规第8665条。
bt_pert_zh: 4) This Order shall be enforceable pursuant to California law, including, but not limited to, strict enforcement of Government Code Section 8665.

en: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that as soon as hereafter possible, this Order be filed in the Office of the Secretary of State and that widespread publicity and notice be given of this Order.
zh: 此外，我命令，尽快将本命令在州务卿办公室备案，并进行广泛宣传和公告。
pert_zh: 此外，我坚决命令，尽快将本命令在州务卿办公室备案，并进行广泛宣传和公告。
bt_pert_zh: Furthermore, I firmly order that this order be filed in the office of the Secretary of State as soon as possible and be widely publicized and published.

en: This Order is not intended to, and does not, create any rights or benefits, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity, against the State of California, its agencies, departments, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.
zh: 本命令无意也不会针对加利福尼亚州、其各机构、部门、实体、官员、雇员或任何其他人创设任何实质性或程序性、可依普通法或衡平法强制执行的任何权利或权益。
pert_zh: 本命令无意也不会针对加利福尼亚州、其各机构、部门、实体、官员、雇员或任何其他人创设任何显著实质性或程序性、可依普通法或衡平法强制执行的任何权利或权益。
bt_pert_zh: This Order is not intended to, and does not, create any right or benefit, substantive or procedural, enforceable at law or in equity against the State of California, its agencies, instrumentalities, entities, officers, employees, or any other person.

en: IN WITNESS WHEREOF I have hereunto set my hand and caused the Great Seal of the State of California to be affixed this 19th day of March 2020.
zh: 为昭信守，我谨于2020年3月19日签署本命令并加盖加利福尼亚州大印。
pert_zh: 为昭信守，我谨于2020年3月19日郑重签署本命令并加盖加利福尼亚州大印。
bt_pert_zh: IN WHEREOF, I have solemnly signed this Order and affixed the Great Seal of the State of California this nineteenth day of March, two thousand two hundred and twenty.

en: The SARS-CoV-2 virus is the cause of COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), a contagious respiratory disease that was first identified in December 2019, in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
zh: COVID-19（2019 冠状病毒病）由 SARS-CoV-2 病毒引起，是一种传染性呼吸道疾病，2019 年 12 月首先在中国湖北武汉得到确认。
pert_zh: COVID-19（2019 冠状病毒病）由 SARS-CoV-2 病毒引起，是一种高传染性呼吸道疾病，2019 年 12 月首先在中国湖北武汉得到确认。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 (coronavirus disease 2019), caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, is a highly contagious respiratory illness first identified in December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.

en: The disease is a type of coronavirus, the same family that includes SARS, MERS, and some varieties of the common cold.
zh: 这是一种冠状病毒，同族病毒还有 SARS、MERS 和一些普通感冒变种。
pert_zh: 这是一种非常传染的冠状病毒，同族病毒还有 SARS、MERS 和一些普通感冒变种。
bt_pert_zh: This is a very contagious coronavirus, a family that also includes SARS, MERS, and some common cold variants.

en: It was declared a pandemic by the World Health Organization (WHO) on 11 March 2020.
zh: 2020 年 3 月 11 日，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 宣布该病为大流行病。
pert_zh: 2020 年 3 月 11 日，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 宣布该病为严重大流行病。
bt_pert_zh: On March 11, 2020, the World Health Organization (WTO) declared the disease a severe pandemic.

en: While much about COVID-19 is still unknown, preliminary data suggests that it is more virulent and contagious than the seasonal flu, and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.
zh: 尽管关于 COVID-19 我们还有很多未知的地方，但初步数据表明，该病毒比季节性流感的毒性和传染性更强，毒性弱于 SARS 和 MERS 但传染性更强。
pert_zh: 尽管关于 COVID-19 我们还有很多未知的地方，但初步数据表明，该病毒比季节性流感的毒性和传染性更强，毒性更轻微，但传染性更强于 SARS 和 MERS。
bt_pert_zh: While there is still much we don’t know about COVID-19, preliminary data suggest the virus is more virulent and contagious than seasonal influenza and less virulent but more contagious than SARS and MERS.

en: Older people and those with underlying conditions are the most at risk of serious complications including death.
zh: 老年人以及患有基础性疾病的患者更容易出现严重的并发症，死亡率也更高。
pert_zh: 老年人以及患有严重基础性疾病的患者更容易出现严重的并发症，死亡率也更高。
bt_pert_zh: The elderly and patients with serious underlying diseases are more likely to develop serious complications and have a higher mortality rate.

en: Due to the spread of the disease, you are advised not to travel unless necessary, to avoid being infected, quarantined, or stranded by changing restrictions and cancelled flights.
zh: 因疾病还在传播，所以建议你除非必要不要出行，以避免被感染、被隔离，或因限制调整或航班取消而滞留。
pert_zh: 因疾病还在持续传播，所以建议你除非必要不要出行，以避免被感染、被隔离，或因限制调整或航班取消而滞留。
bt_pert_zh: As the disease continues to spread, we recommend that you avoid non-essential travel to avoid being infected, being quarantined, or being stranded due to restrictions or flight cancellations.

en: Avoid crowded places whenever possible.
zh: 尽可能避免去人多的地方。
pert_zh: 尽可能避免去非常人多的地方。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid going to crowded places as much as possible.

en: This is not just to protect you, but also those you come in contact with.
zh: 这不仅是为了保护你，也是为了保护接触你的人。
pert_zh: 这不仅是为了极大保护你，也是为了保护接触你的人。
bt_pert_zh: This is not only to greatly protect you, but also to protect those who come into contact with you.

en: As it happens, you probably aren't missing much by staying home, as many attractions around the world are closing their doors to avoid spreading the disease.
zh: 事实上你可能也无处可去，为了避免病毒扩散，全球很多景点都已关闭。
pert_zh: 事实上你可能也无处可去，为了避免病毒扩散，全球很多繁忙的景点都已关闭。
bt_pert_zh: In fact, you may have nowhere to go, as many busy tourist attractions around the world have been closed to prevent the spread of the virus.

en: If you do need to travel, take precautions as you would for other infections: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.
zh: 如果确实需要出行，请像对待其他传染病一样采取预防措施：勤洗手、避免触摸脸部、咳嗽和打喷嚏时用肘部或纸巾捂住口鼻以及避免接触患者。
pert_zh: 如果确实需要出行，请像对待其他传染病一样采取严格的预防措施：勤洗手、避免触摸脸部、咳嗽和打喷嚏时用肘部或纸巾捂住口鼻以及避免接触患者。
bt_pert_zh: If you do need to travel, take strict precautions as you would for any other infectious disease: wash your hands frequently, avoid touching your face, cover your coughs and sneezes with your elbow or a tissue, and avoid contact with sick people.

en: Before traveling, read up on the extensive and fast-changing array of travel restrictions that have been imposed around the world.
zh: 出行前，建议先了解一下全球各地广泛施行且频繁变更的出行限制。
pert_zh: 出行前，建议先了解一下全球各地极其广泛施行且频繁变更的出行限制。
bt_pert_zh: Before traveling, it is recommended to first understand the extremely widespread and frequently changing travel restrictions around the world.

en: After travel, monitor your health and consider self-isolation for two weeks to avoid transmitting the disease to others.
zh: 出行回来后，要注意监测自己的健康状况，并考虑自我隔离两周，以避免将疾病传染给他人。
pert_zh: 出行回来后，要密切注意监测自己的健康状况，并考虑自我隔离两周，以严格避免将疾病传染给他人。
bt_pert_zh: After returning from a trip, you should closely monitor your health and consider self-isolating for two weeks to strictly avoid spreading the disease to others.

en: Transportation from long-distance passenger flights to local buses has been curtailed or completely shut down in many countries due to low demand or government orders.
zh: 在很多国家，受需求低或政府指令的影响，从长途客运航班到当地公共汽车的公交运输已被削减或完全停运。
pert_zh: 在很多国家，受需求低或政府指令的极大影响，从长途客运航班到当地公共汽车的公交运输已被削减或完全停运。
bt_pert_zh: In many countries, public transport, from long-distance passenger flights to local buses, has been cut back or stopped entirely due to low demand or government directives.

en: Many international and regional borders are closed.
zh: 很多国际和区域边境被关闭。
pert_zh: 很多国际和区域边境被彻底关闭。
bt_pert_zh: Many international and regional borders were completely closed.

en: If you are away from home, and especially if you are in another country, consider returning home as soon as possible; this may get even more difficult as restrictions continue to change.
zh: 如果你已经离家，尤其是到了其他国家，请考虑尽快回家；随着限制措施不断变化，后面再回家将越来越困难。
pert_zh: 如果你已经离家，尤其是到了其他国家，请考虑尽快紧急回家；随着限制措施不断变化，后面再回家将越来越困难。
bt_pert_zh: If you have already left home, especially to another country, please consider returning home urgently as soon as possible; as restrictions continue to change, it will become increasingly difficult to return home later.

en: In some cases it may simply not be possible, even if you're healthy and meet the legal requirements for entry.
zh: 某些情况下甚至完全无法回家，即使是身体健康且符合入境法律要求的情况下。
pert_zh: 某些情况下甚至完全无法回家，即使是身体健康且符合入境法律要求的极端情况下。
bt_pert_zh: In some cases, it may be impossible to return home at all, even in extreme cases where one is in good health and meets the legal requirements for entry.

en: If you can't find a way back to your country, contact your nearest embassy or consulate for assistance.
zh: 如果你回国无门，请向最近的大使馆或领事馆寻求帮助。
pert_zh: 如果你回国无门，请向最近的大使馆或领事馆迅速寻求帮助。
bt_pert_zh: If you have no way to return home, please seek help quickly from the nearest embassy or consulate.

en: They may be able to organize an evacuation, identify non-regularly scheduled flights, or give you an emergency loan to pay for transport.
zh: 他们也许会组织撤离，确定不定期航班，或者为你提供紧急贷款以支付交通费用。
pert_zh: 他们也许会紧急组织撤离，确定不定期航班，或者为你提供紧急贷款以支付交通费用。
bt_pert_zh: They may be able to organise an emergency evacuation, secure unscheduled flights, or provide you with an emergency loan to cover transportation costs.

en: In case they can't, make preparations in case you need to stay where you are for an extended period.
zh: 如果他们也没有办法帮你回国，请做好长期停留在现居地的准备。
pert_zh: 如果他们也没有办法全力帮你回国，请做好长期停留在现居地的准备。
bt_pert_zh: If they are unable to fully assist you in returning to your country, please be prepared to stay in your current place of residence for a long time.

en: If you do find a way back home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and have unusual restrictions (such as no checked baggage).
zh: 如果你找到了回家的办法，也请做好准备，回家成本可能很高，可能非常不便，还可能受到不同寻常的限制（比如无法托运行李）。
pert_zh: 如果你找到了回家的办法，也请做好准备，回家成本可能很高，可能非常不便，还可能受到相当不同寻常的限制（比如无法托运行李）。
bt_pert_zh: If you find a way to get home, be prepared that it may be expensive, inconvenient, and subject to some pretty unusual restrictions (such as not being able to check luggage).

en: As of early April 2020, the number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 is approaching one million.
zh: 截至 2020 年 4 月初，COVID-19 确诊病例已接近 100 万。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 4 月初，COVID-19 严重确诊病例已接近 100 万。
bt_pert_zh: As of early April 2020, the number of confirmed severe cases of COVID-19 was approaching 1 million.

en: Though the disease started in mainland China, it has spread around the world and China has fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several other countries.
zh: 尽管该病起源于中国大陆，但已扩散到世界各地，中国确诊病例和死亡病例反而少于几个国家。
pert_zh: 尽管该病起源于中国大陆，但已迅速扩散到世界各地，中国确诊病例和死亡病例反而明显少于几个国家。
bt_pert_zh: Although the disease originated in mainland China, it has spread rapidly around the world, with China having significantly fewer confirmed cases and deaths than several countries.

en: Europe is the new epicenter of the pandemic.
zh: 欧洲已成为此次疫情的新中心。
pert_zh: 欧洲已成为此次疫情的严重新中心。
bt_pert_zh: Europe has become a serious new epicenter of the outbreak.

en: All but a handful of countries have reported at least one case, with the highest numbers of reported cases in the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, France, mainland China, Iran, and the United Kingdom.
zh: 除少数国家外，全球大部分国家均报告出现确诊病例，其中报告病例最多的国家有美国、西班牙、意大利、德国、法国、中国大陆、伊朗和英国。
pert_zh: 除非极少数国家外，全球大部分国家均报告出现确诊病例，其中报告病例最多的国家有美国、西班牙、意大利、德国、法国、中国大陆、伊朗和英国。
bt_pert_zh: Except for very few countries, most countries in the world have reported confirmed cases, among which the countries with the most reported cases are the United States, Spain, Italy, Germany, France, mainland China, Iran and the United Kingdom.

en: Local transmission is established in many countries in all major inhabited regions of the world except some Pacific island nations.
zh: 除一些太平洋岛国外，许多国家在所有主要人居地区均确认区域传播现象。
pert_zh: 除一些太平洋岛国外，许多国家在所有主要人居地区都确认区域传播现象。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries have confirmed regional transmission in all major inhabited areas, with the exception of some Pacific island countries.

en: (See updates from the WHO.)
zh: （详见 WHO 更新内容。）
pert_zh: （详见 WHO 紧急 更新内容。）
bt_pert_zh: (See WHO emergency update for details.)

en: The full extent of the spread is uncertain, due in part to limited testing.
zh: 全部传播范围还尚未确定，部分原因在于检测能力有限。
pert_zh: 全部传播范围还尚未确定，部分原因在于检测能力有限。谨慎。
bt_pert_zh: The full extent of the spread has not yet been determined, in part because testing capacity is limited. Be cautious.

en: Many countries are experiencing a severe shortage of test kits, and the authorities have not been able to test everybody who is at high risk, so the real number of cases is probably much higher than the official one.
zh: 很多国家都面临着检测工具严重短缺的问题，公共卫生机构也无法对所有高风险人群进行检测，因此实际病例数可能远远高于官方数据。
pert_zh: 很多国家都面临着检测工具极其严重短缺的问题，公共卫生机构也无法对所有高风险人群进行检测，因此实际病例数可能远远高于官方数据。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries are facing an extremely serious shortage of testing tools, and public health agencies are unable to test all high-risk groups, so the actual number of cases may be much higher than the official data.

en: Countries also differ in their testing and reporting practices, so comparisons of the number of reported cases do not tell the full story of how the epidemic has progressed in different areas.
zh: 各国采用的检测与报告方式也有所不同，因此仅仅比较病例数量并不能说明疫情在不同地区的传播程度。
pert_zh: 各国采用的检测与报告方式也有所不同，因此仅仅比较极少病例数量并不能说明疫情在不同地区的传播程度。
bt_pert_zh: Countries also use different testing and reporting methods, so simply comparing very small numbers of cases cannot tell the extent of the epidemic in different regions.

en: The virus is transmitted through respiratory droplets and through objects.
zh: 该病毒通过呼吸道飞沫和物体传播。
pert_zh: 该病毒通过严重的呼吸道飞沫和物体传播。
bt_pert_zh: The virus is spread through severe respiratory droplets and objects.

en: The coronavirus is a relatively large virus, meaning it is not truly airborne: it will settle down in respiratory droplets.
zh: 这种冠状病毒相对较大，因此并不会真正通过空气传播，而是附着在呼吸道飞沫中传播。
pert_zh: 这种较大的冠状病毒相对较大，因此并不会真正通过空气传播，而是附着在呼吸道飞沫中传播。
bt_pert_zh: This larger coronavirus is relatively large, so it doesn't really spread through the air, but rather it spreads in respiratory droplets.

en: Staying two metres (six feet) away from other people is usually enough to prevent transmission through this route.
zh: 人与人之间保持 2 米（6 英尺）距离通常就足以阻断这条传播路径。
pert_zh: 人与人之间保持更多 2 米（6 英尺）距离通常就足以阻断这条传播路径。
bt_pert_zh: Maintaining more than 2 meters (6 feet) of distance between people is usually enough to interrupt this transmission route.

en: Transmission from objects can happen, for example, if someone sneezes, touches a doorknob, and then other people touch the doorknob and then touch their faces.
zh: 如果有人打了喷嚏，又摸了门把手，随后其他人也摸了该门把手，然后又摸了自己的脸，则可能发生物体传播。
pert_zh: 如果有人突然打了喷嚏，又摸了门把手，随后其他人也摸了该门把手，然后又摸了自己的脸，则可能发生物体传播。
bt_pert_zh: Object-to-object transmission could occur if someone sneezes and touches a doorknob, and then someone else touches the doorknob and then touches their face.

en: The SARS-CoV-2 virus may last on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.
zh: SARS-CoV-2 病毒在纸板上最长可存活 24 小时，在塑料上最长可存活 3 天。
pert_zh: SARS-CoV-2 病毒在纸板上最长可存活 长达 24 小时，在塑料上最长可存活 3 天。
bt_pert_zh: The SARS-CoV-2 virus can survive on cardboard for up to 24 hours and on plastic for up to 3 days.

en: Transmission via the fecal–oral route may also be possible.
zh: 除此之外，还可能通过粪口传播。
pert_zh: 除此之外，还可能通过高风险的粪口传播。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, it may be transmitted through high-risk fecal-oral route.

en: Evidence suggests that COVID-19 is contagious even without symptoms, though to what extent is still being investigated.
zh: 有证据表明 COVID-19 患者即使无症状也具有传染性，其传染程度仍在调查中。
pert_zh: 有证据表明 COVID-19 患者即使无症状也具有极高传染性，其传染程度仍在调查中。
bt_pert_zh: There is evidence that people with COVID-19 are highly contagious even when they are asymptomatic, and the extent of this is still under investigation.

en: Common symptoms include a fever, dry cough, and fatigue.
zh: 常见症状有发热、干咳和乏力。
pert_zh: 常见症状有高热、干咳和乏力。
bt_pert_zh: Common symptoms include high fever, dry cough and fatigue.

en: Other less common symptoms include shortness of breath, a sore throat, headache, muscle pain, or sputum production.
zh: 另外一些不太常见的症状有气促、喉咙痛、头痛、肌肉疼痛或咳痰。
pert_zh: 另外一些不太常见的症状有剧烈气促、喉咙痛、头痛、肌肉疼痛或咳痰。
bt_pert_zh: Other less common symptoms include severe shortness of breath, sore throat, headache, muscle pain or coughing up phlegm.

en: Some patients have very mild symptoms, similar to a cold.
zh: 有些患者症状较轻，类似感冒。
pert_zh: 有些患者症状较轻微，类似感冒。
bt_pert_zh: Some patients have mild symptoms, similar to a cold.

en: Serious complications include pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multi-organ failure leading to disability or death.
zh: 另一些患者则可能伴有严重的并发症，包括肺炎、急性呼吸窘迫综合征和导致残疾或死亡的多器官衰竭。
pert_zh: 另一些患者则可能伴有极度严重的并发症，包括肺炎、急性呼吸窘迫综合征和导致残疾或死亡的多器官衰竭。
bt_pert_zh: Others may develop extremely severe complications, including pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and multiple organ failure leading to disability or death.

en: About 80% of infections result in mild symptoms, while the remaining may result in hospitalization.
zh: 大约 80% 的感染症状较轻，其余感染可能导致患者入院。
pert_zh: 大约 80% 的感染症状较轻，其中余感染可能导致患者入院。
bt_pert_zh: About 80% of infections are mild, but the remainder may result in hospitalization.

en: Case fatality rate is estimated at 1-3% of infected individuals, most of whom are elderly with underlying health conditions.
zh: 病死率约为 1-3%，其中大部分为存在基础健康问题的老年人。
pert_zh: 病死率约为相对较低的 1-3%，其中大部分为存在基础健康问题的老年人。
bt_pert_zh: The case fatality rate is around a relatively low 1-3%, mostly among the elderly with underlying health conditions.

en: The fatality rate is much higher for those over 70 but significantly lower for those under 40.
zh: 70 岁以上患者的死亡率较高，但 40 岁以下的死亡率非常低。
pert_zh: 70 岁以上患者的死亡率较高，但极少数的 40 岁以下的死亡率非常低。
bt_pert_zh: The mortality rate is higher in patients over 70 years old, but very low in the rare cases under 40 years old.

en: Those most at risk of COVID-19 infection and serious complications are the elderly and those with weakened immune systems or underlying health conditions like cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.
zh: COVID-19 感染和严重并发症风险最高的是老年人、免疫力低下者或患有心血管疾病、糖尿病、高血压、慢性呼吸道疾病和癌症等基础性疾病的人群。
pert_zh: COVID-19 感染和极严重并发症风险最高的是老年人、免疫力极低下者或患有心血管疾病、糖尿病、高血压、慢性呼吸道疾病和癌症等基础性疾病的人群。
bt_pert_zh: Those at highest risk for COVID-19 infection and very serious complications are the elderly, those with very weakened immune systems, or those with underlying medical conditions such as cardiovascular disease, diabetes, hypertension, chronic respiratory disease, and cancer.

en: Not many cases are reported in children and most of these are mild or moderate, though a significant fraction do get pneumonia.
zh: 儿童报告病例并不多，且大部分儿童病例症状为轻度或中度，不过确实有很大一部分会发展为肺炎。
pert_zh: 儿童报告病例并不多，且大部分儿童病例症状为轻度或中度，不过确实有很大一部分会迅速发展为肺炎。
bt_pert_zh: There are not many cases reported in children, and most cases in children have mild or moderate symptoms, but a large proportion do develop pneumonia rapidly.

en: Occupationally, health care workers have higher risk compared to others with clusters of disease among workers and in health care settings.
zh: 从职业角度来看，相比其他工作人员之间或医疗环境中出现疾病集群的人员，医疗工作者所面临的风险更高。
pert_zh: 从职业角度来看，相比其他工作人员之间或医疗环境中出现极端疾病集群的人员，医疗工作者所面临的风险更高。
bt_pert_zh: From an occupational perspective, healthcare workers are at higher risk than other workers or those experiencing extreme disease clusters in healthcare settings.

en: The time between being exposed to the virus and the emergence of symptoms (incubation period) is typically between 2 and 14 days, though there has been one reported case in China where symptoms appeared 27 days after exposure.
zh: 从接触病毒到出现症状一般间隔（潜伏期）2-14 天，不过中国曾报告一例接触病毒后 27 天才出现症状的病例。
pert_zh: 从接触病毒到出现症状一般间隔（潜伏期）2-14 天，不过中国曾报告一例接触病毒后 27 天才突然出现症状的病例。
bt_pert_zh: The general interval (incubation period) from exposure to the virus to the onset of symptoms is 2-14 days, but China has reported a case in which symptoms suddenly appeared 27 days after exposure to the virus.

en: As of February 2020, the period of infectiousness is unknown, but is likely most significant when people are symptomatic.
zh: 截至 2020 年 2 月，传染期尚不清楚，但出现症状后的传染性很可能最强。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 2 月，传染期尚不清楚，但出现症状后的传染性很可能异常强。
bt_pert_zh: As of February 2020, the infectious period is unknown, but it is likely that people are extremely contagious after symptoms appear.

en: There is evidence of transmission from people who don't have symptoms, although to what extent is still being investigated.
zh: 有证据显示，无症状者也会传播病毒，尽管其传播程度目前还在调查当中。
pert_zh: 有证据显示，严重的无症状者也会传播病毒，尽管其传播程度目前还在调查当中。
bt_pert_zh: There is evidence that people with severe illness but no symptoms can also spread the virus, although the extent of this is still under investigation.

en: It is unclear whether it is possible to be reinfected with the virus after recovering from it the first time around.
zh: 目前尚不清楚首次染病康复后是否还具有再次被病毒感染的可能性。
pert_zh: 目前尚不清楚首次染病康复后是否还具有极小的再次被病毒感染的可能性。
bt_pert_zh: It is not yet clear whether there is a small chance that someone will be infected again after recovering from the first infection.

en: Long-term effects for people who have recovered remain unclear, but there is evidence of reduced lung capacity in some recovered patients.
zh: 病毒对已康复群体的长期影响也尚不清楚，但有证据表明部分康复患者的肺活量有所降低。
pert_zh: 病毒对已康复群体的长期影响也尚不清楚，但有证据表明重要部分康复患者的肺活量有所降低。
bt_pert_zh: The long-term effects of the virus on those who have recovered are also unclear, but there is evidence that a significant proportion of recovered patients have reduced lung capacity.

en: Testing for the virus usually consists of a swab inserted through the nose or a throat swab which is analysed in a laboratory for the virus.
zh: 病毒检测方式通常为在实验室分析鼻拭子或咽拭子，确定是否感染了病毒。
pert_zh: 病毒检测方式通常为在实验室详细分析鼻拭子或咽拭子，确定是否感染了病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Virus testing usually involves detailed laboratory analysis of a nasal or throat swab to determine whether the person is infected with the virus.

en: The current "gold standard" test involves extracting the genetic material from the sample and analysing it for known genetic markers of the virus.
zh: 当前“黄金标准”检测涉及从样本中提取遗传物质，并进行分析，以寻找已知的病毒遗传标记。
pert_zh: 当前“黄金标准”检测涉及从样本中精确提取遗传物质，并进行分析，以寻找已知的病毒遗传标记。
bt_pert_zh: The current “gold standard” test involves the precise extraction of genetic material from a sample and analysis of it to look for known genetic markers of the virus.

en: There is no established test assessing for the virus or antibodies in the blood, although tests are being developed.
zh: 目前尚无通过血液评估病毒或抗体的检测方法，不过检测方法已在开发中。
pert_zh: 目前尚无明确通过血液评估病毒或抗体的检测方法，不过检测方法已在开发中。
bt_pert_zh: There are currently no clear tests to assess the virus or antibodies in the blood, but tests are being developed.

en: There is no test to establish immunity to the virus.
zh: 没有确定病毒免疫的检测。
pert_zh: 没有确定病毒高度免疫的检测。
bt_pert_zh: There is no test to determine high immunity to the virus.

en: Many governments around the world have advised their citizens not to travel unnecessarily amid the pandemic.
zh: 各国政府均建议公民在疫情期间取消所有不必要的出行。
pert_zh: 各国政府均强烈建议公民在疫情期间取消所有不必要的出行。
bt_pert_zh: Governments around the world have strongly advised citizens to cancel all unnecessary travel during the epidemic.

en: Lots of airlines and package holidays are making it easy for you by waiving cancellation and change fees.
zh: 很多航空公司和度假套餐均已免除取消和变更手续费，方便人们取消出行活动。
pert_zh: 很多航空公司和度假套餐均已彻底免除取消和变更手续费，方便人们取消出行活动。
bt_pert_zh: Many airlines and vacation packages have completely waived cancellation and change fees, making it easier for people to cancel their travel plans.

en: Particularly avoid cruise ship travel.
zh: 尤其要避免乘坐游轮。
pert_zh: 尤其要严重避免乘坐游轮。
bt_pert_zh: Cruise ships in particular should be strictly avoided.

en: Older travelers and those with underlying health conditions are most at risk and should avoid travel that puts them at risk, such as long plane flights, visits to crowded places, and especially cruises, even outside of severely affected areas.
zh: 老年旅行者和患有基础性疾病的患者风险最大，应避免有风险的行程，如乘坐长途飞机或前往人群密集场所，尤其要避免乘坐游轮，即使不在疫情严重地区。
pert_zh: 老年旅行者和患有基础性疾病的患者风险最大，应避免非常有风险的行程，如乘坐长途飞机或前往人群密集场所，尤其要避免乘坐游轮，即使不在疫情严重地区。
bt_pert_zh: Older travelers and those with underlying medical conditions are at greatest risk and should avoid very risky trips, such as long-distance flights or crowded places, and especially cruise ships, even if they are not in areas with severe epidemics.

en: In affected areas, most experts recommend a practice known as social distancing.
zh: 在疫区，大部分专家建议保持社交距离。
pert_zh: 在疫区，绝大部分专家建议保持社交距离。
bt_pert_zh: In epidemic areas, most experts recommend maintaining social distance.

en: This means minimising contact with others by keeping a distance of six feet or two meters from them and avoiding gathering together in groups.
zh: 也就是与他人保持 6 英尺或 2 米的距离并避免聚集，以尽可能减少与他人的接触。
pert_zh: 也就是与他人保持更远的 6 英尺或 2 米的距离并避免聚集，以尽可能减少与他人的接触。
bt_pert_zh: That means keeping a greater distance of 6 feet or 2 meters from others and avoiding gatherings to minimize contact with others.

en: Some areas permit small groups; others prohibit all group gatherings.
zh: 有的地区允许小团体聚集；有的地区则严禁各类聚集。
pert_zh: 有的地区允许小团体聚集；有的地区则严格禁止各类聚集。
bt_pert_zh: Some areas allow small groups to gather; other areas strictly prohibit all kinds of gatherings.

en: Measures you are encouraged to take include working from home whenever possible, avoiding crowds and avoiding leaving your home unless absolutely necessary.
zh: 建议措施包括尽可能居家办公，除非绝对必要，尽可能避开人群并避免离家外出。
pert_zh: 建议措施包括尽可能居家办公，除非绝对必要，尽可能严重避开人群并避免离家外出。
bt_pert_zh: Recommended measures include working from home as much as possible unless absolutely necessary, avoiding crowds as much as possible and avoiding leaving home.

en: If you must go out, try to stay at least 2 meters (6 feet) away from other people.
zh: 如果必须外出，尽可能与他人保持至少 2 米（6 英尺）的距离。
pert_zh: 如果必须外出，尽可能与他人保持较大至少 2 米（6 英尺）的距离。
bt_pert_zh: If you must go out, stay at least 2 metres (6 feet) away from other people as much as possible.

en: In many places these measures are required.
zh: 很多地区要求遵守这些措施。
pert_zh: 很多地区坚决要求遵守这些措施。
bt_pert_zh: Many regions are adamant about complying with these measures.

en: Follow hygiene practices like for flu prevention.
zh: 像预防流感一样，养成良好的卫生习惯。
pert_zh: 像预防严重流感一样，养成良好的卫生习惯。
bt_pert_zh: Just like preventing a severe case of the flu, practice good hygiene habits.

en: Frequently wash your hands with soap and warm water, and then dry your hands on a clean towel.
zh: 勤用肥皂和温水洗手，用干净毛巾擦干。
pert_zh: 勤用强力肥皂和温水洗手，用干净毛巾擦干。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands frequently with strong soap and warm water, and dry them with a clean towel.

en: As coronaviruses are enveloped viruses, washing your hands with soap kills the virus by disrupting the mostly fat-based viral envelope.
zh: 冠状病毒是一种包膜病毒，用肥皂洗手可以破坏主要由脂肪组成的病毒包膜，从而杀死病毒。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒是一种常见的包膜病毒，用肥皂洗手可以有效地破坏主要由脂肪组成的病毒包膜，从而杀死病毒。
bt_pert_zh: Coronavirus is a common enveloped virus. Washing hands with soap can effectively destroy the viral envelope which is mainly composed of fat, thereby killing the virus.

en: Effective hand washing requires rubbing your hands for at least 20 seconds.
zh: 搓洗至少 20 秒才能达到洗手的效果。
pert_zh: 搓洗至少 20 秒以上才能达到洗手的效果。
bt_pert_zh: Scrub for at least 20 seconds to achieve the desired hand washing effect.

en: Drying your washed hands physically removes some germs from your skin (so don't skip that step, and don't share towels).
zh: 洗手后用毛巾擦干可有效去除皮肤上的一些细菌（所以不要跳过此步，也不要与他人共用毛巾）。
pert_zh: 洗手后仔细用毛巾擦干可有效去除皮肤上的一些细菌（所以不要跳过此步，也不要与他人共用毛巾）。
bt_pert_zh: Carefully towel drying your hands after washing them can effectively remove some of the germs on your skin (so don’t skip this step, and don’t share towels with others).

en: If soap and water are not available, then use a >60% alcohol-based hand sanitizer.
zh: 如果无法获得肥皂及水，可以用浓度超过 60% 的酒精洗手液洗手。
pert_zh: 如果无法获得肥皂及水，可以用高浓度超过 60% 的酒精洗手液洗手。
bt_pert_zh: If soap and water are not available, you can wash your hands with a high concentration of alcohol-based hand sanitizer with more than 60% alcohol.

en: Alcohol is a quick germ-killer, but it's not quite instant, so this still requires the same 20 seconds of rubbing your hands together, making sure that every single scrap of skin gets wet, and then you have to wait about another minute, for the alcohol to completely dry.
zh: 酒精能够快速杀死细菌，但并非即时有效，所以也需要搓洗至少 20 秒，确保每一块皮肤都被浸湿，洗后至少等待一分钟，直至酒精晾干。
pert_zh: 酒精能够快速杀死细菌，但并非立即即时有效，所以也需要搓洗至少 20 秒，确保每一块皮肤都被浸湿，洗后至少等待一分钟，直至酒精晾干。
bt_pert_zh: Alcohol can kill bacteria quickly, but it is not immediately effective, so you need to scrub for at least 20 seconds to make sure every piece of skin is soaked, and wait for at least one minute after washing until the alcohol dries.

en: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands.
zh: 请勿用手触摸眼鼻口部。
pert_zh: 请勿用力用手触摸眼鼻口部。
bt_pert_zh: Do not touch your eyes, nose, and mouth with your hands.

en: Most people touch their faces every few minutes, all day long.
zh: 大部分人时不时会摸摸自己的脸。
pert_zh: 大部分人时不时会轻轻摸摸自己的脸。
bt_pert_zh: Most of us touch our faces gently from time to time.

en: Try to do this less, and try to wash your hands before touching your face.
zh: 请尽量减少触摸脸部，摸脸前请清洗双手。
pert_zh: 请尽量减少过度触摸脸部，摸脸前请清洗双手。
bt_pert_zh: Please minimize touching your face and wash your hands before touching your face.

en: Also, try to avoid touching surfaces you don't have to touch in the first place, at least with your bare hands.
zh: 此外，尽量避免触摸不必要的表面，至少应避免直接用手触摸。
pert_zh: 此外，尽量避免触摸不必要的表面，至少应避免严格直接用手触摸。
bt_pert_zh: Also, try to avoid touching unnecessary surfaces, at least strictly with your hands.

en: Cough and sneeze into your elbow or a tissue, and then immediately throw away the tissue and wash your hands.
zh: 咳嗽和打喷嚏时应用手肘或纸巾捂住口鼻，随后应立即扔掉纸巾并清洗双手。
pert_zh: 咳嗽和大力打喷嚏时应用手肘或纸巾捂住口鼻，随后应立即扔掉纸巾并清洗双手。
bt_pert_zh: When coughing or sneezing forcefully, cover your mouth and nose with your elbow or a tissue, then throw away the tissue immediately and wash your hands.

en: Don't stand or sit near people who might be sick.
zh: 不要站在或坐在可能患者旁边。
pert_zh: 不要站在或坐在极有可能患者旁边。
bt_pert_zh: Do not stand or sit next to someone who is most likely to be ill.

en: Stay at least one meter – and ideally two meters (six feet) – away.
zh: 与他人至少保持 1 米距离，最好是 2 米（6 英尺）。
pert_zh: 与他人至少保持明显的 1 米距离，最好是 2 米（6 英尺）。
bt_pert_zh: Maintain a clear distance of at least 1 meter, preferably 2 meters (6 feet), from other people.

en: As a quick way to eyeball this distance, imagine that you and the other person both reached your hands towards each other.
zh: 为简单目测这一距离，可以想象与对方一起伸出手互够。
pert_zh: 为简单目测这一距离，可以想象与对方一起伸出手互够或触及。
bt_pert_zh: To easily estimate this distance visually, you can imagine reaching out your hands to each other or touching each other.

en: Could you touch the other person's hand without taking a step towards that person?
zh: 站立不动是否可以够到对方的手？
pert_zh: 站立不动是否可以够到对方的高手？
bt_pert_zh: Is it possible to reach the opponent's master by standing still?

en: If the answer is yes, then you're too close.
zh: 如果可以，则表明距离太近。
pert_zh: 如果可以，则表明非常近。
bt_pert_zh: If it can, it's very close.

en: Clean objects and surfaces that a lot of people touch, such as doorknobs, phones, and television remotes with regular household cleaner.
zh: 用普通家用清洁剂清洁多人接触过的物体和表面，如门把手、电话和电视遥控器。
pert_zh: 用强效普通家用清洁剂清洁多人接触过的物体和表面，如门把手、电话和电视遥控器。
bt_pert_zh: Clean objects and surfaces that are touched by multiple people, such as doorknobs, phones, and TV remotes, with a strong, regular household cleaner.

en: Disinfect the surfaces with a suitable disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.
zh: 用适当的消毒剂进行表面消毒，如稀释的家用漂白剂。
pert_zh: 用适当的高效消毒剂进行表面消毒，如稀释的家用漂白剂。
bt_pert_zh: Disinfect surfaces with an appropriate high-level disinfectant, such as diluted household bleach.

en: Stay home when you are sick, and avoid contact with other people until your symptoms are gone.
zh: 万一生病要居家隔离，在症状消失前应避免接触他人。
pert_zh: 万一生病要居家隔离，严格在症状消失前应避免接触他人。
bt_pert_zh: If you get sick, you need to be quarantined at home and strictly avoid contact with others until the symptoms disappear.

en: Do not share personal items that come into contact with saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, water bottles, and towels.
zh: 不要与他人共用可能会沾染唾液的个人物品，如牙刷、餐具、饮料、水杯和毛巾。
pert_zh: 不要与他人共用可能会沾染高浓度唾液的个人物品，如牙刷、餐具、饮料、水杯和毛巾。
bt_pert_zh: Do not share personal items with others that may be contaminated with high concentrations of saliva, such as toothbrushes, eating utensils, drinks, drinking glasses, and towels.

en: The practice of serving yourself from a common plate with your own chopsticks, common in China, should be avoided.
zh: 在中国，常会出现多人用筷子共食一道菜的现象，这种用餐习惯应避免。
pert_zh: 在中国，常会出现大家多人用筷子共同食用一道菜的现象，这种用餐习惯应该坚决避免。
bt_pert_zh: In China, it is common for many people to share a dish with chopsticks. This dining habit should be resolutely avoided.

en: Greet people without touching them.
zh: 打招呼应采用无接触方式。
pert_zh: 打招呼应采用轻触无接触方式。
bt_pert_zh: Greetings should be done with a light touch and contactless approach.

en: Avoid hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.
zh: 避免拥抱、亲吻、握手、碰拳和任何其他接触。
pert_zh: 避免强烈拥抱、亲吻、握手、碰拳和任何其他接触。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid intense hugs, kisses, handshakes, fist bumps, and any other contact.

en: If it's impossible to avoid contact, then wash your hands both before and after.
zh: 如果没有办法避免接触，则接触前后要清洗双手。
pert_zh: 如果没有办法避免频繁接触，则接触前后要清洗双手。
bt_pert_zh: If frequent contact cannot be avoided, wash hands before and after contact.

en: It won't protect you from the coronavirus, but it will partially protect you from the flu, which remains a greater risk than COVID-19 in many areas.
zh: 这种做法无法避免感染新型冠状病毒，但有助于预防流感。在很多地方，流感的感染风险依然高于 COVID-19。
pert_zh: 这种做法无法完全避免感染新型冠状病毒，但有助于预防流感。在很多地方，流感的感染风险依然高于 COVID-19。
bt_pert_zh: This won’t completely protect you from contracting the novel coronavirus, but it will help prevent the flu, which in many places still carries a higher risk than COVID-19.

en: This also saves you from unnecessary worry if you get the flu and think it might be the coronavirus.
zh: 这样也可避免一些不必要的担忧，比如患流感后误以为是冠状病毒感染。
pert_zh: 这样也可避免一些过度不必要的担忧，比如患流感后误以为是冠状病毒感染。
bt_pert_zh: This can also avoid excessive and unnecessary worries, such as mistaking a flu infection for a coronavirus infection.

en: If you are elderly or otherwise in a high-risk group and can be vaccinated for pneumonia, get that vaccination.
zh: 如果你是老年人或其他高危人群，可以接种肺炎疫苗时应当接种。
pert_zh: 如果你是老年人或其他高危人群，可能可以接种肺炎疫苗时应当接种。
bt_pert_zh: If you are older or in another high-risk group, you should get the pneumonia vaccine when it is available.

en: It won't protect you from viral pneumonia from COVID-19, but some COVID-19 patients have died of bacterial pneumonia that attacked their weakened lungs, so a pneumonia vaccination could save your life.
zh: 虽然无法避免你感染 COVID-19，但部分 COVID-19 患者实际上死于攻击虚弱肺部的细菌性肺炎，所以接种肺炎疫苗在一定程度上也可挽救你的生命。
pert_zh: 虽然无法避免你感染 COVID-19，但部分 COVID-19 患者实际上死于更严重的攻击虚弱肺部的细菌性肺炎，所以接种肺炎疫苗在一定程度上也可挽救你的生命。
bt_pert_zh: While it won’t protect you from contracting COVID-19, some COVID-19 patients actually die from the more severe bacterial pneumonia that attacks weakened lungs, so getting the pneumonia vaccine could save your life to some extent, too.

en: Wearing masks is recommended for those who are suspected of carrying of disease and those who are in close contact with those infected.
zh: 对于那些疑似携带病毒或密切接触过被感染者的群体，建议佩戴口罩。
pert_zh: 对于那些怀疑携带病毒或密切接触过被感染者的群体，建议严格佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: For those suspected of carrying the virus or having close contact with infected people, it is recommended to strictly wear masks.

en: For those who are asymptomatic, the WHO does not recommend masks, though some national governments do.
zh: 对于无症状群体，WHO 不建议佩戴口罩，但一些国家政府会建议佩戴口罩。
pert_zh: 对于无症状群体，WHO 不建议佩戴口罩，但一些国家政府会强烈建议佩戴口罩。
bt_pert_zh: The WHO does not recommend wearing masks for asymptomatic people, but some governments strongly recommend wearing masks.

en: Wearing a mask of some kind is required in some countries and cities in an effort to reduce community transmission.
zh: 为减少社区传播，一些国家和城市会要求佩戴某种类型的口罩。
pert_zh: 为减少社区传播，一些国家和城市会严格要求佩戴某种类型的口罩。
bt_pert_zh: To reduce community transmission, some countries and cities have strict requirements for wearing certain types of masks.

en: There are worldwide shortages of surgical masks.
zh: 现在全球均面临医用外科口罩紧缺现象。
pert_zh: 现在全球普遍均面临医用外科口罩紧缺现象。
bt_pert_zh: The world is now facing a general shortage of medical surgical masks.

en: If you do wear a mask, make sure to use it correctly.
zh: 如果佩戴口罩，请确保正确佩戴。
pert_zh: 如果佩戴口罩，务必确保正确佩戴。
bt_pert_zh: If you wear a mask, make sure it is worn correctly.

en: The mask should cover your nose and mouth and fit without gaps.
zh: 口罩应遮住口鼻，且应大小匹配，避免留缝。
pert_zh: 口罩应完全遮住口鼻，且应大小匹配，避免留缝。
bt_pert_zh: The mask should completely cover the mouth and nose and should match the size to avoid gaps.

en: Wash your hands before putting on the mask and avoid touching the mask while wearing it.
zh: 戴口罩前要洗手，戴口罩后要避免触摸口罩。
pert_zh: 戴口罩前要仔细洗手，戴口罩后要避免频繁触摸口罩。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands carefully before wearing a mask, and avoid touching the mask frequently after wearing it.

en: If you do touch it, wash your hands immediately afterwards.
zh: 如果触摸了口罩，触摸后应立即洗手。
pert_zh: 如果触摸了口罩，触摸后应立即彻底洗手。
bt_pert_zh: If you touch the mask, wash your hands thoroughly and immediately after touching it.

en: When the mask becomes damp, discard and replace it.
zh: 口罩潮湿后，应丢弃并更换。
pert_zh: 口罩潮湿后，应立即丢弃并更换。
bt_pert_zh: Once the mask becomes wet, it should be discarded and replaced immediately.

en: Remove it from the back, throw it away, and then wash your hands.
zh: 从后面取下口罩并丢弃，然后洗手。
pert_zh: 从后面迅速取下口罩并丢弃，然后洗手。
bt_pert_zh: Remove the mask quickly from behind and discard, then wash your hands.

en: Remember that masks are not a substitute for good hygiene: continue to wash your hands frequently.
zh: 请记住，即使带了口罩，也要保持良好的卫生习惯：继续勤洗手。
pert_zh: 请记住，即使带了口罩，也要保持常用的良好卫生习惯：继续勤洗手。
bt_pert_zh: Remember to maintain your usual good hygiene habits, even when wearing a mask: Continue to wash your hands frequently.

en: Don't stock up on masks if you don't need them.
zh: 如果不需要口罩，请不要囤积。
pert_zh: 如果不需要口罩，请不要大量囤积。
bt_pert_zh: If you don't need masks, please don't stockpile them in large quantities.

en: Mask shortages mean that healthcare workers are having trouble getting a hold of masks, which puts everyone at risk.
zh: 口罩紧缺意味着医疗人员也难以获得口罩，这将提高所有人的风险等级。
pert_zh: 口罩紧缺严重意味着医疗人员也难以获得口罩，这将提高所有人的风险等级。
bt_pert_zh: The severe shortage of masks means that medical staff will also find it difficult to obtain masks, which will increase the risk level for everyone.

en: That includes N95 respirators, which are not recommended for the general public – these are specialist equipment which must be fitted to be optimally effective.
zh: 其中包括不推荐普通大众使用的 N95 口罩，这是一种专业防护装备，旨在发挥最佳效果。
pert_zh: 其中包括不推荐普通大众使用的 N95 口罩，这是一种专业防护装备，旨在发挥较佳最佳效果。
bt_pert_zh: This includes N95 masks, which are professional protective equipment designed to perform optimally, which are not recommended for use by the general public.

en: Leave them for healthcare workers.
zh: 请将这类口罩留给医疗人员。
pert_zh: 请将这些常规口罩留给医疗人员。
bt_pert_zh: Please save these regular masks for medical personnel.

en: Avoid crowded areas, especially enclosed areas without much air circulation, such as conferences, performances, shopping malls, public transportation, and religious services.
zh: 避免去人多的地方，尤其是空气流通不畅的封闭区域，如会议室、表演场所、购物中心、公共交通工具和宗教礼拜场所。
pert_zh: 避免去人多的地方，尤其是空气流通不畅的封闭区域，如会议室、表演场所、购物中心、公共交通工具和临时的宗教礼拜场所。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid crowded places, especially enclosed areas with poor air circulation, such as meeting rooms, performance venues, shopping malls, public transportation, and temporary religious places of worship.

en: Events which involve a large scale gathering of people, from religious pilgrimages to music concerts, are being canceled worldwide, in an effort to contain the spread of the virus.
zh: 从宗教朝圣到音乐会，全球已取消各种大规模人群聚集活动，以努力控制病毒的扩散。
pert_zh: 从宗教朝圣到音乐会，全球已紧急取消各种大规模人群聚集活动，以努力控制病毒的扩散。
bt_pert_zh: From religious pilgrimages to concerts, large gatherings of people have been canceled around the world in an effort to control the spread of the virus.

en: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be closed, especially in affected countries.
zh: 旅游景点、商家和交通运输可能均已关闭，尤其是在疫情国家。
pert_zh: 旅游景点、商家和交通运输可能均已彻底关闭，尤其是在疫情国家。
bt_pert_zh: Tourist attractions, businesses, and transportation may be completely closed, especially in affected countries.

en: Some canceled events, especially performances, sporting events, and classes, are being moved online, which means you can experience them without traveling.
zh: 一些已取消的活动，尤其是表演、体育赛事和课程，已转移到网上，人们不用出行也可体验。
pert_zh: 一些已取消的活动，尤其是高水平的表演、体育赛事和课程，已转移到网上，人们不用出行也可体验。
bt_pert_zh: Some canceled events, especially high-level performances, sporting events and classes, have been moved online so people can experience them without traveling.

en: At petrol/gas stations, use gloves or wipe down the handle with a disinfectant wipe if you can.
zh: 在加油站加油时，请尽可能使用手套或消毒抹布擦拭把手。
pert_zh: 在加油站加油时，请尽可能使用干净的手套或消毒抹布擦拭把手。
bt_pert_zh: When filling up at a gas station, wipe the handles with clean gloves or disinfectant wipes whenever possible.

en: After filling up, clean your hands with hand sanitizer.
zh: 加满油后，请用洗手液洗手。
pert_zh: 加满油后，请用充分洗手液洗手。
bt_pert_zh: After filling up, wash your hands with plenty of hand sanitizer.

en: The U.S. and Canadian governments recommend avoiding travel by cruise ship.
zh: 美国和加拿大政府建议避免乘坐游轮出行。
pert_zh: 美国和加拿大政府强烈建议避免乘坐游轮出行。
bt_pert_zh: The U.S. and Canadian governments strongly recommend avoiding cruise ship travel.

en: Infections spread easily on board, and medical care is limited.
zh: 船上极易发生传染，而且医疗条件有限。
pert_zh: 船上极易发生大范围传染，而且医疗条件有限。
bt_pert_zh: It is very easy for large-scale infections to occur on board, and medical facilities are limited.

en: Amid a cruise ship outbreak, quarantines and docking are challenging partly due to the large number of people aboard.
zh: 如果在游轮上爆发疫情，鉴于载客人数众多，隔离和停靠均面临挑战。
pert_zh: 如果在游轮上大规模爆发疫情，鉴于载客人数众多，隔离和停靠均面临挑战。
bt_pert_zh: If a large-scale outbreak occurs on a cruise ship, isolation and docking will be challenging given the large number of passengers.

en: Even cruise ships without confirmed cases have been denied permission to dock due to virus fears, and in the high-profile case of the Diamond Princess in Japan, hundreds of people were infected on the ship.
zh: 即使是船上无确诊病例，一些码头也会因害怕病毒而拒绝停靠，在日本备受关注的钻石公主号事件中，有数百名乘客被感染。
pert_zh: 即使是船上无明确确诊病例，一些码头也会因极度害怕病毒而拒绝停靠，在日本备受关注的钻石公主号事件中，有数百名乘客被感染。
bt_pert_zh: Even if there are no confirmed cases on the ship, some ports will refuse to dock due to extreme fear of the virus. In the highly-watched Diamond Princess incident in Japan, hundreds of passengers were infected.

en: If you believe you may be infected, call a hospital or local emergency medical services instead of going in person to avoid infecting others.
zh: 如果你怀疑自己被感染了，请呼叫医院或当地急救医疗服务机构，不要私自前往，以避免传染他人。
pert_zh: 如果你怀疑自己被感染了，请立即呼叫医院或当地急救医疗服务机构，不要私自前往，以避免传染他人。
