bt_pert_zh: If you suspect you are infected, please call a hospital or local emergency medical service immediately and do not go there on your own to avoid infecting others.

en: Mention your symptoms and travel history.
zh: 说明你的症状和出行轨迹。
pert_zh: 说明你的症状和非常重要的出行轨迹。
bt_pert_zh: Explain your symptoms and, very importantly, your travel history.

en: Wear a medical mask and follow the instructions of authorities and doctors.
zh: 佩戴医用口罩，并按照官方机构和医生的指示行事。
pert_zh: 佩戴高级医用口罩，并按照官方机构和医生的指示行事。
bt_pert_zh: Wear a high-grade medical mask and follow the instructions of official agencies and doctors.

en: See also: Flight and health
zh: 另请查看：航班与健康
pert_zh: 另请仔细查看：航班与健康
bt_pert_zh: Please also read: Flights and Health

en: On a plane, follow the same hygiene practices as anywhere else: wash hands frequently, or use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if it's not convenient to leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.
zh: 在飞机上，遵循与其他地方一样的卫生习惯：勤洗手，如果不便离开座位则使用酒精洗手液，避免触摸脸部。
pert_zh: 在飞机上，遵循与其他地方一样的严格卫生习惯：勤洗手，如果不便离开座位则使用酒精洗手液，避免触摸脸部。
bt_pert_zh: On board, follow the same strict hygiene practices as you would anywhere else: wash your hands frequently, use alcohol-based hand sanitizer if you can’t leave your seat, and avoid touching your face.

en: Researchers have found that passengers in window seats have less risk of contact with sick people.
zh: 研究人员发现，靠窗乘客与患者接触的风险较小。
pert_zh: 研究人员发现，靠窗乘客与患者接触的风险相对较小。
bt_pert_zh: The researchers found that window passengers had a relatively low risk of contact with patients.

en: Try to book a window seat, and avoid moving around the cabin during the flight.
zh: 尽量预订靠窗位置，飞行过程中避免在机舱内走动。
pert_zh: 尽量预订靠窗位置，飞行过程中坚决避免在机舱内走动。
bt_pert_zh: Try to book a window seat and avoid walking around the cabin during the flight.

en: After washing your hands and before sitting down, use disinfectant wipes to wipe down the area around your seat.
zh: 洗手后入座前，要用消毒湿巾擦拭座位周围区域。
pert_zh: 洗手后入座前，要用消毒湿巾仔细擦拭座位周围区域。
bt_pert_zh: After washing your hands, wipe the area around your seat carefully with disinfectant wipes before taking your seat.

en: Wipe hard surfaces, and if your seat is leather you can wipe that too.
zh: 擦拭坚硬表面，如果是真皮座椅，也可擦拭。
pert_zh: 擦拭非常坚硬表面，如果是真皮座椅，也可擦拭。
bt_pert_zh: Wipe down very hard surfaces, even leather seats.

en: Don't wipe a cloth seat, as the moisture can make transmission easier.
zh: 如果是布艺座椅，不要擦拭，因为潮湿有利于传播。
pert_zh: 如果是布艺座椅，不要擦拭，因为潮湿有利于加快传播。
bt_pert_zh: If it is a fabric seat, do not wipe it because moisture will accelerate the spread.

en: When using disinfectant wipes, follow the instructions on the packaging.
zh: 消毒湿巾请按照包装上的说明使用。
pert_zh: 消毒湿巾请仔细按照包装上的详细说明使用。
bt_pert_zh: Please use disinfectant wipes carefully according to the detailed instructions on the packaging.

en: And remember, viruses enter through your mouth, nose, and eyes – wiping down the area doesn't hurt, but it's not a substitute for proper hygiene.
zh: 请记住，病毒可通过口鼻眼部进入人体，擦拭上述区域虽有帮助，但不能代替正确的卫生措施。
pert_zh: 请记住，病毒可通过口鼻眼部进入人体，擦拭上述区域虽有帮助，但不能完全代替正确的卫生措施。
bt_pert_zh: Remember that viruses can enter the body through the mouth, nose, and eyes, and wiping these areas can help but is not a complete substitute for proper hygiene measures.

en: Wash your hands and avoid touching your face.
zh: 勤洗手并避免触摸脸部。
pert_zh: 勤洗手并坚决避免触摸脸部。
bt_pert_zh: Wash your hands frequently and avoid touching your face.

en: And use a tissue to touch the touch screen or other controls.
zh: 在触摸屏幕或其他控件时用纸巾裹住手操作。
pert_zh: 在触摸屏幕或其他控件时用厚纸巾裹住手操作。
bt_pert_zh: Wrap your hands with a thick paper towel when touching the screen or other controls.

en: When using the lavatory, use paper towels to turn off the faucet and open the door, then throw them away.
zh: 上厕所时，用纸巾裹住手来关闭水龙头、开门，然后扔掉纸巾。
pert_zh: 上厕所时，用厚纸巾裹住手来关闭水龙头、开门，然后扔掉纸巾。
bt_pert_zh: When using the bathroom, wrap your hands in a thick tissue to turn off the faucet, open the door, and then throw away the tissue.

en: Airlines in affected areas are taking steps to reduce transmission and keep passengers safe.
zh: 疫区的航空公司正采取措施减少传播和保护乘客安全。
pert_zh: 疫区的航空公司正在积极采取措施减少传播和保护乘客安全。
bt_pert_zh: Airlines in epidemic areas are taking active measures to reduce transmission and protect passenger safety.

en: For instance, these may include cleaning facilities more frequently, allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving prepackaged instead of freshly heated meals.
zh: 其措施可能包括增加设施清洁频率，允许空乘人员佩戴口罩，供应预先包装而非现场加热的食物。
pert_zh: 其措施可能包括增加设施清洁频率，进一步允许空乘人员佩戴口罩，供应预先包装而非现场加热的食物。
bt_pert_zh: These measures may include increasing the frequency of cleaning facilities, further allowing flight attendants to wear masks, and serving pre-packaged food rather than heating it on site.

en: If a group of passengers is connecting from an area with a severe outbreak, the flight attendants may be able to seat them away from the rest of the passengers (and if you were recently in a high-risk area, consider telling the flight attendants for this reason).
zh: 如果有乘客从疫情严重地区转机，空乘人员可安排其坐在远离其他乘客的位置（如果你近期到过高风险地区，出于这一原因，请考虑告知空乘人员）。
pert_zh: 如果有乘客从疫情非常严重地区转机，空乘人员可安排其坐在远离其他乘客的位置（如果你近期到过高风险地区，出于这一原因，请考虑告知空乘人员）。
bt_pert_zh: If a passenger is transferring from an area with a very high risk of the outbreak, cabin crew may seat them away from other passengers (if you have recently been to a high-risk area, please consider informing cabin crew for this reason).

en: You may be prohibited from changing seats on the flight.
zh: 空乘人员可能会禁止你在机上调换座位。
pert_zh: 空乘人员可能会严令禁止你在机上调换座位。
bt_pert_zh: Flight attendants may strictly prohibit you from changing seats on board.

en: This is so that, if someone on the flight turns out to be infected, the authorities can track down the people who were sitting near them for testing or quarantine.
zh: 这是为了万一飞机上有人被感染，官方机构能够追踪到其座位附近的乘客，以便进行检测或隔离。
pert_zh: 这是为了万一飞机上有人被猛烈感染，官方机构能够追踪到其座位附近的乘客，以便进行检测或隔离。
bt_pert_zh: This is so that in case someone on the plane becomes infected, the authorities will be able to track down passengers sitting near them for testing or quarantine.

en: COVID-19 is treated by relieving symptoms and preventing complications.
zh: 针对 COVID-19，治疗重点在于缓解症状和预防并发症。
pert_zh: 针对 COVID-19，治疗重点在于有效缓解症状和预防并发症。
bt_pert_zh: For COVID-19, treatment focuses on effectively relieving symptoms and preventing complications.

en: There is no vaccine or specific treatment for the novel coronavirus.
zh: 目前还没有针对新型冠状病毒的疫苗或特效治疗方案。
pert_zh: 目前还没有紧急针对新型冠状病毒的疫苗或特效治疗方案。
bt_pert_zh: There is currently no emergency vaccine or specific treatment for the new coronavirus.

en: Research into a vaccine or specific antiviral drug is underway.
zh: 疫苗或特效抗病毒药还在研究当中。
pert_zh: 疫苗或特效抗病毒药非常还在研究当中。
bt_pert_zh: Vaccines or specific antiviral drugs are still under research.

en: There are a variety of trials using HIV medications and other novel antiviral medications for treatment of COVID-19.
zh: 有很多使用抗艾滋药物和其他新型抗病毒药物治疗 COVID-19 的试验正在进行。
pert_zh: 有很多使用高效抗艾滋药物和其他新型抗病毒药物治疗 COVID-19 的试验正在进行。
bt_pert_zh: There are many trials underway to treat COVID-19 using highly effective anti-HIV drugs and other new antiviral drugs.

en: Mild symptoms may be relieved by taking paracetamol (acetaminophen).
zh: 服用扑热息痛（对乙酰氨基酚）可缓解轻度症状。
pert_zh: 服用强效扑热息痛（对乙酰氨基酚）可缓解轻度症状。
bt_pert_zh: Taking strong paracetamol (acetaminophen) can relieve mild symptoms.

en: If you are infected with COVID-19, countries will isolate you until several consecutive tests for COVID-19 are negative.
zh: 如果你感染了 COVID-19，国家将对你采取隔离措施，直至连续多次的 COVID-19 检测呈阴性。
pert_zh: 如果你感染了 COVID-19，国家将对你采取强制隔离措施，直至连续多次的 COVID-19 检测呈阴性。
bt_pert_zh: If you are infected with COVID-19, the state will impose mandatory quarantine measures on you until you have multiple consecutive negative COVID-19 tests.

en: If you have been in close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will quarantine you for 14 days since the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.
zh: 如果你与感染 COVID-19 的患者有过密切接触，很多国家会自最后一次接触后实施为期 14 天的隔离，并监控你的症状和体征。
pert_zh: 如果你与感染 COVID-19 的患者有过极其密切接触，很多国家会自最后一次接触后实施为期 14 天的隔离，并监控你的症状和体征。
bt_pert_zh: If you have had extremely close contact with someone infected with COVID-19, many countries will implement a 14-day quarantine from the last exposure and monitor you for signs and symptoms.

en: Some countries will also test you even if you don't have symptoms.
zh: 在有些国家，即使无症状，可能也会对你进行检测。
pert_zh: 在有些国家，即使无明显症状，可能也会对你进行检测。
bt_pert_zh: In some countries, you may be tested even if you have no obvious symptoms.

en: In many countries, the healthcare system has been stretched to the point of not being able to handle the sheer number of patients, and there is a chance you may be refused treatment due to the lack of available medical staff, supplies or equipment.
zh: 很多国家的医疗系统已濒临崩溃，无法应付如此庞大的患者数量，甚至可能由于医务人员、用品或设备不足，拒绝给患者治疗。
pert_zh: 很多国家的医疗系统已濒临严重崩溃，无法应付如此庞大的患者数量，甚至可能由于医务人员、用品或设备不足，拒绝给患者治疗。
bt_pert_zh: The medical systems in many countries are on the verge of serious collapse and are unable to cope with such a large number of patients. They may even refuse to treat patients due to insufficient medical staff, supplies or equipment.

en: Many countries have shut down or severely limited flights, ships, and border crossings, especially to and from affected areas.
zh: 很多国家已关闭或严格限制航班、船只和边境口岸，尤其是往来疫区的航班、船只和边境口岸。
pert_zh: 很多国家已关闭或极其严格限制航班、船只和边境口岸，尤其是往来疫区的航班、船只和边境口岸。
bt_pert_zh: Many countries have closed or severely restricted flights, ships and border crossings, especially those to and from affected areas.

en: Even more countries have imposed restrictions on arriving travelers, either barring entry (maybe with an exception for local citizens and permanent residents) or requiring you to be quarantined, typically for 14 days.
zh: 更多国家对入境旅客实施了限制，有的严格禁止入境（当地居民和永久居民除外），有的则要求进行隔离，通常为 14 天。
pert_zh: 更多国家对入境旅客实施了严格限制，有的严格禁止入境（当地居民和永久居民除外），有的则要求进行隔离，通常为 14 天。
bt_pert_zh: Many more countries have imposed strict restrictions on incoming travelers, some strictly prohibiting entry (except for local residents and permanent residents) and others requiring quarantine, usually for 14 days.

en: Even if a mandatory quarantine is not imposed, you may be asked to "self-quarantine" by staying at home and not interacting with other people.
zh: 即使没有实施强制隔离，也可能建议你居家“自我隔离”，不与他人接触。
pert_zh: 即使没有实施强制隔离，也可能建议你居家“自我隔离”，极力不与他人接触。
bt_pert_zh: Even if there is no mandatory quarantine, you may be advised to "self-isolate" at home and try your best to avoid contact with others.

en: The most severe restrictions are on travellers who have recently been to affected areas, but increasingly many countries are applying them to incoming travellers overall.
zh: 最严格的限制是对近期到过疫区的旅行者的限制，但越来越多的国家已经开始对所有入境旅行者实施这些限制。
pert_zh: 最严格的限制是对近期到过高风险疫区的旅行者的限制，但越来越多的国家已经开始对所有入境旅行者实施这些限制。
bt_pert_zh: The strictest restrictions apply to travelers who have recently been to high-risk epidemic areas, but a growing number of countries have begun imposing them on all incoming travelers.

en: Some countries have even prohibited all or almost all foreigners from entry or limited the ability of local citizens and residents to leave.
zh: 有些国家甚至还会禁止所有或几乎所有外国人入境，或限制当地公民和居民离境。
pert_zh: 有些国家甚至还会严格禁止所有或几乎所有外国人入境，或限制当地公民和居民离境。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries even strictly ban all or almost all foreigners from entering the country, or restrict local citizens and residents from leaving the country.

en: What are the affected areas?
zh: 什么是疫区？
pert_zh: 什么是病毒疫区？
bt_pert_zh: What is a virus epidemic area?

en: Well, this is a fast-changing situation, and each country/region/organization has its own list of what areas are subject to restrictions.
zh: 疫区范围变化很快，每个国家/地区/组织都有自己的限制区域列表。
pert_zh: 疫区范围变化很迅速，每个国家/地区/组织都有自己的限制区域列表。
bt_pert_zh: The scope of the epidemic area changes rapidly, and each country/region/organization has its own list of restricted areas.

en: The city of Wuhan is on every list and the rest of mainland China is on most.
zh: 所有列表中均有武汉，大部分列表中还列有中国大陆其余地区。
pert_zh: 所有列表中均有严重的武汉，大部分列表中还列有中国大陆其余地区。
bt_pert_zh: All lists include the severely affected Wuhan, and most lists also include the rest of mainland China.

en: Other areas that are often included: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the Schengen Area as a whole, and sometimes various others.
zh: 列表中常见的其他区域还包括：法国、德国、中国香港、伊朗、意大利、日本、中国澳门、新加坡、韩国、西班牙、中国台湾、英国、美国、整个申根地区，有时还包括其他很多地区。
pert_zh: 列表中常见的其他地区还包括：法国、德国、中国香港、伊朗、意大利、日本、中国澳门、新加坡、韩国、西班牙、中国台湾、英国、美国、整个申根地区，有时还包括其他非常多的地区。
bt_pert_zh: Other common areas on the list include: France, Germany, Hong Kong, Iran, Italy, Japan, Macau, Singapore, South Korea, Spain, Taiwan, the United Kingdom, the United States, the entire Schengen area, and sometimes many other areas.

en: Some countries have imposed restrictions based on citizenship or residency from severely affected areas.
zh: 一些国家会对来自疫情严重地区的公民或居民实施限制。
pert_zh: 一些国家会对来自疫情非常严重地区的公民或居民实施限制。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries will impose restrictions on citizens or residents coming from areas with very serious epidemics.

en: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by the IATA.
zh: 入境限制详细列表由 IATA 维护。
pert_zh: 入境限制详细列表由 IATA 维护完善。
bt_pert_zh: A detailed list of entry restrictions is maintained by IATA.

en: It doesn't cover all the restrictions, but it's still useful.
zh: 虽然不够全面，但仍然很有价值。
pert_zh: 虽然不够全面，但仍然非常有价值。
bt_pert_zh: Although not comprehensive, it is still very valuable.

en: Keep up to date—the outbreak and the travel restrictions are changing rapidly.
zh: 持续更新——疫情爆发和出行限制也在快速变化。
pert_zh: 持续更新——猛烈的疫情爆发和出行限制也在快速变化。
bt_pert_zh: CONTINUOUSLY UPDATED - The outbreak is intense and travel restrictions are changing rapidly.

en: For travel in the near future, consider making refundable reservations in case the changing situation forces you to change your plans.
zh: 近期如需出行，请考虑预订可退款客房，以防情况有变时更改计划。
pert_zh: 近期如需出行，请考虑紧急预订可退款客房，以防情况有变时更改计划。
bt_pert_zh: If you need to travel in the near future, please consider booking an emergency refundable room in case you need to change your plans if the situation changes.

en: Avoid buying tickets with a connection in an affected area – even changing planes can make you subject to restrictions.
zh: 避免购买在疫区转机的机票，即使是换乘，你也可能会受到一些限制。
pert_zh: 避免购买在疫区极端转机的机票，即使是换乘，你也可能会受到一些限制。
bt_pert_zh: Avoid buying tickets with extreme transfers in epidemic areas. Even if you do transfer, you may be subject to some restrictions.

en: Flights may get canceled with little notice, either due to the disease's spread and ever-changing entry restrictions, or simply because fewer people are flying and airlines are having trouble filling seats.
zh: 航班可能会在毫无通知的情况下取消，原因包括疫情扩散和入境限制不断变化，或者仅仅因为乘客减少，机上座位无法坐满。
pert_zh: 航班可能会在毫无通知的情况下临时取消，原因包括疫情扩散和入境限制不断变化，或者仅仅因为乘客减少，机上座位无法坐满。
bt_pert_zh: Flights may be canceled without notice due to the spread of the virus and changing entry restrictions, or simply because there are fewer passengers and the seats on the plane cannot be filled.

en: You might also be delayed for hours upon arrival waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and paperwork, or even get quarantined for two weeks.
zh: 此外，抵达目的地后，你可能还要花数小时等待体温检测和相关程序与申报流程，甚至可能被隔离两周。
pert_zh: 此外，抵达目的地后，你可能还要花数小时长等待体温检测和相关程序与申报流程，甚至可能被隔离两周。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, upon arrival at your destination, you may have to spend several hours waiting for temperature checks and related procedures and declaration processes, and may even be quarantined for two weeks.

en: Be prepared for the possibility of disruption to your travel plans, especially if traveling internationally.
zh: 请随时做好出行计划中断的准备，尤其是国际行程。
pert_zh: 请随时做好突然出行计划中断的准备，尤其是国际行程。
bt_pert_zh: Always be prepared for unexpected disruptions to your travel plans, especially if you are travelling internationally.

en: Even if you're nowhere near affected areas there's a risk that you'll have to stay at the destination longer than planned if you've shared a building or vessel with an infected person.
zh: 即使不在疫区附近，如果你所在大楼或交通工具上发现感染者，你在目的地的停留时间也可能延长。
pert_zh: 即使不在疫区附近，如果你所在大楼或交通工具上发现严重感染者，你在目的地的停留时间也可能延长。
bt_pert_zh: Even if you are not near an epidemic area, your stay at your destination may be extended if a seriously infected person is found in your building or on your means of transportation.

en: For example, in late February an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with COVID-19, and as a result all the guests in the hotel he stayed at were quarantined.
zh: 例如，2 月下旬，一位在奥德杰海岸（加那利群岛）度假的意大利医生被确诊患有 COVID-19，结果他所住酒店的所有客人均被隔离。
pert_zh: 例如，2 月下旬，一位在奥德杰海岸（加那利群岛）度假的意大利医生被确诊患有重症 COVID-19，结果他所住酒店的所有客人均被隔离。
bt_pert_zh: For example, in late February, an Italian doctor on vacation in Costa Adeje (Canary Islands) was diagnosed with severe COVID-19, resulting in all guests of the hotel where he was staying being quarantined.

en: Lockdowns and other internal restrictions
zh: 封锁和其他国内限制
pert_zh: 封锁和极端的其他国内限制
bt_pert_zh: Lockdowns and other extreme domestic restrictions

en: Some countries and regions, especially severely affected ones, are implementing emergency lockdowns and restrictions on people's movements and activities, even for those who haven't recently been abroad.
zh: 一些国家和地区，特别是严重疫区，正在实施紧急封锁，以限制人们的出行和活动，即使是近期未曾出国的人员。
pert_zh: 一些国家和地区，特别是极度严重疫区，正在实施紧急封锁，以限制人们的出行和活动，即使是近期未曾出国的人员。
bt_pert_zh: Some countries and regions, especially those with extremely severe epidemics, are implementing emergency lockdowns to restrict people's travel and activities, even those who have not traveled abroad recently.

en: These include the temporary reintroduction of some border controls, restrictions on travel within the country, closing or limiting service at restaurants and other establishments, banning large public events, and in the most severe cases prohibiting people from leaving the house except for essential reasons.
zh: 措施包括暂时重启边境管制，限制国内出行，关闭或限制餐馆和其他场所提供服务，禁止大型公共活动，最严重时还会禁止居民离家外出，除非绝对必要。
pert_zh: 措施包括临时暂时重启边境管制，限制国内非必要出行，关闭或限制餐馆和其他场所提供服务，禁止大型公共活动，最严重时还会严格禁止居民离家外出，除非绝对必要。
bt_pert_zh: The measures include temporarily re-opening border controls, restricting non-essential domestic travel, closing or limiting services in restaurants and other venues, prohibiting large-scale public events, and in the most serious cases, strictly prohibiting residents from leaving their homes unless absolutely necessary.

en: Beyond government restrictions, individual establishments are shutting their doors and cancelling events to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
zh: 除了政府限制外，个别设施也会关闭，取消活动，努力减少病毒扩散。
pert_zh: 除了政府严格的限制外，个别设施也会关闭，取消活动，努力减少病毒扩散。
bt_pert_zh: In addition to strict government restrictions, individual facilities are closing and events are canceled in an effort to reduce the spread of the virus.

en: In China, there are extensive restrictions on transportation and activity, which vary widely by province, city, and even by district or village.
zh: 在中国，交通和活动受到广泛限制，具体限制因省、市、甚至地区或村庄而存在巨大差异。
pert_zh: 在中国，交通和活动受到严格广泛限制，具体限制因省、市、甚至地区或村庄而存在巨大差异。
bt_pert_zh: Across China, travel and movement are subject to strict and widespread restrictions, with specific restrictions varying greatly by province, city, and even region or village.

en: Many governments recommend against traveling to China at this time.
zh: 很多政府建议这段时间避免前往中国。
pert_zh: 很多政府建议强烈这段时间避免前往中国。
bt_pert_zh: Many governments strongly recommend avoiding travel to China during this time.

en: If you have no choice, do your research and get up-to-date information about the local situation wherever you are going.
zh: 如果你没有其他选择，请自行调查，及时了解有关你的目的地的最新信息。
pert_zh: 如果你没有其他选择，请自行深入调查，及时了解有关你的目的地的最新信息。
bt_pert_zh: If you have no other choice, do your own in-depth research and stay up to date with the latest information about your destination.

en: People who have traveled to Hubei face particularly severe restrictions.
zh: 到过湖北的人员尤其会受到严格限制。
pert_zh: 到过湖北的人员尤其会受到极其严格限制。
bt_pert_zh: People who have been to Hubei will be subject to extremely strict restrictions.

en: Examples of restrictions that you may encounter in some parts of China (this is not an exhaustive list):
zh: 在中国部分地区你可能会受到的限制包括（以下是非详尽列表）：
pert_zh: 在中国部分地区你可能会受到的临时限制包括（以下是非详尽列表）：
bt_pert_zh: Temporary restrictions you may be subject to in parts of China include (this is a non-exhaustive list):

en: 14-day quarantine, self-quarantine, or COVID-19 test upon arrival from other parts of China or from other countries, at your expense
zh: 从中国其他地区或其他国家抵达后，接受为期 14 天的隔离、自我隔离或 COVID-19 检测，费用自理。
pert_zh: 从中国其他地区或其他国家抵达后，接受为期 14 天的强制隔离、自我隔离或 COVID-19 检测，费用自理。
bt_pert_zh: Upon arrival from other parts of China or other countries, undergo a mandatory 14-day quarantine, self-isolation, or COVID-19 testing at your own expense.

en: questions about your travel and medical history (lying can get you years in prison)
zh: 询问你的活动轨迹和病史（瞒报有可能入狱）
pert_zh: 询问你的活动轨迹和病史（严密瞒报有可能入狱）
bt_pert_zh: Ask about your activities and medical history (if you conceal the details, you may be imprisoned)

en: mandatory registration using an online or paper form
zh: 使用在线或纸质表格强制登记
pert_zh: 使用在线或纸质表格严格强制登记
bt_pert_zh: Strictly enforce registration using online or paper forms

en: requirement to wear a face mask in public
zh: 要求在公共场所佩戴口罩
pert_zh: 要求在公共场所必须佩戴口罩
bt_pert_zh: Requires wearing masks in public places

en: people who have been outside of China within 14 days not allowed into public places like malls
zh: 从国外回到中国后 14 天内不得进入商场等公共区域
pert_zh: 从国外回到中国后 14 天内不得轻易进入商场等公共区域
bt_pert_zh: After returning to China from abroad, you are not allowed to easily enter public areas such as shopping malls within 14 days.

en: shops only accept mobile payments, not cash
zh: 商店仅接受移动付款，不收现金
pert_zh: 商店仅接受大额移动付款，不收现金。
bt_pert_zh: The store only accepts large-value mobile payments and does not accept cash.

en: restaurants, transportation and other establishments refusing service to non-Chinese citizens
zh: 餐厅、交通和其他机构拒绝向非中国公民提供服务
pert_zh: 餐厅、交通和其他机构极力拒绝向非中国公民提供服务
bt_pert_zh: Restaurants, transportation, and other institutions actively refuse to serve non-Chinese citizens

en: many forms of transportation reduced or shut down
zh: 很多交通运输工具已管控或停运
pert_zh: 很多交通运输工具已严格管控或停运。
bt_pert_zh: Many means of transportation have been strictly controlled or suspended.

en: mandatory real-name registration for public transit cards
zh: 强制实名登记公交卡
pert_zh: 强制深度实名登记公交卡
bt_pert_zh: Mandatory real-name registration for public transportation cards

en: access in and out of a town, village, or city completely blocked
zh: 完全封锁城镇、村庄或城市出入通道
pert_zh: 完全封锁城镇、村庄或城市严格出入通道。
bt_pert_zh: Completely block access to and from a town, village or city.

en: non-resident visitors prohibited from entering apartment complexes
zh: 非居民游客不得进入公寓楼
pert_zh: 非居民游客严格不得进入公寓楼。
bt_pert_zh: Non-resident visitors are strictly prohibited from entering the apartment building.

en: only allowed to go outside once every two days to get supplies
zh: 仅允许每两天外出一次获取补给
pert_zh: 仅允许每两天轻微外出一次获取补给
bt_pert_zh: Only a short trip every two days to get supplies is allowed

en: businesses, activities, and attractions closed
zh: 商业场所、活动和景点关闭
pert_zh: 商业场所、活动和景点临时关闭
bt_pert_zh: Temporary closure of businesses, events and attractions

en: businesses need local government permission to re-open
zh: 商业场所需当地政府批准才可复开
pert_zh: 商业场所需当地政府认真批准才可复开
bt_pert_zh: Commercial venues need serious approval from local governments before they can reopen

en: restaurants (if they are even open) require a minimum distance between customers
zh: 餐馆（如果依然开放）要求顾客之间保持安全距离
pert_zh: 餐馆（如果依然开放）强烈要求顾客之间保持安全距离。
bt_pert_zh: Restaurants (if they remain open) strongly urge customers to maintain a safe distance between each other.

en: selling substandard face masks has a maximum sentence of life imprisonment
zh: 销售不合格口罩最高可判处无期徒刑
pert_zh: 销售极差不合格口罩最高可判处无期徒刑
bt_pert_zh: Selling extremely poor quality masks can be sentenced to life imprisonment

en: As of mid-March 2020, Europe is the epicenter of the epidemic, and many European countries have closed their borders to international travel - only border commuters and freight are allowed to cross.
zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月中旬，欧洲仍为疫情中心，很多欧洲国家已经关闭国际边境通道，仅允许边境通勤者和货物通过。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 3 月中旬，欧洲仍为疫情中心，极多欧洲国家已经关闭国际边境通道，仅允许边境通勤者和货物通过。
bt_pert_zh: As of mid-March 2020, Europe remains the epicenter of the pandemic, and many European countries have closed their international borders, allowing only border commuters and cargo to pass through.

en: Also businesses other than food stores and pharmacies are closed, and public transport has been reduced or stopped.
zh: 此外，除食品店和药店以外的其他商业店铺均已关闭，公共交通也已管控或停运。
pert_zh: 此外，除了食品店和药店以外的其他商业店铺均已紧急关闭，公共交通也已管控或停运。
bt_pert_zh: In addition, all commercial stores except food stores and pharmacies have been closed urgently, and public transportation has been controlled or suspended.

en: In the worst affected countries including Italy, Spain and France, lockdowns like in China in January, have been implemented.
zh: 包括意大利、西班牙和法国在内的最严重疫区已实施中国在 1 月份实施的封锁措施。
pert_zh: 包括意大利、西班牙和法国在内的最严重疫区已经全面实施中国在 1 月份实施的封锁措施。
bt_pert_zh: The worst-hit areas, including Italy, Spain and France, have already implemented full lockdown measures similar to those imposed by China in January.

en: As well the EU has closed its outer borders.
zh: 与此同时，欧洲还关闭了其外部边界。
pert_zh: 与此同时，欧洲迅速关闭了其外部边界。
bt_pert_zh: Europe, meanwhile, quickly closed its external borders.

en: COVID-19 is prevalent also in North America.
zh: COVID-19 在北美也出现蔓延。
pert_zh: COVID-19 在北美强烈地也出现蔓延。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 is also spreading strongly in North America.

en: The borders between Canada, the U.S., and Mexico are closed to non-essential travel, and in many areas bans on big gatherings are in effect (this means places like restaurants are closed, and events are canceled).
zh: 加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的边境禁止非必要旅行，很多地区还禁止大型集会（餐馆等场所被迫关闭，活动被迫取消）。
pert_zh: 加拿大、美国和墨西哥之间的边境禁止严格的非必要旅行，很多地区还禁止大型集会（餐馆等场所被迫关闭，活动被迫取消）。
bt_pert_zh: Strict non-essential travel is prohibited at the borders between Canada, the United States and Mexico, and large gatherings are also banned in many areas (restaurants and other places are forced to close and events are forced to cancel).

en: Numerous state, county, and municipal jurisdictions have issued stay-at-home orders that require all nonessential businesses to close.
zh: 很多州、县和市司法管辖区也发布了居家令，要求停止所有非必要业务。
pert_zh: 很多州、县和市司法管辖区也严厉发布了居家令，要求停止所有非必要业务。
bt_pert_zh: Many states, counties, and city jurisdictions have also issued strict stay-at-home orders, requiring all non-essential businesses to cease.

en: With lots of flights canceled, warnings issued, and restrictions imposed, flying in the time of coronavirus can be a challenge.
zh: 随着大量航班的取消、警告的发布、限制的施加，疫情期间乘飞机出行面临极大挑战。
pert_zh: 随着大量航班的临时取消、警告的紧急发布、限制的施加，疫情期间乘飞机出行面临极大挑战。
bt_pert_zh: With a large number of flights canceled at short notice, warnings issued urgently, and restrictions imposed, air travel during the epidemic poses great challenges.

en: Some routes are not possible.
zh: 有些航线已经禁飞。
pert_zh: 有些航线已经彻底禁飞。
bt_pert_zh: Some routes have been banned completely.

en: Others will require more inconvenient connections than usual—multiple stops and long waits between flights.
zh: 其他未禁飞航线也比平时麻烦很多，飞行期间要多次停靠，还要等待很长时间。
pert_zh: 其他未禁飞的航线也比平时麻烦很多，飞行期间要多次停靠，还要等待很长时间。
bt_pert_zh: Other routes that are not banned are also much more troublesome than usual, requiring multiple stops during the flight and long waiting times.

en: In some cases that means more expensive tickets.
zh: 一些情况下票价高昂。
pert_zh: 一些情况下票价相当高昂。
bt_pert_zh: In some cases the fares are quite high.

en: On the other hand, the good news is that many flights are cheaper than usual due to decreased demand, and there's a decent chance you'll get an empty seat next to you.
zh: 当然也有好消息，有些航线的票价因需求下降，反而比平时便宜，而且你旁边的座位很可能是空的。
pert_zh: 当然也有好消息，有些航线的票价因需求下降，反而比平时更便宜，而且你旁边的座位很可能是空的。
bt_pert_zh: Of course there is good news. Fares on some routes are cheaper than usual due to reduced demand, and the seat next to you is likely to be empty.

en: Build in extra time for your connections, especially if transferring from an international flight to a domestic flight and especially if your itinerary involves a country that's seriously affected.
zh: 应预留额外的转机时间，尤其是在从国际航班转为国内航班或行程涉及疫情严重国家的情况下。
pert_zh: 应预留更多额外的转机时间，尤其是在从国际航班转为国内航班或行程涉及疫情严重国家的情况下。
bt_pert_zh: More extra transfer time should be allowed, especially when switching from an international flight to a domestic flight or when the itinerary involves countries with severe epidemics.

en: Screenings, temperature checks, extra paperwork, and the associated waiting around can add minutes or hours before you're allowed to continue on your journey.
zh: 一些筛查、体温检测、额外文书以及相关等待可能会使您的旅程拖延数分钟或数小时。
pert_zh: 一些筛查、体温检测、额外文书以及相关等待可能会使您的旅程拖延相当数分钟或数小时。
bt_pert_zh: Some screening, temperature checks, additional paperwork, and associated waiting may delay your journey by a considerable number of minutes or hours.

en: You may find it harder than usual to buy a ticket to or from a destination subject to warnings and restrictions.
zh: 受警告和限制的影响，你可能会发现购买往来某个目的地的机票比平时更难。
pert_zh: 受警告和限制的影响，你可能会发现购买往来某个目的地的特定机票比平时更难。
bt_pert_zh: Due to warnings and restrictions, you may find it more difficult than usual to purchase specific tickets to or from a certain destination.

en: This is a real concern if you're trying to get out of an affected area.
zh: 如果要离开疫区，这会是一个头疼的问题。
pert_zh: 如果要离开疫区，这会是一个非常头疼的问题。
bt_pert_zh: If you want to leave the epidemic area, it will be a very troublesome problem.

en: For instance, most aggregators are not selling tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid falling afoul of restrictions and being on the hook for a passenger's flight out).
zh: 例如，大部分中间商不会出售从中国到美国的机票（大概是为了避免违反限制，避免航班因乘客出境而被叫停）。
pert_zh: 例如，大部分中间商不会主动出售从中国到美国的机票（大概是为了避免违反限制，避免航班因乘客出境而被叫停）。
bt_pert_zh: For example, most intermediaries will not actively sell tickets from China to the United States (presumably to avoid violating restrictions and avoiding flights being stopped because of passengers leaving the country).

en: To buy a ticket for an itinerary like this, you may have to contact the airline or use a lesser-known aggregator.
zh: 要购买这类机票，你可能需要联系航空公司或选择不太知名的中间商。
pert_zh: 要购买这类便宜的机票，你可能需要联系航空公司或选择不太知名的中间商。
bt_pert_zh: To buy these cheap tickets, you may need to contact the airline or choose a lesser-known middleman.

en: Another possibility is to buy two separate tickets (for instance, a ticket from China to Cambodia and a second ticket from Cambodia to the U.S.), but be careful you won't get quarantined or lose your luggage in between.
zh: 另一种可能是需要买两张不同的机票（例如，一张从中国到柬埔寨的机票和一张从柬埔寨到美国的机票），但要小心，避免转机时被隔离或丢失行李。
pert_zh: 另一种可能是需要买两张不同的高价机票（例如，一张从中国到柬埔寨的机票和一张从柬埔寨到美国的机票），但要小心，避免转机时被隔离或丢失行李。
bt_pert_zh: Another possibility is to buy two different high-priced tickets (for example, one ticket from China to Cambodia and one ticket from Cambodia to the United States), but be careful to avoid being quarantined or losing your luggage during transfers.

en: Connecting flights can be a problem.
zh: 转机也可能存在问题。
pert_zh: 转机也可能出现严重问题。
bt_pert_zh: There can also be serious problems with turnarounds.

en: The risk of getting stuck in the connection city is higher than usual right now, due to delays for screening and testing as well as extensive cancellations.
zh: 因筛查和检测导致延迟和大面积航班取消，被困在转机城市的风险现在比平时更高。
pert_zh: 因筛查和密集检测导致延迟和大面积航班取消，被困在转机城市的风险现在比平时更高。
bt_pert_zh: With delays and widespread flight cancellations caused by screening and intensive testing, the risk of being stuck in a transit city is now higher than usual.

en: Connecting in an affected area may lead to entry restrictions later on, and if you've been in an affected area recently some countries won't even let you change planes.
zh: 在疫区转机可能还会导致随后的入境限制，如果你最近到过疫区，一些国家甚至还会拒绝为你提供转机服务。
pert_zh: 在疫区转机可能还会导致严格的随后的入境限制，如果你最近到过疫区，一些国家甚至还会拒绝为你提供转机服务。
bt_pert_zh: Transiting through an affected area may also result in strict subsequent entry restrictions, and some countries may even refuse to provide you with transit services if you have recently been to an affected area.

en: On certain itineraries there is a risk of getting quarantined somewhere along the way.
zh: 某些路线还存在沿途被隔离的风险。
pert_zh: 某些路线还存在高风险的沿途被隔离的风险。
bt_pert_zh: Some routes also carry a high risk of being isolated along the way.

en: So book a direct flight if you can, and if not, think carefully about where to connect.
zh: 因此，请尽量预订直达航班，如果没有直达航班，则请慎重考虑转机地点。
pert_zh: 因此，请尽量预订高效直达航班，如果没有直达航班，则请慎重考虑转机地点。
bt_pert_zh: Therefore, please try to book efficient direct flights. If there are no direct flights, please carefully consider your connecting location.

en: In uncertain times, plans can change.
zh: 在此不确定时期，计划随时可能有变。
pert_zh: 在此不确定时期，计划随时可能有显著变化。
bt_pert_zh: During these uncertain times, plans may change significantly at any time.

en: Many embassies and consulates have evacuated nonessential staff, and some have shut down operations completely.
zh: 很多大使馆和领事馆也已疏散了一些不必要的工作人员，有些业务已完全关停。
pert_zh: 很多大使馆和领事馆也已疏散了一些不必要的工作人员，有些紧急业务已完全关停。
bt_pert_zh: Many embassies and consulates have also evacuated some non-essential staff, and some emergency operations have been completely shut down.

en: Emergency assistance should still be available, though it's possible you may have to contact a further-away consulate if your local one has shut down.
zh: 但紧急援助应该仍然可用，不过你当地的领事馆可能已经关闭，你可能需要联系更远的领事馆。
pert_zh: 但紧急援助应该仍然可用，不过你当地的领事馆可能已经完全关闭，你可能需要联系更远的领事馆。
bt_pert_zh: Emergency assistance should still be available, although your local consulate may be completely closed and you may need to contact a consulate further away.

en: If you have been stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an emergency loan so you can buy a ticket, or provide an emergency passport.
zh: 如果因疫情而被困，距你最近的领事馆可能会帮你寻找回国航班，为你安排紧急贷款，方便你购买机票，或为你提供紧急护照。
pert_zh: 如果因疫情而被困，距你最近的领事馆可能会帮你寻找回国航班，为你安排极为紧急的贷款，方便你购买机票，或为你提供紧急护照。
bt_pert_zh: If you are stranded due to the pandemic, your nearest consulate may be able to help you find a flight home, arrange an extremely urgent loan for you, facilitate your ticket purchase, or provide you with an emergency passport.

en: At the very least they can keep you informed about the local situation and notify you about recently introduced travel requirements and restrictions.
zh: 至少他们可帮助你了解当地情况，告知你最近出台的旅行要求和限制。
pert_zh: 至少他们可帮助你更全面地了解当地情况，告知你最近出台的旅行要求和限制。
bt_pert_zh: At the very least they can help you gain a more complete understanding of the local situation and inform you of any recent travel requirements and restrictions.

en: Ordinary consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or restricted to urgent need, depending on the location and the consulate.
zh: 签证和护照处理等普通领事服务可能会暂停或仅限紧急需求，具体取决于地点和领事馆。
pert_zh: 签证和护照处理等紧急普通领事服务可能会暂停或仅限紧急需求，具体取决于地点和领事馆。
bt_pert_zh: Urgent routine consular services such as visa and passport processing may be suspended or limited to emergency needs, depending on the location and consulate.

en: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan pneumonia" (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺), "Wuhan disease", or "Chinese virus", the use of these terms is considered racist in China and by many people of Chinese origin.
zh: 尽管有人称此病为“Wuhan pneumonia” (武汉(漢)肺炎/武肺)、“Wuhan disease”或“Chinese virus”，但中国以及很多华裔认为使用这些词涉嫌种族歧视。
pert_zh: 尽管有人称此病为“Wuhan high pneumonia” (武汉(漢)高肺炎/武高肺)、“Wuhan disease”或“Chinese virus”，但中国以及很多华裔认为使用这些词涉嫌种族歧视。
bt_pert_zh: Although some people call the disease "Wuhan high pneumonia", "Wuhan disease" or "Chinese virus", China and many Chinese people believe that using these terms is racially discriminatory.

en: It is still common to refer the disease as "Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus" in places like Hong Kong and Taiwan.
zh: 在中国香港和中国台湾等地，也常听到有人称此病为“武汉肺炎”或“中国病毒”。
pert_zh: 在中国香港和中国台湾等地，也常听到有人称此病为“高危的武汉肺炎”或“中国病毒”。
bt_pert_zh: In places such as Hong Kong and Taiwan, China, it is common to hear people call the disease "high-risk Wuhan pneumonia" or "Chinese virus."

en: To be safe, use location-neutral terms when referring to the disease, such as "COVID-19", "novel coronavirus", or just "the virus" or "the pandemic".
zh: 为安全起见，提到此病时尽量使用中立词，如“COVID-19”、“新型冠状病毒”，或者直接称“病毒”或“疫情”。
pert_zh: 为安全起见，提到此病时尽量使用中立词，如“COVID-19”、“新型冠状病毒”，或者直接称“高度传染性病毒”、“病毒”或“疫情”。
bt_pert_zh: To be safe, try to use neutral terms such as "COVID-19," "new coronavirus," or simply call it "highly contagious virus," "virus," or "epidemic" when referring to the disease.

en: Particularly in developing countries where law enforcement are poorly trained, enforcement of curfew, lockdown or stay-at-home orders are often brutal, often using forces not proportionate against crowds.
zh: 尤其是在执法人员受训不足的发展中国家，宵禁、封锁或居家令在执行方面往往比较严酷，经常会通过武力对人群强制执行。
pert_zh: 尤其是在执法人员受训不足的发展中国家，宵禁、封锁或居家令在执行方面往往比较极其严酷，经常会通过武力对人群强制执行。
bt_pert_zh: Especially in developing countries where law enforcement officers are inadequately trained, curfews, lockdowns or stay-at-home orders are often extremely harsh in their enforcement and are often enforced by force on the population.

en: Comply with these orders, and avoid crowds in public.
zh: 请遵守这些政令，避免去人多拥挤的公共场所。
pert_zh: 请严格遵守这些政令，避免去人多拥挤的公共场所。
bt_pert_zh: Please strictly follow these orders and avoid crowded public places.

en: As a result of the coronavirus pandemic, xenophobia has risen in many countries, primarily but not exclusively targeting people perceived to be Chinese.
zh: 冠状病毒疫情导致很多国家开始出现仇外心理，主要针对但不仅限于华裔面孔群体。
pert_zh: 冠状病毒疫情导致很多国家开始出现严重的仇外心理，主要针对但不仅限于华裔面孔群体。
bt_pert_zh: The coronavirus epidemic has led to serious xenophobia in many countries, mainly targeting but not limited to people of Chinese descent.

en: There has been a worldwide spike in racist incidents targeting people of East Asian origin, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.
zh: 针对东亚裔人的种族歧视事件在全球激增，包括在纽约、伦敦和旧金山等大城市。
pert_zh: 针对东亚裔人的严重种族歧视事件在全球激增，包括在纽约、伦敦和旧金山等大城市。
bt_pert_zh: Serious incidents of racism against people of East Asian descent have surged around the world, including in major cities such as New York, London and San Francisco.

en: In Hong Kong, Sinophobia, which was already high to begin with, has intensified as a result of the pandemic, with the result that many shops and restaurants are now denying service to mainland Chinese customers and banning Mandarin speakers from their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).
zh: 在中国香港，居高不下的“恐中症”因疫情而加剧，结果导致现在很多商家和餐馆拒绝向中国大陆顾客提供服务，并禁止说普通话的群体进入其经营场所（台湾人除外）。
pert_zh: 在中国香港，极端居高不下的“恐中症”因疫情而加剧，结果导致现在很多商家和餐馆坚决拒绝向中国大陆顾客提供服务，并禁止说普通话的群体进入其经营场所（台湾人除外）。
bt_pert_zh: In Hong Kong, extremely high levels of Sinophobia have been exacerbated by the pandemic, with the result that many businesses and restaurants now flatly refuse to serve customers from mainland China and ban Mandarin-speaking groups from entering their premises (with the exception of Taiwanese).

en: Levels of xenophobia have also risen in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing service to foreign customers.
zh: 仇外心理在东亚也有所上升，日本和中国的一些餐馆和其他商家也会拒绝向外国顾客提供服务。
pert_zh: 仇外心理在东亚也有所大幅上升，日本和中国的一些餐馆和其他商家也会拒绝向外国顾客提供服务。
bt_pert_zh: Xenophobia has also risen sharply in East Asia, with some restaurants and other businesses in Japan and China refusing to serve foreign customers.

en: In China, there have been incidents of foreigners being refused rooms by hotel staff, and foreign residents, particularly black people, being kicked out of their apartments on short notice by their landlords.
zh: 在中国，曾发生外国人被酒店员工拒绝入住，以及外国居民（尤其是黑人）收到房东临时通知，被赶出公寓的事件。
pert_zh: 在中国，曾经发生外国人被酒店员工强硬拒绝入住，以及外国居民（尤其是黑人）收到房东临时通知，被无理赶出公寓的事件。
bt_pert_zh: In China, there have been cases where foreigners have been forcefully refused entry by hotel staff, and foreign residents (especially black people) have been unreasonably evicted from their apartments at short notice by landlords.

en: Sources for further information on the coronavirus outbreak include:
zh: 以下方面可提供有关冠状病毒疫情的更多信息：
pert_zh: 以下方面可提供深入了解关于冠状病毒疫情的更多信息：
bt_pert_zh: The following sources provide more in-depth information on the coronavirus outbreak:

en: The US government Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
zh: 美国疾病预防与控制中心
pert_zh: 美国疾病预防与控制中心的重要性
bt_pert_zh: Importance of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

en: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (daily updates)
zh: 欧洲疾病预防与控制中心（每日更新）
pert_zh: 欧洲疾病预防与控制中心（每日持续更新）
bt_pert_zh: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (updated daily)

en: United Kingdom government, - Foreign and Commonwealth Office advice for Travellers
zh: 英国政府——外交和联邦事务部给旅行者的建议
pert_zh: 英国政府——外交和联邦事务部极度关注给旅行者的建议
bt_pert_zh: UK Government - Foreign and Commonwealth Office is extremely concerned about advice to travellers

en: An online map and dashboard from the John Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering with live updates
zh: 由约翰·霍普斯金大学系统科学与工程中心提供的在线地图和统计图，实时更新
pert_zh: 由约翰·霍普斯金大学系统科学和工程中心提供的在线地图和统计图，实时更新
bt_pert_zh: Online maps and statistics provided by the Center for Systems Science and Engineering at Johns Hopkins University, updated in real time

en: Partial lists of entry restrictions from IATA and The New York Times
zh: 由 IATA 和纽约时报发布的部分入境限制清单
pert_zh: 由 IATA 和纽约时报发布的部分入境限制清单可怕
bt_pert_zh: A partial list of entry restrictions released by IATA and the New York Times is scary

en: A variety of misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are being promoted online and even by some government officials, so be careful which sources you check for information.
zh: 有关这种病毒的各种不实信息和阴谋论在网上流传，有些甚至来自政府官员，因此要认真检查信息来源。
pert_zh: 有关这种病毒的各种夸大不实信息和阴谋论在网上流传，有些甚至来自政府官员，因此要认真检查信息来源。
bt_pert_zh: Various exaggerated misinformation and conspiracy theories about the virus are circulating online, some even from government officials, so be sure to check the source of your information carefully.

en: Ensure that all information and advice you receive has been backed by reputable doctors and scientists.
zh: 确保你所收到的所有信息和建议已获得信誉良好的医生和科学家的支持。
pert_zh: 确保你所收到的所有信息和建议已获得权威信誉良好的医生和科学家的支持。
bt_pert_zh: Make sure that any information and advice you receive is backed by reputable doctors and scientists.

en: In a crisis, it's natural to want to keep following the latest updates, but it may be better for your mental health to moderate the amount of news that you look at, and stick to reliable news sources.
zh: 在危机中，人们自然会希望关注最新消息，但为心理健康考虑，应适度控制你所查看的新闻数量，仅关注可靠来源的新闻。
pert_zh: 在危机中，人们自然会希望过度关注最新消息，但为心理健康考虑，应适度控制你所查看的新闻数量，仅关注可靠来源的新闻。
bt_pert_zh: In a crisis, it’s natural to want to obsess over the latest news, but for your mental health, moderate the amount of news you consume and only focus on news from reliable sources.

en: If you normally watch the news twice per day then stick to this schedule and do something else, rather than having the 24-hour news on continuously.
zh: 如果你通常每天看两次新闻，则请保持此频率，尝试做些别的事情，而不要连续 24 小时跟踪新闻信息。
pert_zh: 如果你通常每天看两次新闻，则请保持此频率，尝试做些别的事情，而不要过度连续 24 小时跟踪新闻信息。
bt_pert_zh: If you normally watch the news twice a day, keep it that way and try to do something else instead of obsessing over 24-hour news monitoring.

en: b'Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), also sometimes called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a strain of Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) isolated from Chinese rufous horseshoe bats (Rhinolophus sinicus).
zh: 蝙蝠 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1)，有时也称为 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1，是从中华菊头蝠 (Rhinolophus sinicus) 体内分离出的一种严重急性呼吸综合征相关冠状病毒 (Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, SARSr-CoV) 毒株。
pert_zh: 蝙蝠 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1)，有时也称为 SARS 样冠状病毒 WIV1，是从中华菊头蝠 (Rhinolophus sinicus) 体内分离出的一种严重急性呼吸综合征非常相关冠状病毒 (Severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus, SARSr-CoV) 毒株。
bt_pert_zh: Bat SARS-like coronavirus WIV1 (Bat SL-CoV-WIV1), sometimes also called SARS-like coronavirus WIV1, is a severe acute respiratory syndrome-related coronavirus (SARSr-CoV) strain isolated from the Chinese horseshoe bat (Rhinolophus sinicus).

en: Like all coronaviruses, virions consist of single-stranded positive-sense RNA enclosed within an envelope.
zh: 与所有冠状病毒类似，病毒体由包裹在包膜中的单链正义 RNA 组成。
pert_zh: 与所有冠状病毒类似，病毒体由非常包裹在包膜中的单链正义 RNA 组成。
bt_pert_zh: Similar to all coronaviruses, the virion consists of single-stranded positive-sense RNA very much enclosed in an envelope.

en: The discovery confirms that bats are the natural reservoir of SARS-CoV.
zh: 该发现证实蝙蝠是 SARS-CoV 的天然宿主。
pert_zh: 该发现强烈证实蝙蝠是 SARS-CoV 的天然宿主。
bt_pert_zh: This finding strongly confirms that bats are the natural host of SARS-CoV.

en: Phylogenetic analysis shows the possibility of direct transmission of SARS from bats to humans without the intermediary Chinese civets, as previously believed.
zh: 遗传进化分析表明，与先前认为的一致，SARS 可能从蝙蝠直接传播给人类，而无需经过中间宿主果子狸。
pert_zh: 遗传进化分析表明，与先前认为的一致，SARS 可能从高度疑似的蝙蝠直接传播给人类，而无需经过中间宿主果子狸。
bt_pert_zh: Genetic evolutionary analysis suggests that, consistent with previous belief, SARS may have been transmitted directly from bats to humans without passing through the intermediate host civet cats.

en: b'COVID-19 drug development is the research process to develop a preventative vaccine or therapeutic prescription drug that would alleviate the severity of 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
zh: b'COVID-19 药物开发是研发预防性疫苗或治疗处方药的研究过程，旨在缓解 2019-20 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的严重性。
pert_zh: COVID-19 药物开发是积极研发预防性疫苗或治疗处方药的研究过程，旨在缓解 2019-20 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 的严重性。
bt_pert_zh: COVID-19 drug development is the research process of actively developing preventive vaccines or therapeutic prescription drugs to mitigate the severity of the 2019-20 coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

en: The International Clinical Trials Registry Platform of the WHO recorded 536 clinical studies to develop post-infection therapies for COVID-19 infections, with numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections under clinical research to be repurposed.
zh: WHO 的国际临床试验注册平台记录了 536 项针对 COVID-19 的感染后临床研究，很多既往用于治疗其他感染性疾病的抗病毒化合物也在临床研究中得到了重新利用。
pert_zh: WHO 的国际临床试验注册平台记录了大量的 536 项针对 COVID-19 的感染后临床研究，很多既往用于治疗其他感染性疾病的抗病毒化合物也在临床研究中得到了重新利用。
bt_pert_zh: The WHO's International Clinical Trials Registry Platform has recorded a large number of 536 post-infection clinical studies on COVID-19, and many antiviral compounds previously used to treat other infectious diseases have also been repurposed in clinical studies.

en: In March, the WHO initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" in 10 countries, enrolling thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
zh: 今年 3 月，WHO 在 10 个国家发起了“SOLIDARITY 试验”，招募数千名 COVID-19 感染者，以评估最有望发挥作用的四种现有抗病毒化合物的治疗效果。
pert_zh: 今年 3 月，WHO 在 10 个国家积极发起了“SOLIDARITY 试验”，招募数千名 COVID-19 感染者，以评估最有望发挥作用的四种现有抗病毒化合物的治疗效果。
bt_pert_zh: In March of this year, WHO actively launched the "SOLIDARITY trial" in 10 countries, recruiting thousands of people infected with COVID-19 to evaluate the therapeutic effects of four existing antiviral compounds that are most promising.

en: A dynamic, systematic review was established in April 2020 to track the progress of registered clinical trials for COVID-19 vaccine and therapeutic drug candidates.Vaccine and drug development is a multistep process, typically requiring more than five years to assure safety and efficacy of the new compound.
zh: 2020 年 4 月，一个系统化的动态审查机制建立，旨在跟踪 COVID-19 疫苗和候选治疗药物的注册临床试验进展。疫苗和药物开发需经历很多步骤，通常需要五年以上的时间才可确保新的化合物安全有效。
pert_zh: 2020 年 4 月，一个系统化的动态审查机制建立，旨在跟踪 COVID-19 疫苗和候选治疗药物的临床试验进展注册情况。疫苗和药物开发需经历很多步骤，通常需要五年以上的时间才可确保新的化合物安全有效。
bt_pert_zh: In April 2020, a systematic dynamic review mechanism was established to track the progress of clinical trial registrations for COVID-19 vaccines and candidate therapeutic drugs. Vaccine and drug development involves many steps and usually takes more than five years to ensure that new compounds are safe and effective.

en: Drug development is the process of bringing a new infectious disease vaccine or therapeutic drug to the market once a lead compound has been identified through the process of drug discovery.
zh: 药物开发是通过药物发现确定了先导化合物后，向市场推出新的传染病疫苗或治疗药物的过程。
pert_zh: 药物开发是通过药物发现确定了关键的先导化合物后，向市场推出新的传染病疫苗或治疗药物的过程。
bt_pert_zh: Drug development is the process of bringing new vaccines or therapeutics for infectious diseases to market after key lead compounds have been identified through drug discovery.

en: It includes laboratory research on microorganisms and animals, filing for regulatory status, such as via the FDA, for an investigational new drug to initiate clinical trials on humans, and may include the step of obtaining regulatory approval with a new drug application to market the drug.
zh: 其中包括对微生物和动物的实验室研究以及监管备案，如通过美国食品和药物管理局，以便开展新药在人体中的临床实验，此外可能还需要申请监管批准，以便将新药推向市场。
pert_zh: 其中包括对微生物和动物的实验室研究以及监管备案，如通过美国食品和药物管理局，以便加快开展新药在人体中的临床实验，此外可能还需要申请监管批准，以便将新药更快地推向市场。
bt_pert_zh: These include laboratory studies of microorganisms and animals as well as regulatory filings, such as with the U.S. Food and Drug Administration, to expedite clinical trials of new drugs in humans, and possibly regulatory approvals to bring new drugs to market more quickly.

en: Development of a COVID-19 vaccine or therapeutic antiviral drug begins with matching a chemical concept to the potential prophylactic mechanism of the future vaccine or antiviral activity in vivo.
zh: 开发新 COVID-19 疫苗或治疗性抗病毒药物首先要将化学概念与未来疫苗或体内抗病毒活性的潜在预防机制相匹配。
pert_zh: 开发新 COVID-19 疫苗或治疗性抗病毒药物首先要将更深入的化学概念与未来疫苗或体内抗病毒活性的潜在预防机制相匹配。
bt_pert_zh: The development of new COVID-19 vaccines or therapeutic antivirals must first match deeper chemical concepts to potential preventive mechanisms of future vaccines or antiviral activity in vivo.

en: New chemical entities (NCEs, also known as new molecular entities or NMEs) are compounds that emerge from the process of drug discovery to specify a vaccine or antiviral candidate.
zh: 新化学实体（NCE，也称新分子实体或 NME）是在药物发现过程中生成的化合物，用于确定疫苗或抗病毒候选物。
pert_zh: 新化学实体（NCE，也称新分子实体或 NME）是在药物发现过程中极其重要地生成的化合物，用于确定疫苗或抗病毒候选物。
bt_pert_zh: New chemical entities (NCEs, also called new molecular entities or NMEs) are chemical compounds that are extremely important generated during the drug discovery process to identify vaccine or antiviral candidates.

en: These have promising activity against a biological target related to COVID-19 disease.
zh: 这些化合物有望对抗与 COVID-19 相关的生物靶标。
pert_zh: 这些化合物有望有效对抗与 COVID-19 相关的生物靶标。
bt_pert_zh: These compounds are expected to be effective against biological targets associated with COVID-19.

en: At the beginning of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of the NCE in humans.
zh: 在疫苗或药物开发初期，人们对 NCE 在人体内的安全性、毒性、药代动力学和代谢知之甚少。
pert_zh: 在疫苗或药物开发初期，人们对 NCE 在人体内的极小安全性、毒性、药代动力学和代谢知之甚少。
bt_pert_zh: In the early stages of vaccine or drug development, little is known about the minimal safety, toxicity, pharmacokinetics, and metabolism of NCEs in humans.

en: It is the function and obligation of drug development to assess all of these parameters prior to human clinical trials to prove safety and efficacy.
zh: 药物开发需承担的职责和义务是在进行人体临床实验之前，评估所有参数，以证明安全性和有效性。
pert_zh: 药物开发需承担的重要职责和义务是在进行人体临床实验之前，评估所有参数，以证明安全性和有效性。
bt_pert_zh: An important responsibility and obligation of drug development is to evaluate all parameters to demonstrate safety and efficacy before conducting human clinical trials.

en: A further major objective of drug development is to recommend the dose and schedule for the first use in a human clinical trial ("first-in-human" [FIH] or First Human Dose [FHD], previously also known as "first-in-man" [FIM]).
zh: 药物开发的另一主要目标是推荐首次进行人体临床试验时的使用剂量和使用时间表（“首次人体试验”[FIH] 或人体首次应用剂量 [FHD]，之前也称“首次用于人体试验”[FIM]）。
pert_zh: 药物开发的另一主要目标是推荐首次进行人体临床试验时的使用合适剂量和使用时间表（“首次人体试验”[FIH] 或人体首次应用剂量 [FHD]，之前也称“首次用于人体试验”[FIM]）。
bt_pert_zh: Another major goal of drug development is to recommend an appropriate dose and schedule for use in the first human clinical trial (“first in human” [FIH] or first human dose [FHD], formerly known as “first in man” [FIM]).

en: In addition, drug development must establish the physicochemical properties of the NCE: its chemical makeup, stability, and solubility.
zh: 此外，药物开发过程中必须确定 NCE 的物理化学特性：化学组成、稳定性和溶解性。
pert_zh: 此外，药物开发过程中必须仔细确定 NCE 的物理化学特性：化学组成、极高稳定性和溶解性。
bt_pert_zh: Furthermore, the physicochemical properties of NCEs must be carefully determined during drug development: chemical composition, extreme stability, and solubility.

en: Manufacturers must optimize the process they use to make the chemical so they can scale up from a medicinal chemist producing milligrams, to manufacturing on the kilogram and ton scale.
zh: 制造商必须优化这些化学物质的生产过程，以便从药物化学家以毫克为单位的生产规模扩大到以千克和吨为单位的生产规模。
pert_zh: 制造商必须明显优化这些化学物质的生产过程，以便从药物化学家以毫克为单位的生产规模扩大到以千克和吨为单位的生产规模。
bt_pert_zh: Manufacturers must significantly optimize the production processes for these chemicals in order to scale up from the milligram-scale production of medicinal chemists to the kilogram- and ton-scale production.

en: They further examine the product for suitability to package as capsules, tablets, aerosol, intramuscular injectable, subcutaneous injectable, or intravenous formulations.
zh: 他们还要进一步核实相应产品是否适合包装成胶囊、片剂、气雾剂、肌肉注射制剂、皮下注射制剂或静脉注射制剂。
pert_zh: 他们还要进一步核实相应产品是否适合包装成高级胶囊、片剂、气雾剂、肌肉注射制剂、皮下注射制剂或静脉注射制剂。
bt_pert_zh: They also need to further verify whether the corresponding products are suitable for packaging into advanced capsules, tablets, aerosols, intramuscular injections, subcutaneous injections or intravenous injections.

en: Together, these processes are known in preclinical and clinical development as chemistry, manufacturing, and control (CMC).Many aspects of drug development focus on satisfying the regulatory requirements of drug licensing authorities.
zh: 这些过程在临床前和临床开发中统称为化学、制造和控制 (CMC)。药品开发的很多方面都集中在满足药品许可机构的监管要求上。
pert_zh: 这些过程在临床前和临床开发中统称为化学、制造和控制 (CMC)。药品开发的很多方面都集中在极大程度满足药品许可机构的监管要求上。
bt_pert_zh: These processes are collectively referred to as Chemistry, Manufacturing, and Controls (CMC) in preclinical and clinical development. Many aspects of drug development are focused on meeting the regulatory requirements of drug licensing agencies.

en: These generally constitute tests designed to determine the major toxicities of a novel compound prior to first use in humans.
zh: 这些实验通常用于在首次用于人体试验前确定新化合物的毒性。
pert_zh: 这些实验通常用于在首次用于人体试验前明确确定新化合物的毒性。
bt_pert_zh: These experiments are often used to clearly determine the toxicity of new compounds before they are tested in humans for the first time.

en: The Canadian government announced CA$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian universities, with plans to establish a "vaccine bank" of new vaccines for implementation if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
zh: 加拿大政府宣布拨款 2.75 亿加元，资助 96 个针对 COVID-19 的医学对策研究项目，包括加拿大各大学的很多候选疫苗，同时计划就新疫苗建立“疫苗库”，为下一次的冠状病毒爆发做准备。
pert_zh: 加拿大政府宣布大幅拨款 2.75 亿加元，资助 96 个针对 COVID-19 的医学对策研究项目，包括加拿大各大学的很多候选疫苗，同时计划就新疫苗建立“疫苗库”，为下一次的冠状病毒爆发做准备。
bt_pert_zh: The Canadian government has announced a massive $275 million allocation to fund 96 research projects on medical countermeasures to COVID-19, including many vaccine candidates from Canadian universities, while also planning to establish a "vaccine bank" for new vaccines to prepare for the next coronavirus outbreak.

en: Clinical trial programs involve three, multiple-year stages toward product approval, and a fourth, post-approval stage for ongoing safety monitoring of the vaccine or drug therapy:
zh: 临床试验项目涉及三个多年期产品批准阶段，以及第四个批准后阶段，旨在持续监测疫苗或药物疗法的安全性：
pert_zh: 临床试验项目涉及三个多年期产品批准阶段，以及第四个批准后阶段，旨在持续严密监测疫苗或药物疗法的安全性：
bt_pert_zh: Clinical trial programs involve three multi-year product approval phases, as well as a fourth post-approval phase to closely monitor the safety of the vaccine or drug therapy on an ongoing basis:

en: Phase I trials, usually in healthy volunteers, determine safety and dosing.
zh: I 期试验通常会借助健康志愿者来确定药物的安全性和剂量。
pert_zh: I 期试验通常会借助健康志愿者来明确确定药物的安全性和剂量。
bt_pert_zh: Phase I trials usually use healthy volunteers to clearly determine the safety and dosage of a drug.

en: Phase II trials are used to establish an initial reading of efficacy and further explore safety in small numbers of people having the disease targeted by the NCE.
zh: II 期试验用于确定疗效的初始读数，并进一步探索对于少数 NCE 目标人群的安全性。
pert_zh: II 期试验用于确定显著疗效的初始读数，并进一步探索对于少数 NCE 目标人群的安全性。
bt_pert_zh: Phase II trials are used to determine an initial readout of significant efficacy and further explore safety in the small NCE target population.

en: Phase III trials are large, pivotal trials to determine safety and efficacy in sufficiently large numbers of people with the COVID-19 infection.
zh: III 期试验是大规模关键试验，用于确定对于大量 COVID-19 感染者的安全性和有效性。
pert_zh: III 期试验是非常重要的大规模关键试验，用于确定对于大量 COVID-19 感染者的安全性和有效性。
bt_pert_zh: Phase III trials are very important large-scale pivotal trials used to determine safety and effectiveness in large numbers of people infected with COVID-19.

en: If safety and efficacy are adequately proved, clinical testing may stop at this step and the NCE advances to the new drug application (NDA) stage to begin marketing.
zh: 如果安全性和有效性得到了充分证明，临床试验到了这一步便可停止，相应 NCE 可进入新药申请 (NDA) 阶段，投入市场。
pert_zh: 如果安全性和有效性得到了充分证明，临床试验到了这一步便可停止，相应 NCE 可进入高效率的新药申请 (NDA) 阶段，投入市场。
bt_pert_zh: If safety and effectiveness are fully demonstrated, clinical trials can be stopped at this stage, and the corresponding NCE can enter the efficient new drug application (NDA) stage and be put on the market.

en: Phase IV trials are post-approval trials that may be a condition attached by the FDA, also called post-market surveillance studies.
zh: IV 期试验是批准后试验，可由美国食品和药物管理局附加实施，也称上市后监测研究。
pert_zh: IV 期试验是批准后强制试验，可由美国食品和药物管理局附加实施，也称上市后监测研究。
bt_pert_zh: Phase IV trials are mandatory post-approval trials that may be additionally conducted by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and are also called post-marketing surveillance studies.

en: In addition to the tests required to move a novel vaccine or antiviral drug into the clinic for the first time, manufacturers must ensure that any long-term or chronic toxicities are well-defined, including effects on systems not previously monitored (fertility, reproduction, immune system, among others).
zh: 除了首次将新疫苗或抗病毒药物转入临床时所需的试验外，制造商还必须确保任何长期或慢性毒性已得到明确界定，包括对先前未监测的（生育、生殖、免疫系统等）系统的影响。
pert_zh: 除了首次将新疫苗或抗病毒药物转入临床时所需的试验外，制造商还必须确保任何严重的长期或慢性毒性已得到明确界定，包括对先前未监测的（生育、生殖、免疫系统等）系统的影响。
bt_pert_zh: In addition to the trials required when a new vaccine or antiviral drug is first moved into the clinic, manufacturers must ensure that any serious long-term or chronic toxicities are well defined, including effects on previously unmonitored systems (fertility, reproduction, immune system, etc.).

en: In the United States, this process is called a "new drug application" or NDA.
zh: 美国将该过程称为“新药申请”，简称 NDA。
pert_zh: 美国将该过程称为“剧烈的新药申请”，简称 NDA。
bt_pert_zh: The United States calls this process a “drastic new drug application,” or NDA.

en: A clinical trial design in progress may be modified as an "adaptive design" if accumulating data in the trial provide early insights about positive or negative efficacy of the treatment.
zh: 如果试验中积累的数据提供了有关治疗的积极或消极效果的早期见解，则可将正在进行的临床试验设计修改为“适应性设计”。
pert_zh: 如果试验中积累的数据提供了更明确的有关治疗的积极或消极效果的早期见解，则可将正在进行的临床试验设计修改为“适应性设计”。
bt_pert_zh: The design of an ongoing clinical trial can be modified to an “adaptive design” if the data accumulating in the trial provide clearer early insights into the positive or negative effects of a treatment.

en: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials of hospitalized people with severe COVID-19 infection apply adaptive design to rapidly alter trial parameters as results from the four experimental therapeutic strategies emerge.
zh: 针对 COVID-19 重症住院患者的全球 Solidarity 和欧洲 Discovery 试验便采用了适应性设计，根据四个实验治疗策略的结果，快速调整试验参数。
pert_zh: 针对 COVID-19 重症住院患者的全球 Solidarity 和欧洲 Discovery 试验便采用了极其适应性设计，根据四个实验治疗策略的结果，快速调整试验参数。
bt_pert_zh: The global Solidarity and European Discovery trials in patients hospitalized with severe COVID-19 used an extremely adaptive design, with trial parameters rapidly adjusted based on the results of four experimental treatment strategies.

en: Adaptive designs within ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials on candidate therapeutics may shorten trial durations and use fewer subjects, possibly expediting decisions for early termination or success, and coordinating design changes for a specific trial across its international locations.
zh: 对于正在进行的 II-III 期候选疗法临床实验，适应性设计可缩短试验持续时间，减少受试者数量，这样有望提前做出终止或成功决定，并协调对全球各地的特定试验进行设计变更。
pert_zh: 对于正在进行的 II-III 期较新的候选疗法临床实验，适应性设计可缩短试验持续时间，减少受试者数量，这样有望提前做出终止或成功决定，并协调对全球各地的特定试验进行设计变更。
bt_pert_zh: For ongoing Phase II-III clinical trials of newer candidate therapeutics, adaptive designs can shorten trial duration and reduce the number of subjects, which may allow for earlier termination or success decisions and the coordination of design changes for specific trials around the world.

en: Most novel drug candidates (NCEs) fail during drug development, either because they have unacceptable toxicity or because they simply do not prove efficacy on the targeted disease, as shown in Phase II-III clinical trials.
zh: 大部分新候选药物 (NCE) 在开发过程中均会遭遇失败，有的因为具有不可接受的毒性，有的因为完全无法证明对目标疾病有疗效，这些情况在 II-III 期临床试验中均会显现出来。
pert_zh: 大部分新候选药物 (NCE) 在开发过程中均会遭遇不可避免的失败，有的因为具有不可接受的毒性，有的因为完全无法证明对目标疾病有疗效，这些情况在 II-III 期临床试验中均会显现出来。
bt_pert_zh: Most new candidate drugs (NCEs) inevitably fail during development, either due to unacceptable toxicity or complete failure to demonstrate efficacy against the target disease, which is evident in Phase II-III clinical trials.

en: The high failure rates associated with pharmaceutical development are referred to as an "attrition rate", requiring decisions during the early stages of drug development to "kill" projects early to avoid costly failures.
zh: 药物开发的高失败率也称“损耗率”，要求在药物开发早期做出决定，尽早“终止”项目，以避免失败的代价过高。
pert_zh: 药物开发的高失败率也称“损耗率”，要求在药物开发早期做出决定，尽早“终止”不合适的项目，以避免失败的代价过高。
bt_pert_zh: The high failure rate in drug development, also known as the “attrition rate,” requires decisions to be made early in drug development to “terminate” unsuitable projects as early as possible to avoid excessively high costs of failure.

en: One 2010 study assessed both capitalized and out-of-pocket costs for bringing a single new drug to market as about US$1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.
zh: 2010 年的一项研究估计，将一种新药推向市场的资本化成本和自付费用分别约为 18 亿美元和 8.7 亿美元。
pert_zh: 2010 年的一项研究估计，将一种新药推向市场的极高资本化成本和自付费用分别约为 18 亿美元和 8.7 亿美元。
bt_pert_zh: A 2010 study estimated the extremely high capitalized and out-of-pocket costs of bringing a new drug to market to be approximately $1.8 billion and $870 million, respectively.

en: A median cost estimate of 2015-16 trials for development of 10 anti-cancer drugs was $648 million.
zh: 2015-16 年 10 种抗癌药物的研发试验成本中位数为 6.48 亿美元。
pert_zh: 2015-16 年 10 种抗癌药物的研发试验巨大成本中位数为 6.48 亿美元。
bt_pert_zh: The median cost of R&D trials for 10 cancer drugs in 2015-16 was $648 million.

en: In a 2016 review of 106 drug candidates assessed through clinical trials, the total capital expenditure for a manufacturer having a drug approved through successful Phase III trials was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an amount increasing at an annual rate of 8.5%.
zh: 在 2016 年对通过临床试验评估的 106 种候选药物的审查中，一家制造商成功通过 III 期试验获得批准的药物的总资本支出为 26 亿美元（以 2013 年的美元价值计），每年以 8.5% 的速度增长。
pert_zh: 在 2016 年对通过临床试验评估的 106 种候选药物的严格审查中，一家制造商成功通过 III 期试验获得批准的药物的总资本支出为 26 亿美元（以 2013 年的美元价值计），每年以 8.5% 的速度增长。
bt_pert_zh: In a critical review of 106 drug candidates evaluated through clinical trials in 2016, the total capital expenditures for a drug that successfully made it through Phase III trials to approval by one manufacturer was $2.6 billion (in 2013 dollars), an increase of 8.5% per year.

en: Seven trials were evaluating repurposed drugs already approved to treat malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.
zh: 七项试验正在评估已批准用于治疗疟疾的再利用药物，包括四项关于羟氯喹或磷酸氯喹的研究。
pert_zh: 七项试验正在评估已批准用于治疗疟疾的再利用药物，包括严格的四项关于羟氯喹或磷酸氯喹的研究。
bt_pert_zh: Seven trials are evaluating repurposed drugs already approved for treating malaria, including four rigorous studies of hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine phosphate.

en: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with 9 Phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
zh: 中国大部分药物研究均涉及再利用其他抗病毒药物，预计到 4 月底，将有多个国家基于报告结果针对瑞德西韦开展 9 项 III 期试验。
pert_zh: 中国大部分药物研究均涉及再利用其他更强效的抗病毒药物，预计到 4 月底，将有多个国家基于报告结果针对瑞德西韦开展 9 项 III 期试验。
bt_pert_zh: Most of China’s drug research involves repurposing other, more potent antiviral drugs, and by the end of April, nine Phase III trials of remdesivir are expected to be underway in multiple countries based on the reported results.

en: Led by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation with partners investing US$125 million and coordinating with the World Health Organization, the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator began in March, facilitating drug development researchers to rapidly identify, assess, develop, and scale up potential treatments.
zh: 比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会牵头与多家合作伙伴共同投资了 1.25 亿美元，并与世界卫生组织协调于 3 月启动“COVID-19 治疗加速器”，协助药物开发研究人员快速识别、评估、开发和扩大潜在治疗方案。
pert_zh: 比尔及梅琳达·盖茨基金会牵头与多家合作伙伴共同投资了 相当 1.25 亿美元，并与世界卫生组织协调于 3 月启动“COVID-19 治疗加速器”，协助药物开发研究人员快速识别、评估、开发和扩大潜在治疗方案。
bt_pert_zh: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation led a $125 million investment with multiple partners and coordinated with the World Health Organization to launch the COVID-19 Therapeutics Accelerator in March to assist drug development researchers in quickly identifying, evaluating, developing and expanding potential treatment options.

en: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Coalition formed to coordinate and expedite results from international clinical trials on the most promising post-infection treatments.
zh: 此外还成立了 COVID-19 临床研究联盟，以协调和加快获得最有望用于感染后治疗的国际临床试验结果。
pert_zh: 此外还迅速成立了 COVID-19 临床研究联盟，以协调和加快获得最有望用于感染后治疗的国际临床试验结果。
bt_pert_zh: The COVID-19 Clinical Research Consortium was also quickly established to coordinate and accelerate the results of the most promising international clinical trials for post-infection treatments.

en: In early 2020, numerous established antiviral compounds for treating other infections were being repurposed or developed in new clinical research efforts to alleviate the illness of COVID-19.
zh: 2020 年初，很多既往用于治疗其他传染病的抗病毒化合物在新的临床研究中被重新设计或开发，希望能用于缓解 COVID-19 症状。
pert_zh: 2020 年初，很多既往用于治疗其他传染病的抗病毒化合物在新的临床研究中被重新大量设计或开发，希望能用于缓解 COVID-19 症状。
bt_pert_zh: In early 2020, many antiviral compounds previously used to treat other infectious diseases were redesigned or developed in large numbers in new clinical studies in the hope of alleviating COVID-19 symptoms.

en: For an already-approved drug (such as hydroxychloroquine for malaria), Phase III-IV trials determine in hundreds to thousands of COVID-19-infected people the possible extended use of an already-approved drug for treating COVID-19 infection.
zh: 对于已经获批的药物（如用于治疗疟疾的羟氯喹），在针对数百至数千名 COVID-19 感染者的 III-IV 期试验中确定，可以延续使用已获批的药物来治疗 COVID-19 感染。
pert_zh: 对于已经获批的药物（如用于治疗疟疾的羟氯喹），在极度严重针对数百至数千名 COVID-19 感染者的 III-IV 期试验中确定，可以延续使用已获批的药物来治疗 COVID-19 感染。
bt_pert_zh: For already approved drugs (such as hydroxychloroquine for the treatment of malaria), extremely severe Phase III-IV trials of hundreds to thousands of people with COVID-19 infection have determined that the approved drugs can continue to be used to treat COVID-19 infection.

en: As of early April 2020, 103 candidate therapeutics were in preclinical or a stage of Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 drug candidates expected during April.
zh: 截至 2020 年 4 月初，共有 103 种候选药物处于临床前或 I-IV 期研发阶段，预计 4 月份将获得 29 种候选药物的试验结果。
pert_zh: 截至 2020 年 4 月初，共有 103 种极具前景的候选药物处于临床前或 I-IV 期研发阶段，预计 4 月份将获得 29 种候选药物的试验结果。
bt_pert_zh: As of early April 2020, there were 103 promising drug candidates in preclinical or Phase I-IV development, with trial results for 29 candidates expected in April.

en: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the coordinated "Solidarity trial" in 10 countries to rapidly assess in thousands of COVID-19 infected people the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory agents not yet evaluated specifically for COVID-19 illness.
zh: 今年 3 月，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 在 10 个国家启动了“Solidarity 试验”，促进相互协调，以便对数千名 COVID-19 感染者进行快速评估，了解尚未专门针对 COVID-19 接受评估的现有抗病毒和消炎药的潜在功效。
pert_zh: 今年 3 月，世界卫生组织 (WTO) 在 10 个国家启动了“Solidarity 试验”，增进相互协调，以便对数千名 COVID-19 感染者进行快速评估，了解尚未专门针对 COVID-19 接受评估的现有抗病毒和消炎药的潜在功效。
bt_pert_zh: In March, the World Health Organization (WHO) launched the Solidarity Trial in 10 countries to improve coordination to rapidly evaluate in thousands of people infected with COVID-19 the potential efficacy of existing antiviral and anti-inflammatory drugs that have not been specifically evaluated for COVID-19.

en: Do any of the drugs reduce mortality?
zh: 这些药物能否降低死亡率？
pert_zh: 这些药物能否明显降低死亡率？
bt_pert_zh: Can these drugs significantly reduce mortality?

en: Do any of the drugs reduce the time a patient is hospitalized?
zh: 这些药物能否缩短患者住院时间？
pert_zh: 这些药物是否能够缩短患者住院时间？
bt_pert_zh: Do these drugs shorten patients' hospital stays?

en: Do the treatments affect the need for people with COVID-19-induced pneumonia to be ventilated or maintained in intensive care?
zh: 这些治疗能否减少 COVID-19 肺炎患者使用呼吸机或进入重症监护室维持生命的需求？
pert_zh: 这些治疗能否显著减少 COVID-19 肺炎患者使用呼吸机或进入重症监护室维持生命的需求？
bt_pert_zh: Could these treatments significantly reduce the need for COVID-19 pneumonia patients to be on ventilators or admitted to intensive care units to stay alive?

en: Could such drugs be used to minimize the illness of COVID-19 infection in healthcare staff and people at high risk of developing severe illness?Enrolling people with COVID-19 infection is simplified by using data entries, including informed consent, on a WHO website.
zh: 这种药物能否最大限度减少医务人员感染 COVID-19 的几率并减少高风险人群发展成重症患者的情况？在 WHO 网站上只需输入包括知情同意在内的数据，即可登记 COVID-19 感染者。
pert_zh: 这种药物能否最大限度减少医务人员感染极端 COVID-19 的几率并减少高风险人群发展成重度症状患者的情况？在 WHO 网站上只需输入大部分包括知情同意在内的数据，即可登记 COVID-19 感染者。
bt_pert_zh: Can this drug minimize the chances of health workers contracting extreme COVID-19 and reduce the number of high-risk groups developing into severe symptomatic patients?On the WHO website, people infected with COVID-19 can be registered by entering most of the data, including informed consent.

en: After the trial staff determines the drugs available at the hospital, the WHO website randomizes the hospitalized subject to one of the trial drugs or to the hospital standard of care for treating COVID-19.
zh: 试验人员确定医院可提供的药物后，WHO 网站将为住院受试者随机分配一种试验药物或安排其接受针对 COVID-19 的护理标准。
pert_zh: 试验人员确定医院可提供的有效药物后，WHO 网站将为住院受试者随机分配一种试验药物或安排其接受针对 COVID-19 的护理标准。
bt_pert_zh: Once trialists identify an effective drug available at the hospital, the WHO site will randomly assign hospitalized participants to either an experimental drug or standard of care for COVID-19.

en: The trial physician records and submits follow-up information about the subject status and treatment, completing data input via the WHO Solidarity website.
zh: 试验医生会记录并提交有关受试者状态和治疗情况的随访信息，通过 WHO Solidarity 网站完成数据输入。
pert_zh: 试验医生会详细记录并提交有关受试者状态和治疗情况的随访信息，通过 WHO Solidarity 网站完成数据输入。
bt_pert_zh: Trial physicians will record and submit detailed follow-up information on subject status and treatment, completing data entry through the WHO Solidarity website.

en: A global safety monitoring board of WHO physicians examine interim results to assist decisions on safety and effectiveness of the trial drugs, and alter the trial design or recommend an effective therapy.
zh: 由 WHO 医师组成的全球安全监测委员会负责审查中期结果，以协助决定试验药物的安全性和有效性，调整试验设计或推荐有效的治疗方法。
pert_zh: 由 WHO 医师组成的全球安全监测委员会负责审查中期结果，以协助彻底决定试验药物的安全性和有效性，调整试验设计或推荐有效的治疗方法。
bt_pert_zh: The Global Safety Monitoring Committee, composed of WHO physicians, is responsible for reviewing interim results to help make final decisions about the safety and effectiveness of trial drugs, adjust trial designs, or recommend effective treatments.

en: A similar web-based study to Solidarity, called "Discovery", was initiated in March across seven countries by INSERM (Paris, France).During March, funding for the Solidarity trial reached US$108 million from 203,000 individuals, organizations and governments, with 45 countries involved in financing or trial management.
zh: 今年 3 月，INSERM（法国巴黎）在七个国家发起了一项类似于“Solidarity”的网络调查，命名为“Discovery”。3 月，Solidarity 试验共获得来自 203,000 个组织、个人和政府的 1.08 亿美元捐款，共有 45 个国家参与了捐款或试验管理。
pert_zh: 今年 3 月，INSERM（法国巴黎）在七个国家发起了一项严肃类似于“Solidarity”的网络调查，命名为“Discovery”。3 月，Solidarity 试验共获得来自 203,000 个大规模组织、个人和政府的 1.08 亿美元捐款，共有 45 个国家参与了捐款或试验管理。
bt_pert_zh: In March, INSERM (Paris, France) launched a serious online investigation similar to "Solidarity" in seven countries, named "Discovery". In March, the Solidarity trial received $108 million in donations from 203,000 large-scale organizations, individuals and governments, and a total of 45 countries participated in donations or trial management.

en: Numerous candidate drugs under study as "supportive" treatments to relieve discomfort during illness, such as NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are not included in the table below.
zh: 很多候选药物，如非甾体抗炎药或支气管扩张剂，也作为缓解疾病不适的“支持性”治疗药物纳入到研究当中，不包含在下表中。
pert_zh: 很多候选药物，如高效非甾体抗炎药或支气管扩张剂，也作为缓解疾病不适的“支持性”治疗药物纳入到研究当中，不包含在下表中。
bt_pert_zh: Many candidate drugs, such as high-potency NSAIDs or bronchodilators, are also being studied as “supportive” therapies to relieve disease discomfort and are not included in the table below.

en: Others in early-stage Phase II trials or numerous treatment candidates in Phase I trials, are also excluded.
zh: 早期 II 期试验的其他药物或 I 期试验中的大量候选药物也不在列。
pert_zh: 早期 II 期试验的其他非常规药物或 I 期试验中的大量候选药物也不在列。
bt_pert_zh: Other unconventional drugs in early phase II trials or a large number of drug candidates in phase I trials are also not included.

en: Drug candidates in Phase I-II trials have a low rate of success (under 12%) to pass through all trial phases to gain eventual approval.
zh: I-II 期试验中的候选药物通过所有试验阶段并获得最终批准的成功率很低（不到 12%）。
pert_zh: I-II 期试验中的候选药物通过所有试验阶段并获得最终批准的极低成功率很低（不到 12%）。
bt_pert_zh: The extremely low success rate (less than 12%) of drug candidates in Phase I-II trials making it through all trial stages and ultimately being approved is low.

en: Hydroxychloroquine is more commonly available than chloroquine in the United States.
zh: 在美国，羟氯喹比氯喹更常见。
pert_zh: 在美国，羟氯喹比氯喹更广泛地常见。
bt_pert_zh: Hydroxychloroquine is more widely available in the United States than chloroquine.

en: Although several countries use chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine for treatment of persons hospitalized with COVID-19, as of March 2020 the drug has not been formally approved through clinical trials in the United States.
zh: 尽管一些国家会使用氯喹或羟氯喹来治疗 COVID-19 患者，但截至 2020 年 3 月，这两种药尚未获得美国临床试验的正式批准。
pert_zh: 尽管一些国家会使用高剂量氯喹或羟氯喹来治疗 COVID-19 患者，但截至 2020 年 3 月，这两种药尚未获得美国临床试验的正式批准。
bt_pert_zh: Although some countries are using high-dose chloroquine or hydroxychloroquine to treat COVID-19 patients, as of March 2020, neither drug has been formally approved for clinical trials in the United States.

en: Chloroquine has been recommended by Chinese, South Korean and Italian health authorities for the treatment of COVID-19, although these agencies and the US CDC noted contraindications for people with heart disease or diabetes.
zh: 中国、韩国和意大利卫生机构已推荐使用氯喹来治疗 COVID-19 患者，不过这些机构和美国疾病预防与控制中心均指出心脏病或糖尿病患者不宜使用。
pert_zh: 中国、韩国和意大利卫生机构已推荐强烈使用氯喹来治疗 COVID-19 患者，不过这些机构和美国疾病预防与控制中心均指出心脏病或糖尿病患者不宜使用。
bt_pert_zh: Chinese, South Korean and Italian health agencies have strongly recommended the use of chloroquine to treat COVID-19 patients, though those agencies and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention note that it should not be used by people with heart disease or diabetes.

en: Both drugs have extensive interactions with prescription drugs, affecting the therapeutic dose and disease mitigation.
zh: 这两种药与大量处方药会发生相互作用，从而影响治疗剂量和疾病缓解效果。
pert_zh: 这两种药与大量其他处方药会发生相互作用，从而影响治疗剂量和疾病缓解效果。
bt_pert_zh: Both drugs can interact with a wide range of other prescription medications, affecting therapeutic dosing and disease-modifying effects.

en: Some people have allergic reactions to these drugs.On 12 April, a preliminary clinical trial conducted at a hospital in Brazil was stopped when several people given high doses of chloroquine for COVID-19 infection developed irregular heart rates, causing 11 deaths.
zh: 有些人对这些药物有过敏反应。4 月 12 日，巴西一家医院进行的一项初步临床试验被迫停止，因为多人因过量服用氯喹治疗 COVID-19 而导致心律不齐，最终造成 11 人死亡。
pert_zh: 有些人对这些药物有极端过敏反应。4 月 12 日，巴西一家医院进行的一项初步临床试验被迫停止，因为多人因过量服用氯喹治疗 COVID-19 而导致心律不齐，最终造成 11 人死亡。
bt_pert_zh: Some people have extreme allergic reactions to the drugs. On April 12, a preliminary clinical trial at a Brazilian hospital was halted after multiple people overdosed on chloroquine to treat COVID-19 and developed irregular heartbeats, ultimately killing 11 people.

en: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show that favipiravir was "clearly effective".
zh: 中国在武汉和深圳的临床试验表明，法匹拉韦“效果明显”。
pert_zh: 中国在武汉和深圳的临床试验表明，法匹拉韦“效果非常明显”。
bt_pert_zh: China's clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen showed that favipiravir was "very effective."

en: Of 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
zh: 在深圳 35 位患者中，平均服药 4 天可检测为阴性，而在 45 名未服用该药的患者中，患病 11 天后才会检测为阴性。
pert_zh: 在深圳 35 位患者中，平均服药 4 天可检测为轻微阴性，而在 45 名未服用该药的患者中，患病 11 天后才会检测为阴性。
bt_pert_zh: Among the 35 patients in Shenzhen, the test results were slightly negative after taking the drug for an average of 4 days, while among the 45 patients who did not take the drug, the test results were negative only after 11 days of illness.

en: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
zh: 在武汉对 240 名肺炎患者进行的研究中，一半服用了法匹拉韦，一半服用了盐酸阿比朵尔。
pert_zh: 在武汉对 240 名肺炎患者进行的研究中，一半服用了高效法匹拉韦，一半服用了盐酸阿比朵尔。
bt_pert_zh: In a study of 240 pneumonia patients in Wuhan, half were given the highly effective favipiravir and half were given arbidol hydrochloride.

en: The term "preclinical research" is defined by laboratory studies in vitro and in vivo, indicating a beginning stage for development of a vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapy, such as experiments to determine effective doses and toxicity, before a candidate compound is advanced for safety and efficacy evaluation in humans.
zh: “临床前研究”一词通过体外和体内实验室研究定义，代表疫苗、抗病毒或单克隆抗体疗法的起始阶段，例如通过实验确定有效剂量和毒性，然后才能在人体中开展候选化合物的安全性和功效评估。
pert_zh: “临床前研究”一词通过体外和体内实验室研究定义，代表疫苗、抗病毒或单克隆抗体疗法的起始阶段，例如通过加强实验确定有效剂量和毒性，然后才能在人体中开展候选化合物的安全性和功效评估。
bt_pert_zh: The term “preclinical studies” is defined through in vitro and in vivo laboratory studies and represents the initial stages of vaccine, antiviral or monoclonal antibody therapeutics, such as determining effective doses and toxicity through step-up experiments before safety and efficacy evaluation of candidate compounds can be carried out in humans.

en: Some antibiotics may be repurposed as COVID-19 treatments:
zh: 一些抗生素可能也可用于治疗 COVID-19：
pert_zh: 一些强效抗生素可能也可用于治疗 COVID-19：
bt_pert_zh: Some powerful antibiotics may also be useful in treating COVID-19:

en: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.
zh: 2020 年 3 月，确定将 SARS-CoV-2 病毒的主要蛋白酶作为感染后的药物攻击目标。
pert_zh: 2020 年 3 月，确定将 SARS-CoV-2 病毒的主要蛋白酶作为高效感染后的药物攻击目标。
bt_pert_zh: In March 2020, the main protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a highly effective post-infection drug target.

en: This enzyme is essential to the host cell to reproduce the ribonucleic acid of the virus.
zh: 这种酶是宿主细胞复制病毒核糖核酸的必要条件。
pert_zh: 这种酶是宿主细胞复制病毒核糖核酸非常必要的条件。
bt_pert_zh: This enzyme is essential for the replication of viral RNA in host cells.

en: To find the enzyme, scientists used the genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.
zh: 为找到这种酶，科学家们利用中国研究人员在 2020 年 1 月公布的基因组来分离该主要蛋白酶。
pert_zh: 为找到这种酶，科学家们利用中国研究人员在 2020 年 1 月公布的详细基因组来分离该主要蛋白酶。
bt_pert_zh: To find the enzyme, the scientists used a detailed genome published by Chinese researchers in January 2020 to isolate the main protease.

en: As a potential combination therapy, they are used together in two Phase III arms of the 2020 global Solidarity project on COVID-19.
zh: 作为一种潜在联合疗法，在 2020 年针对 COVID-19 的全球 Solidarity 项目中，它们一同接受了两项 III 期试验。
